## <a name="authentication-events"></a><span data-ttu-id="d6247-159">Događaji potvrde identiteta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-159">Authentication events</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-160">Ovi događaji dijagnostičkih podataka se prikupljaju kada Office pokuša da preuzme token potvrde identiteta, ili tiho ili putem upita.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-160">These diagnostic data events are collected when Office attempts to acquire an authentication token, either silently or through prompting.</span></span>

### <a name="officeandroidmsaguesttoaad"></a><span data-ttu-id="d6247-161">Office.Android.MSAGuestToAAD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-161">Office.Android.MSAGuestToAAD</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-162">Ovaj događaj pomaže u razumevanju koliko korisnika se traži za unošenje lozinke za lični nalog, dok pristupaju radnom resursu, jer bi njihov lični nalog mogao da bude validan zakupac gosta na poslu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-162">This event helps in understanding how many users are getting prompted for providing personal account password, while accessing work resource, as their personal account could be a valid guest to work account's tenant.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-163">Ovi podaci nam pomažu da shvatimo koliko korisnika prolazi kroz muku zbog ponovnog pokretanja zahteva da prioritetno dobiju AAD tokene tiho na osnovu tvrdnje Microsoft računa SAML (Securiti Assertion Markup Language).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-163">This data helps us understand how many users are going through the pain of sign in re-prompts to prioritize AAD token acquisition silently based on a Microsoft account SAML (Security Assertion Markup Language) assertion.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-164">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-164">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-165">**Tag** - Označava da je korisnik dobio poziv za prijavu za lični nalog, dok je pristupao resursima radnog naloga.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-165">**Tag** - Indicates that user got sign-in prompt for personal account, while accessing work account resource.</span></span>


### <a name="officeidentityfbapromptwin32"></a><span data-ttu-id="d6247-166">Office.Identity.FbaPromptWin32</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-166">Office.Identity.FbaPromptWin32</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-167">Prikuplja se kada Office prikaže korisniku Forms-Based-Auth upit za prijavljivanje zasnovan na formularu za potvrdu identiteta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-167">Collected when Office shows the user a Forms-Based-Auth sign-in prompt.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-168">Pored tihog preuzimanja tokena, upit za potvrdu identiteta se koristi da se odredi da li se korisnik nalazi u statusu neispravne potvrde identiteta, što bi za korisnika značilo da je stanje klijenta van mreže, a u najgorem slučaju, neispravna potvrda identiteta može sprečiti preuzimanje licence i dovesti do potpuno neupotrebljivog klijenta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-168">Along with silent token acquisitions, authentication prompts are used to determine if user is in a broken authentication state which, for the user, results in what is essentially an Offline Client state, or in the worst case, broken authentication may prevent license acquisition and result in a completely unusable client.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-169">Upiti za prijavljivanje zasnovani na formularu za potvrdu identiteta (FBA – Forms-Based-Auth) se koriste u nekim scenarijima za lokalnu potvrdu identiteta i uglavnom se trudimo da se to ne dešava jer bi svi trebalo da koriste modernu identifikaciju (modern-Auth) zbog bezbednosnih ranjivosti koje se odnose na FBA.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-169">Forms-Based-Auth (FBA) sign-in prompts are used for some on-premises authentication scenarios and typically we want to make sure this isn't happening, as everyone should be using Modern-Auth because of security vulnerabilities associated with FBA.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-170">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-170">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-171">**AuthScheme** - šema koja se koristi za potvrdu identiteta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-171">**AuthScheme** - the authentication scheme used</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-172">**DocumentUrlHash** - šifrovani URL zahtevi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-172">**DocumentUrlHash** - an encrypted URL requesting</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-173">**EndTag** - oznaka gde je završen FBA obrazac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-173">**EndTag** - the tag where FBA form is completed</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-174">**Flags** - zastarelo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-174">**Flags** - Obsolete</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-175">**EndTag** - oznaka gde počinje FBA obrazac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-175">**FlowTag** - the tag where FBA form is started</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-176">**LastError** - vraćanje koda greške</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-176">**LastError** – the error code returned</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-177">**PromptEndTime** - vreme kada je upit završen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-177">**PromptEndTime** - the time when then prompt ended</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-178">**PromptStartTime** - vreme kada je upit započet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-178">**PromptStartTime** - the time when the prompt started</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-179">**Rezultat** - da li je potvrda identiteta uspela</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-179">**Result** - whether the authentication succeeded</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-180">**SessionEndTime** - vreme kada je sesija događaja završena</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-180">**SessionEndTime** – the time when the event session ended</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-181">**Timeout** - vreme kada je upit istekao</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-181">**Timeout** - the time when the prompt timed out</span></span>

### <a name="officeidentitysignoutevent"></a><span data-ttu-id="d6247-182">Office.Identity.SignOutEvent</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-182">Office.Identity.SignOutEvent</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-183">Prikuplja se kada se korisnik odjavi sa sistema Office.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-183">Collected when a user signs out of Office.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-184">Saznanje da se korisnik odjavio omogućava klasifikaciju ostalih događaja, kao što su upiti, na način na koji se očekuje kako bi se pravilno izračunala njihova pouzdanost / metrička spremnost otpreme i da bi se izbeglo upozorenje i vraćanje na prethodne verzije zasnovano na lažnoj premisi da korisnik ima neočekivane probleme sa upitima za potvrdu identiteta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-184">Knowing the user is signed out makes it possible to classify other events, such as prompts, as expected, so those events can be correctly computed in reliability / ship-readiness metrics and avoid alerting or rolling back builds on the faulty premise that the user is experiencing unexpected sign-in prompts.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-185">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-185">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-186">**FlowEndTime** - vreme kada je aktivnost odjave završena</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-186">**FlowEndTime** - the time when the sign out action ended</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-187">**FlowEndTime** - vreme kada je aktivnost odjave započeta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-187">**FlowStartTime** - the time when the sign out action started</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-188">**IdentityErrorState** - bilo koji status greške identiteta prilikom odjave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-188">**IdentityErrorState** - any identity error state during sign out</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-189">**IdentityHashedUniqueId** - odjava šifrovanog ID identiteta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-189">**IdentityHashedUniqueId** - the encrypted identity ID being signed out</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-190">**IdentityProviderType** - odjava dobavljača identiteta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-190">**IdentityProviderType** - the identity provider of the identity being signed out</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-191">**IdentityUniqueID** - odjava ID identiteta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-191">**IdentityUniqueID** - the identity ID being signed out</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-192">**SessionEndTime** - vreme kada je sesija događaja završena</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-192">**SessionEndTime** - the time when the event session ended</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-193">**SignOutUserAction** - ukazuje na to da je korisnik započeo radnju odjavljivanja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-193">**SignOutUserAction** - Indicates the user initiates the sign out action</span></span>

### <a name="officeidentitysspipromptwin32"></a><span data-ttu-id="d6247-194">Office.Identity.SspiPromptWin32</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-194">Office.Identity.SspiPromptWin32</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-195">Prikuplja se kada Office prikaže korisniku Windows SSPI upit za prijavljivanje.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-195">Collected when Office shows the user a Windows SSPI sign-in prompt.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-196">Pored tihog preuzimanja tokena, upiti za potvrdu identiteta određuju da li se korisnik nalazi u statusu neispravne potvrde identiteta, što bi značilo da je stanje klijenta van mreže.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-196">Along with silent token acquisitions, authentication prompts determine whether a user is in a broken authentication state, which results in an Offline Client state.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-197">Neispravna potvrda identiteta može sprečiti preuzimanje licence i dovesti do potpuno neupotrebljivog klijenta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-197">Broken authentication may prevent license acquisition and result in a completely unusable client.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-198">Windows SSPI upiti se koriste za potvrdu identiteta sa sistemom Exchange (za sinhronizaciju e-pošte) kada korisnikovi Exchange resursi nisu podešeni za višestruke potvrde identiteta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-198">Windows SSPI prompts are used for authenticating with Exchange (for mail synchronizing) when the user's Exchange resource hasn't been set up for multi-factor authentication.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-199">Ovi događaji, zajedno sa događajima prostora Office.MATS, koriste se za sledeće svrhe:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-199">These events, along with the Office.MATS namespace events, are used for the following purposes:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-200">1\) Utvrđivanje da li klijent može uspešno da pribavi token potvrde identiteta ili se nalazi u neispravnom stanju potvrde identiteta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-200">1\) Identify whether clients can successfully obtain an authentication token or have entered a broken authentication state.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-201">2\) Procenjivanje da li su promene koje su se desile u klijentu ili uslugama dovele do kritičnih regresija u korisničkom iskustvu potvrde identiteta i pouzdanosti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-201">2\) Evaluate whether changes that have occurred on the client or services have resulted in critical regressions in the user's authentication experience and reliability</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-202">3\) Kada dođe do greške, ovi signali emituju bitne kodove grešaka odgovornih komponenata (kôd Office klijenta, biblioteke potvrde identiteta, upravne usluge) i mogu se koristiti za trijažu, dijagnozu i ublažavanje.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-202">3\) When failures occur, these signals emit important failure codes from the responsible component (Office client code, authentication libraries, or authority services) which can be used for triage, diagnosis and mitigation</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-203">4\) Ovi signali napajaju razne spremnosti otpreme i nadgledanja ispravnosti koja šalju upozorenja da bi naši inženjeri mogli brzo da odreaguju i da smanje vreme ublažavanja kritičnih grešaka koje blokiraju korisnika</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-203">4\) These signals power various ship readiness and health monitors, which fire alerts so our engineers can engage quickly and reduce the time to mitigation of critical user-blocking failures</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-204">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-204">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-205">**AllowSavedCreds** - da li je novi akreditiv stalan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-205">**AllowSavedCreds** - whether the new credential is persisted</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-206">**AuthScheme** - šema koja se koristi za potvrdu identiteta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-206">**AuthScheme** - the authentication scheme used</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-207">**CredsSaved** - da li je novi akreditiv sačuvan.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-207">**CredsSaved** - whether the new credential is saved</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-208">**DocumentUrlHash** - šifrovani URL zahtevi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-208">**DocumentUrlHash** - the encrypted URL requesting</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-209">**EndTag** - oznaka gde je upit završen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-209">**EndTag** - the tag where the prompt ended</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-210">**NewIdentity**\_ErrorState – da li je novi identitet važeći</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-210">**NewIdentity**\_ErrorState – whether the new identity is valid</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-211">**NewIdentity\_HashedUniqueId** - novi šifrovani ID identiteta kada se upit završi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-211">**NewIdentity\_HashedUniqueId** - the encrypted new identity ID after prompt is completed</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-212">**NewIdentity\_ProviderType** - novi dobavljač identiteta kada se upit završi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-212">**NewIdentity\_ProviderType** - the new identity provider after the prompt is completed</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-213">**NewIdentity\_HashedUniqueId** - novi šifrovani ID kada se upit završi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-213">**NewIdentity\_UniqueID** - the new identity ID after the prompt is completed</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-214">**OutStatus** – da li je izlaz upita važeći</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-214">**OutStatus** - whether the prompt output is valid</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-215">**PromptEndTime** - vreme kada je upit završen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-215">**PromptEndTime** - the time when the prompt ended</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-216">**PromptFailedTag** - oznaka koja označava neuspešnost SSPI upita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-216">**PromptFailedTag** - the tag that indicates SSPI prompt failure</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-217">**PromptFlow** - oznaka koja poziva SSPI upit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-217">**PromptFlow** - the tag that invoked the SSPI prompt</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-218">**PromptStartTime** - vreme kada je upit započet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-218">**PromptStartTime** - the time when the prompt started</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-219">**Proxy** - ako se koristi proxy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-219">**Proxy** - if proxy is used</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-220">**ServerHash** - šifrovana adresa servera</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-220">**ServerHash** - the encrypted server address</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-221">**SessionEndTime** - vreme kada je sesija događaja završena</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-221">**SessionEndTime** - the time when the event session ended</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-222">**Timeout** - vreme kada je upit istekao</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-222">**Timeout** - the time when the prompt is timed out</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-223">**UiMessage** - poruka korisničkog interfejsa u upitu </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-223">**UiMessage** - the UI message in the prompt</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-224">**UserNameHash** - šifrovano korisničko ime</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-224">**UserNameHash** - the encrypted user name</span></span>

### <a name="officeidentitywin32prompt"></a><span data-ttu-id="d6247-225">Office.Identity.Win32Prompt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-225">Office.Identity.Win32Prompt</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-226">Prikuplja se kada Office prikaže korisniku upit za prijavljivanje za višestruku potvrdu identiteta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-226">Collected when Office shows the user a multi-factor authentication sign-in prompt.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-227">Pored tihog preuzimanja tokena, upiti za potvrdu identiteta određuju da li se korisnik nalazi u statusu neispravne potvrde identiteta, što bi značilo da je stanje klijenta van mreže.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-227">Along with silent token acquisitions, authentication prompts determine whether a user is in a broken authentication state, which results in an Offline Client state.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-228">Neispravna potvrda identiteta može sprečiti preuzimanje licence i dovesti do potpuno neupotrebljivog klijenta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-228">Broken authentication may prevent license acquisition and result in a completely unusable client.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-229">Ovi događaji, zajedno sa događajima prostora Office.MATS, koriste se za sledeće svrhe:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-229">These events, along with the Office.MATS namespace events, are used for the following purposes:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-230">1\) Utvrđivanje da li klijent može uspešno da pribavi token potvrde identiteta ili se nalazi u neispravnom stanju potvrde identiteta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-230">1\) Identify whether clients can successfully obtain an authentication token or have entered in to a broken authentication state.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-231">2\) Procenjivanje da li su promene koje su se desile u klijentu ili uslugama dovele do kritičnih regresija u korisničkom iskustvu potvrde identiteta i pouzdanosti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-231">2\) Evaluate whether changes that have occurred on the client or services have resulted in critical regressions in the user's authentication experience and reliability</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-232">3\) Kada dođe do greške, ovi signali emituju bitne kodove grešaka odgovornih komponenata (kôd Office klijenta, biblioteke potvrde identiteta, upravne usluge) i mogu se koristiti za trijažu, dijagnozu i ublažavanje.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-232">3\) When failures occur, these signals emit important failure codes from the responsible component (Office client code, authentication libraries, or authority services) which can be used for triage, diagnosis and mitigation</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-233">4\) Ovi signali napajaju razne spremnosti otpreme i nadgledanja ispravnosti koja šalju upozorenja da bi naši inženjeri mogli brzo da odreaguju i da smanje vreme ublažavanja kritičnih grešaka koje blokiraju korisnika.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-233">4\) These signals power various ship readiness and health monitors, which fire alerts so our engineers can engage quickly and reduce the time to mitigation of critical user-blocking failures.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-234">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-234">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-235">**AdalWAMUsed** - oznaka koja ukazuje na rezultat ako se koristi ADAL-atop-WAM</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-235">**AdalWAMUsed** – the tag that indicates result if ADAL-atop-WAM is used</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-236">**CallTag** - oznaka koja ukazuje na poziv korisničkog interfejsa za prijavljivanje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-236">**CallTag** – the tag that indicates the caller of sign in UI</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-237">**Context** - kontekst za upita za prijavljivanje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-237">**Context** - the sign in context for the prompt</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-238">**EndTagIdentityProviderRequested** - oznaka gde je zatražen dobavljač identiteta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-238">**EndTagIdentityProviderRequested** - the tag where the identity provider is requested</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-239">**HrdShownTag** - oznaka gde se prikazuje HDR dijalog za prijavljivanje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-239">**HrdShownTag** - the tag where the HRD sign in dialog is shown</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-240">**IdentityProviderResulted** - tip dobavljača identiteta koji se zahteva</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-240">**IdentityProviderResulted** - the identity provider type it is requesting</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-241">**IdPFlowTag** - oznaka koja ukazuje na rezultat zahteva identiteta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-241">**IdPFlowTag** - the tag that indicates the identity request result</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-242">**LastLoginDelta** - vreme proteklo od poslednjeg uspešnog prijavljivanja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-242">**LastLoginDelta** - the time delta from last successful login</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-243">**NewIdentity\_** ErrorState – da li je novi identitet važeći nakon završenog upita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-243">**NewIdentity\_ErrorState** - whether the identity is valid after prompt</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-244">**NewIdentity\_ProviderType** - novi tip dobavljača identiteta nakon završenog upita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-244">**NewIdentity\_ProviderType** - the new identity provider type after prompt</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-245">**NewIdentity\_HashedUniqueId** - novi dobijeni ID identiteta nakon završenog upita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-245">**NewIdentity\_UniqueID** - the new identity ID returned after prompt</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-246">**PromptCorrelation** - Upit ID korelacije za dijagnostičke svrhe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-246">**PromptCorrelation** - the prompt correlation ID for diagnostic purpose</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-247">**PromptEndTime** - vreme kada je upit završen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-247">**PromptEndTime** - the time when the prompt ended</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-248">**PromptStartTime** - vreme kada je upit započet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-248">**PromptStartTime** – the time when the prompt started</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-249">**SessionEndTime** - vreme kada je sesija događaja završena</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-249">**SessionEndTime** - the time when the event session ended</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-250">**ShowUIResult** - vraćeni kôd rezultata iz upita korisničkog interfejsa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-250">**ShowUIResult** – the result code returned from the prompt UI</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-251">**StartTag** - oznaka gde počinje upit Win32</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-251">**StartTag** – the tag where Win32 prompt started</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-252">**Timeout** - vreme kada je upit istekao</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-252">**Timeout** - the time when the prompt is timed out</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-253">**WasIdentitySignedOut** – da li je korisnik je odjavljen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-253">**WasIdentitySignedOut** - whether the user is signed out</span></span>

### <a name="officematsactionofficewin32-officematsactionofficewinrt"></a><span data-ttu-id="d6247-254">Office.MATS.actionofficewin32, Office.MATS.actionofficewinrt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-254">Office.MATS.actionofficewin32, Office.MATS.actionofficewinrt</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-255">Sledeći opisi se odnose na događaje Win32 i WinRT (ime zavisi od platforme)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-255">The following description applies for both Win32 and WinRT events (the name depends on platform.)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-256">Microsoft Auth Telemetry System (MATS) se prikuplja kada Office pokuša da preuzme token potvrde identiteta, ili tiho ili putem upita.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-256">Microsoft Auth Telemetry System (MATS) is collected when Office attempts to acquire an authentication token, either silently or through prompting.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-257">Kada pokušaj preuzimanja ne uspe, šalju se i informacije o grešci.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-257">When acquisition attempts fail, error information is included.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-258">Ovi događaji pomažu korisnicima da izbegnu unošenje neispravne identifikacije tako što će:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-258">These events help our users avoid entering broken authentication states by:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-259">1\) Utvrditi da li klijent može uspešno da pribavi token potvrde identiteta ili se nalazi u neispravnom stanju potvrde identiteta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-259">1\) Identifying whether clients can successfully obtain an authentication token or have entered a broken authentication state.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-260">2\) Proceniti da li su promene koje su se desile u klijentu ili uslugama dovele do kritičnih regresija u korisničkom iskustvu potvrde identiteta i pouzdanosti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-260">2\) Evaluate when changes occur on the client or services, whether they result in critical regressions in the user's authentication experience and reliability</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-261">3\) Kada dođe do greške, ovi signali emituju bitne kodove grešaka odgovornih komponenata (kôd Office klijenta, biblioteke potvrde identiteta, upravne usluge) i mogu se koristiti za trijažu, dijagnozu i ublažavanje.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-261">3\) When failures occur, these signals emit important failure codes from the responsible component (Office client code, authentication libraries, or authority services) which can be used for triage, diagnosis and mitigation</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-262">4\) Ovi signali napajaju razne spremnosti otpreme i nadgledanja ispravnosti koja šalju upozorenja da bi naši inženjeri mogli brzo da odreaguju i da smanje vreme ublažavanja kritičnih grešaka.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-262">4\) These signals power various ship readiness and health monitors, which fire alerts so our engineers can engage quickly and reduce the time to mitigation of critical failures.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-263">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-263">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-264">**Actiontype** - koja biblioteka potvrde identiteta se koristi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-264">**Actiontype** - Which authentication library is used</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-265">**Appaudience** - da li je aplikacija napravljena za internu ili spoljnu upotrebu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-265">**Appaudience** - Is the app build for internal or external use</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-266">**Appforcedprompt** - da li aplikacija poništava keš i nameće pojavljivanje upita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-266">**Appforcedprompt** - Did the app override cache and force a prompt to be shown</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-267">**Appname** - ime aplikacije koja potvrđuje identitet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-267">**Appname** - Name of the application doing authentication</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-268">**Appver** - verzija aplikacije koja potvrđuje identitet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-268">**Appver** - Version of the application doing authentication</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-269">**Askedforcreds** - da li aplikacija traži od korisnika da unese akreditive za ovu radnju</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-269">**Askedforcreds** - Did the application ask the user to enter credentials for this action</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-270">**Authoutcome** - da li je pokušaj potvrde identiteta uspešan, neuspešan ili otkazan.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-270">**Authoutcome** - Did the authentication attempt succeed, fail, or was canceled</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-271">**Blockingprompt** - da li aplikacija izbacuje upit koji zahteva interakciju korisnika</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-271">**Blockingprompt** - Did the application throw a prompt requiring user interaction</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-272">**Correlationid** - GUID koji se koristi za spajanje sa uslužnim podacima</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-272">**Correlationid** - GUID used for joining with services data</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-273">**Count** - broj događaja u slučaju agregacije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-273">**Count** - Count of events in cases of aggregation</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-274">**Data\_accounttype** - nalog potrošača ili organizacije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-274">**Data\_accounttype** - Consumer or organizational account</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-275">**Devicenetworkstate** - da li je korisnik bio na mreži</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-275">**Devicenetworkstate** - Was the user online</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-276">**Deviceprofiletelemetryid** - Anonimni ID uređaja koji se koristi za merenje utiska pri radu sa uređajem</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-276">**Deviceprofiletelemetryid** - Anonymous device ID used to measure device experience</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-277">**Duration** - Koliko vremena je bilo potrebno za potvrdu identiteta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-277">**Duration** - How long the authentication took</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-278">**Duration_Max** – Ako je ovaj signal agreriran, maksimalno trajanje bilo kog agreriranog događaja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-278">**Duration_Max** - If this signal is aggregated, the maximum duration of any aggregated event.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-279">**Duration_Min** – Ako je ovaj signal agreriran, minimalno trajanje bilo kog agreriranog događaja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-279">**Duration_Min** - If this signal is aggregated, the minimum duration of any aggregated event.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-280">**Duration_Sum** – Ako je ovaj signal agreriran, zbir trajanja svih agreriranih događaja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-280">**Duration_Sum** - If this signal is aggregated, the sum of the durations of all the aggregated events.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-281">**EndTime** - Kada je događaj potvrde identiteta završen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-281">**Endtime** - When the authentication event ended</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-282">**Error** - Kôd greške ako potvrda identiteta nije uspela</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-282">**Error** - Error code if the authentication failed</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-283">**Errordescription** - Kratak opis greške</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-283">**Errordescription** - Brief description of the error</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-284">**Errorsource** - Da li je došlo do greške u usluzi, biblioteci potvrde identiteta ili aplikaciji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-284">**Errorsource** - Did the error come from service, authentication library, or application</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-285">**Identityservice** - Da li je aktiviran nalog Microsoft usluge (MSA) ili usluge Azure Active Directory (AAD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-285">**Identityservice** - Was Microsoft Service Account (MSA) or Azure Active Directory (AAD) service invoked</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-286">**Interactiveauthcontainer** - Koji tip upita je prikazan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-286">**Interactiveauthcontainer** - What type of prompt was shown</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-287">**Issilent** - Da li je upit prikazan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-287">**Issilent** - Was a prompt shown</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-288">**Microsoft**\_**ADAL**\_**adal**\_**version** - Verzija biblioteke potvrde identiteta usluge Azure Active Directory (ADAL)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-288">**Microsoft**\_**ADAL**\_**adal**\_**version** - Version of the Azure Active Directory Authentication Library (ADAL)</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-289">**Microsoft\_ADAL\_api\_error\_code** - Kôd greške kod pokušaja potvrde identiteta koji emituje biblioteka potvrde identiteta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-289">**Microsoft\_ADAL\_api\_error\_code** - Error code emitted by authentication library for this authentication attempt</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-290">**Microsoft\_ADAL\_api\_id** - API aktivacija za ovaj pokušaj potvrde identiteta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-290">**Microsoft\_ADAL\_api\_id** - API invoked for this authentication attempt</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-291">**Microsoft\_ADAL\_authority** - URL autoriteta usluge Azure Active Directory koji je odgovoran za potvrdu identiteta korisnika</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-291">**Microsoft\_ADAL\_authority** – Azure Active Directory authority URL responsible for authenticating the user</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-292">**Microsoft\_ADAL\_authority\_type** - Potrošač / ugovor o pružanju Microsoft usluga (MSA) naspram organizacije / Azure Active Directory (AAD), trenutno uvek AAD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-292">**Microsoft\_ADAL\_authority\_type** – Consumer / Microsoft Service Agreement (MSA) vs organizational / Azure Active Directory (AAD); currently always AAD</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-293">**Microsoft\_ADAL\_authority\_validation\_status** - Pokazuje da li je potvrda identiteta završena na strani usluge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-293">**Microsoft\_ADAL\_authority\_validation\_status** – Tells whether authentication completed on the service-side</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-294">**Microsoft\_ADAL\_broker\_app** - Pokazuje da li je ADAL koristio posrednika za potvrdu identiteta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-294">**Microsoft\_ADAL\_broker\_app** - Tells whether ADAL used a broker for authentication</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-295">**Microsoft\_ADAL\_broker\_app\_used** – Prikazuje ime posrednika (npr. Windows Account Management)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-295">**Microsoft\_ADAL\_broker\_app\_used** – Tells the name of the broker (for example, Windows Account Management)</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-296">**Microsoft\_ADAL\_broker\_version** - Prikazuje verziju posrednika ako je korišćen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-296">**Microsoft\_ADAL\_broker\_version** - Tells the version of the broker if used</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-297">**Microsoft\_ADAL\_cache\_event\_count** - Broj keš događaja koje je ADAL izvršio prilikom preuzimanja tokena</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-297">**Microsoft\_ADAL\_cache\_event\_count** - Number of cache events ADAL performed while retrieving token</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-298">**Microsoft\_ADAL\_cache\_event\_count\_max** - Ako je signal prikupljen, prikazuje maksimalan broj keš događaja u bilo kom skupu događaja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-298">**Microsoft\_ADAL\_cache\_event\_count\_max** - If this signal is aggregated, max cache events of any one of the aggregated events.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-299">**Microsoft\_ADAL\_cache\_event\_count\_min** - Ako je signal prikupljen, prikazuje minimalan broj keš događaja u bilo kom skupu događaja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-299">**Microsoft\_ADAL\_cache\_event\_count\_min** - If this signal is aggregated, min cache events of any one of the aggregated events.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-301">**Microsoft\_ADAL\_cache\_read\_count** - Koliko puta je API čitao keš diska.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-301">**Microsoft\_ADAL\_cache\_read\_count** - How many times the API read from the disk cache.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-302">Prisutno je ako postoji makar jedno očitavanje.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-302">Present if there was at least one read.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-303">**Microsoft\_ADAL\_cache\_read\_error\_count** - Koliko puta je čitanje keš diska bilo neuspešno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-303">**Microsoft\_ADAL\_cache\_read\_error\_count** - How many times the disk cache read failed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-304">Prisutno je ako postoji makar jedan neuspeh. </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-304">Is present if there was at least one failure.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-305">**Microsoft\_ADAL\_cache\_read\_last\_error** - Kôd greške ADAL.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-305">**Microsoft\_ADAL\_cache\_read\_last\_error** - ADAL error code.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-306">Prisutan je ako postoji makar jedan neuspeh u očitavanju.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-306">Present if there was at least one read failure.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-307">**Microsoft\_ADAL\_cache\_read\_last\_system\_error** - Kôd sistemske greške.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-307">**Microsoft\_ADAL\_cache\_read\_last\_system\_error** - System error code.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-308">Prisutan je ako postoji makar jedan neuspeh u očitavanju.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-308">Is present if there was at least one read failure.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-309">**Microsoft\_ADAL\_cache\_write\_count** - Koliko puta je API pisao na keš disku.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-309">**Microsoft\_ADAL\_cache\_write\_count** - How many times the API wrote to the disk cache.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-310">Prisutno je ako postoji makar jedno pisanje.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-310">Present if there was at least one write.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-311">**Microsoft\_ADAL\_cache\_write\_error\_count** - Koliko puta je pisanje na keš disku bilo neuspešno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-311">**Microsoft\_ADAL\_cache\_write\_error\_count** - How many times the disk cache-write failed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-312">Prisutno je ako postoji makar jedan neuspeh. </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-312">Present if there was at least one failure.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-313">**Microsoft\_ADAL\_cache\_write\_last\_error** - Kôd greške ADAL.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-313">**Microsoft\_ADAL\_cache\_write\_last\_error** - ADAL error code.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-314">Prisutan je ako postoji makar jedan neuspeh u pisanju.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-314">Present if there was at least one write failure.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-315">**Microsoft\_ADAL\_cache\_write\_last\_system\_error** - Kôd sistemske greške.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-315">**Microsoft\_ADAL\_cache\_write\_last\_system\_error** - System error code.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-316">Prisutan je ako postoji makar jedan neuspeh u pisanju.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-316">Present if there was at least one write failure.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-317">**Microsoft\_ADAL\_client\_id** - Heš ID aplikacije AAD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-317">**Microsoft\_ADAL\_client\_id** - Hashed AAD app ID</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-318">**Microsoft\_ADAL\_extended\_expires\_on\_setting** - Obaveštenje u obliku tačno/netačno koje prikazuje da li token ima produženo trajanje.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-318">**Microsoft\_ADAL\_extended\_expires\_on\_setting** - True/false telling if the token has an extended lifetime.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-319">**Microsoft\_ADAL\_http\_event\_coun** t - Broj HTTP poziva koje je uputio ADAL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-319">**Microsoft\_ADAL\_http\_event\_coun** t - Count of HTTP calls made by ADAL.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-321">**Microsoft\_ADAL\_http\_event\_count\_min** - Ako je signal prikupljen, prikazuje minimalan broj HTTP poziva koje je uputio ADAL u bilo kom skupu događaja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-321">**Microsoft\_ADAL\_http\_event\_count\_min** - If this signal is aggregated, min HTTP calls made by ADAL of any aggregated event.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-322">**Microsoft\_ADAL\_http\_event\_count\_sum** - Ako je signal prikupljen, prikazuje zbir HTTP poziva koje je uputio ADAL iz svih skupova događaja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-322">**Microsoft\_ADAL\_http\_event\_count\_sum** - If this signal is aggregated, sum of the HTTP calls made by ADAL of all the aggregated events.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-323">**Microsoft\_ADAL\_is\_silent\_ui** - Obaveštenje u obliku tačno/netačno koje ukazuje na to da li je ADAL prikazao korisnički interfejs (upit). </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-323">**Microsoft\_ADAL\_is\_silent\_ui** - True/false telling if UI was shown (prompt) by ADAL.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-324">**Microsoft\_ADAL\_is\_successful** - Obaveštenje u obliku tačno/netačno koje ukazuje na to da li je ADAL API uspešan.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-324">**Microsoft\_ADAL\_is\_successful** - True/false telling if ADAL API succeeded.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-325">**Microsoft\_ADAL\_logging\_pii\_enabled** - Obaveštenje u obliku tačno/netačno koje ukazuje na to da li je omogućen ADAL režim potpunog evidentiranja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-325">**Microsoft\_ADAL\_logging\_pii\_enabled** - True/false telling if ADAL full logging mode is enabled.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-326">Ovi podaci se evidentiraju lokalno, ne emituju se telemetrijski.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-326">This data is only logged locally, not emitted in telemetry.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-327">**Microsoft\_ADAL\_oauth\_error\_code** – Kôd greške protokola OAuth koji je vratila usluga.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-327">**Microsoft\_ADAL\_oauth\_error\_code** – OAuth protocol error code returned by the service.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-328">**Microsoft\_ADAL\_prompt\_behavior** - Prijavljivanje ili nijedan od HTTP parametara nije prosleđeno da bi se odredilo da li korisnički interfejs može da bude prikazan.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-328">**Microsoft\_ADAL\_prompt\_behavior** - log-in or none HTTP parameter passed to service to specify if user interface can be shown.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-331">**Microsoft\_ADAL\_response\_time** - Koliko vremena je bilo potrebno da se usluga vrati na ADAL.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-331">**Microsoft\_ADAL\_response\_time** - How long it took service to return to ADAL.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-332">**Microsoft\_ADAL\_response\_time\_max** - Ako je signal prikupljen, prikazuje maksimalno vreme iz bilo kog skupa događaja koje je bilo potrebno da se ADAL vrati iz svoje API.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-332">**Microsoft\_ADAL\_response\_time\_max** - If the signal is aggregated, the max time it took ADAL to return from its API among any of the aggregated events.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-337">**Microsoft\_ADAL\_server\_sub\_error\_code** - Kôd podgreške koji je vratio server da bi se razjasnilo zašto zahtev nije uspeo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-337">**Microsoft\_ADAL\_server\_sub\_error\_code** - Sub error code returned by the server to help disambiguate why the request failed.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-338">**Microsoft\_ADAL\_spe\_ring** - Objašnjenje u obliku tačno/netačno koje ukazuje na to da li je korisnik koristio Secure Production Enterprise (samo za zasposlene u korporaciji Microsoft).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-338">**Microsoft\_ADAL\_spe\_ring** - True/false telling if the user was using the Secure Production Enterprise inner ring (Microsoft employees only).</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-339">**Microsoft\_ADAL\_start\_time** - Vreme kada je upućen poziv ADAL API</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-339">**Microsoft\_ADAL\_start\_time** – Time the ADAL API call was made</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-340">**Microsoft\_ADAL\_stop\_time** - Vreme kada je vraćen poziv ADAL API</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-340">**Microsoft\_ADAL\_stop\_time** - Time the ADAL API call returned</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-341">**Microsoft\_ADAL\_telemetry\_pii\_enabled** - Objašnjenje u obliku tačno/netačno koje ukazuje na to da li je omogućen potpuni telemetrijski ADAL režim.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-341">**Microsoft\_ADAL\_telemetry\_pii\_enabled** - True/false telling if ADAL full telemetry mode is enabled.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-342">Ime je pogrešno jer se ne emituje PII/EUII.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-342">The name is a misnomer, as no PII/EUII is emitted.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-343">**Microsoft\_ADAL\_tenant\_id** - GUID identifikacija zakupca kojoj autorizovani korisnika pripada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-343">**Microsoft\_ADAL\_tenant\_id** - GUID identifying the tenant that the authenticated user belongs to.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-344">**Microsoft\_ADAL\_token\_acquisition\_from\_context** - Opisuje kako se ponaša ADAL na osnovu tokena iz konteksta potvrde identiteta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-344">**Microsoft\_ADAL\_token\_acquisition\_from\_context** - Describes the ADAL behavior based on the tokens in the authentication context.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-345">**Microsoft\_ADAL\_token\_type** - Ili token za osvežavanje (RT) ili token za osvežavanje različitih resursa (MRRT).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-345">**Microsoft\_ADAL\_token\_type** – Either refresh token (RT) or multi-resource refresh token (MRRT).</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-346">**Microsoft\_ADAL\_ui\_event\_count** - Broj upita koji se prikazuju korisniku.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-346">**Microsoft\_ADAL\_ui\_event\_count** - Count of prompts shown to the user.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-347">Mogu biti i tihi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-347">May have been silent.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-348">**Microsoft\_ADAL\_user\_cancel** - Tačno/netačno ako je prozor korisničkog interfejsa otkazan.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-348">**Microsoft\_ADAL\_user\_cancel** - True / false if the user interface window was canceled.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-349">**Microsoft_ADAL_was_request_throttled** – True / false koji označava da li je ADAL ograničio ovaj događaj zbog previše zahteva.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-349">**Microsoft_ADAL_was_request_throttled** – True / false indicating if this event was throttled by ADAL due to too many requests.</span></span>
 
  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-350">**Microsoft\_ADAL\_x\_ms\_request\_id** - Dodatni zahtev koji je obezbedio ID za ADAL uslugu u HTTP zaglavlju.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-350">**Microsoft\_ADAL\_x\_ms\_request\_id** – Additional request ID provided in HTTP header to service by ADAL.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-351">**Platform** - Win32/WinRT/Android/iOS/Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-351">**Platform** - Win32/WinRT/Android/iOS/Mac</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-352">**Promptreasoncorrelationid** – Za upite, ovo je ID korelacije drugog događaja koji objašnjava zašto korisnik možda vidi upit za potvrdu identiteta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-352">**Promptreasoncorrelationid** – For prompts, this is the correlation id of another event which explains why the user might be seeing an authentication prompt.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-353">**Resource** – Resurs za koji korisnik zahteva token, kao što su Exchange ili SharePoint.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-353">**Resource** – The resource that the user is requesting a token for, such as Exchange or SharePoint.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-354">**Scenarioid** - GUID.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-354">**Scenarioid** – GUID.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-355">Različiti događaji mogu da pripadaju samo jednom scenariju, na primer on može da dodaje novi nalog, ali postoji više različitih upita koji se javljaju kao deo tog scenarija.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-355">Multiple events may belong to a single scenario, for example, the scenario may be adding a new account but there are multiple prompts that occur as part of that scenario.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-356">Ovaj ID omogućava da se korelacija dogodi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-356">This ID enables correlation to happen.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-357">**Scenarioname** – Ime scenarija kojem pripada ovaj događaj autentifikacije.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-357">**Scenarioname** – The name of the scenario that this authentication event belongs to.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-358">**Sessionid** - GUID identifikacija za pokretanje sesije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-358">**Sessionid** - GUID identifying the boot session</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-359">**Skdver** - Verzija SDK MATS klijenta koja se koristi za sačinjavanje ovih podataka</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-359">**Skdver** - Version of MATS client SDK used to produce this data</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-360">**Starttime** - Vreme kada je pozvana akcija\*pokretanja MATS API</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-360">**Starttime** - Time at which the Start\*Action MATS API was called</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-361">**Tenantid** - GUID identifikacija zakupca kojoj autorizovani korisnika pripada (u slučajevima kada to nije ADAL).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-361">**Tenantid** - GUID identifying the tenant the authenticated user belongs to (in non-ADAL cases).</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-362">**Uploadid** - Jedinstveni GUID za ovaj događaj koji se koristi za uklanjanje duplikata</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-362">**Uploadid** - Unique GUID for this event, used for de-duping</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-363">**Wamapi** - Određuje koji je WAM API pozvan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-363">**Wamapi** - Identifies which WAM API is called</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-364">**Wamtelemetrybatch** - Trenutno nekorišćeno.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-364">**Wamtelemetrybatch** - Currently unused.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-365">U budućnosti će omogućiti WAM komponenti da odašilje dodatne informacije koje se tiču događaja potvrde identiteta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-365">In the future, allows the WAM component to dispatch additional information regarding the authentication event.</span></span>


### <a name="officematsoneauthactionmicrosoftofficewin32"></a><span data-ttu-id="d6247-366">Office.MATS.OneAuth.ActionMicrosoftOfficeWin32</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-366">Office.MATS.OneAuth.ActionMicrosoftOfficeWin32</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-367">Microsoft Auth Telemetry System (MATS) se prikuplja kada Office pokuša da preuzme token potvrde identiteta, ili tiho ili putem upita.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-367">Microsoft Auth Telemetry System (MATS) is collected when Office attempts to acquire an authentication token, either silently or through prompting.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-368">Kada pokušaj preuzimanja ne uspe, šalju se i informacije o grešci.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-368">When acquisition attempts fail, error information is included.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-369">Ovi događaji pomažu korisnicima da izbegnu unošenje neispravne identifikacije tako što će:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-369">These events help our users avoid entering broken authentication states by:</span></span>

1) <span data-ttu-id="d6247-370">Utvrditi mogu li klijenti uspešno da nabave token za potvrdu identiteta iz usluge ili su prešli u stanje neispravne potvrde identiteta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-370">Identifying whether clients can successfully obtain an authentication token from the service, or have entered a broken authentication state.</span></span>

2) <span data-ttu-id="d6247-371">Proceniti da li su promene koje su se desile u klijentu ili uslugama dovele do kritičnih regresija u korisničkom iskustvu potvrde identiteta i pouzdanosti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-371">Evaluate when changes occur on the client or services, whether they result in critical regressions in the user's authentication experience and reliability</span></span>

3) <span data-ttu-id="d6247-372">Kada dođe do greške, ovi signali emituju bitne kodove grešaka odgovornih komponenata (kôd Office klijenta, biblioteke potvrde identiteta, upravne usluge) i mogu se koristiti za trijažu, dijagnozu i ublažavanje.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-372">When failures occur, these signals emit important failure codes from the responsible component (Office client code, authentication libraries, or authority services) which can be used for triage, diagnosis and mitigation</span></span>

4) <span data-ttu-id="d6247-373">Ovi signali napajaju razne spremnosti otpreme i nadgledanja ispravnosti koja šalju upozorenja da bi naši inženjeri mogli brzo da odreaguju i da smanje vreme ublažavanja kritičnih grešaka.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-373">These signals power various ship readiness and health monitors, which fire alerts so our engineers can engage quickly and reduce the time to mitigation of critical failures.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-374">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-374">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-375">**Accounttype** – vrsta naloga koji se koristi za taj događaj potvrde identiteta, na primer, potrošački ili organizacijski.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-375">**Accounttype** - Type of the account used for this authentication event, for example, consumer or organizational.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-376">**ActionName** – neslužbeni naziv za taj događaj, ako je naveden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-376">**Actionname** - Friendly name for this event, if one was provided.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-377">**Actiontype** – određuje vrstu korišćene biblioteke za potvrdu identiteta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-377">**Actiontype** - Specifies the type of authentication library in use.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-378">**Appaudience** - da li je aplikacija napravljena za internu ili spoljnu upotrebu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-378">**Appaudience** - Is the app build for internal or external use</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-379">**Appforcedprompt** - da li aplikacija poništava keš i nameće pojavljivanje upita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-379">**Appforcedprompt** - Did the app override cache and force a prompt to be shown</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-380">**Appname** - ime aplikacije koja potvrđuje identitet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-380">**Appname** - Name of the application doing authentication</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-381">**Appver** - verzija aplikacije koja potvrđuje identitet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-381">**Appver** - Version of the application doing authentication</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-382">**Askedforcreds** - da li aplikacija traži od korisnika da unese akreditive za ovu radnju</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-382">**Askedforcreds** - Did the application ask the user to enter credentials for this action</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-383">**Authoutcome** - da li je pokušaj potvrde identiteta uspešan, neuspešan ili otkazan.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-383">**Authoutcome** - Did the authentication attempt succeed, fail, or was canceled</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-384">**Blockingprompt** - da li aplikacija izbacuje upit koji zahteva interakciju korisnika</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-384">**Blockingprompt** -  Did the application throw a prompt requiring user interaction</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-385">**Correlationid** – identifikator koji se upotrebljava za spajanje podataka o ovom pojedinačnom događaju sa servisnim podacima</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-385">**Correlationid** - Identifier used to join information regarding this individual event with services data</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-386">**Count** – ukupan broj grupisanih radnji prijavljenih u ovom jednom događaju podataka.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-386">**Count** - The total number of aggregated actions reported in this one data event.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-387">**Devicenetworkstate** – označava je li uređaj povezan s internetom.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-387">**Devicenetworkstate** - Is the device connected to the internet.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-388">**Deviceprofiletelemetryid** – anonimni ID uređaja koji se koristi za merenje iskustva autentičnosti i pouzdanosti uređaja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-388">**Deviceprofiletelemetryid** - Anonymous device ID used to measure device-wide authentication experience and reliability.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-389">**Duration** - Koliko vremena je bilo potrebno za potvrdu identiteta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-389">**Duration** - How long the authentication took</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-390">**duration_max** – maksimalno trajanje bilo kojeg od grupisanih događaja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-390">**duration_max** - Max duration of any one of the aggregated events</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-391">**duration_min** – min trajanje bilo kojeg od grupisanih događaja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-391">**duration_min** - Min duration of any one of the aggregated events</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-392">**duration_sum** – zbir trajanja svih grupisanih događaja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-392">**duration_sum** - Sum of the duration of all the aggregated events</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-393">**endtime** – vreme završetka događaja potvrde identiteta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-393">**endtime** - When the authentication event ended</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-394">**error** – kôd greške ako potvrda identiteta nije uspela</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-394">**error** - Error code if the authentication failed</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-395">**errordescription** – kratak opis greške</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-395">**errordescription** - Brief description of the error</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-396">**errorsource** – da li je došlo do greške u usluzi, biblioteci potvrde identiteta ili aplikaciji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-396">**errorsource** - Did the error come from service, authentication library, or application</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-397">**eventtype** – izveštava li ovaj događaja o tački podataka potvrde identiteta ili događaju greške kvaliteta podataka.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-397">**eventtype** - Is this event reporting an authentication datapoint, or a data quality error event.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-398">Koristi se za merenje kvaliteta podataka.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-398">Used to measure data quality.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-399">**from_cache** – Bulov izraz koji predstavlja je li zapis iz keš memorije jezgra WAM-a ili dodatak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-399">**from_cache** - Boolean representing whether the record is from the WAM core cache, or the plugin</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-400">**hasadaltelemetry** – označava da li je Azure Active Directory biblioteka potvrde identiteta (ADAL) obezbedila telemetriju za ovaj događaj.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-400">**hasadaltelemetry** - Indicates whether the Azure Active Directory Authentication Library (ADAL) provided telemetry for this event.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-401">**Identityservice** - Da li je aktiviran nalog Microsoft usluge (MSA) ili usluge Azure Active Directory (AAD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-401">**Identityservice** - Was Microsoft Service Account (MSA) or Azure Active Directory (AAD) service invoked</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-402">**Interactiveauthcontainer** - Koji tip upita je prikazan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-402">**Interactiveauthcontainer** - What type of prompt was shown</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-403">**Issilent** – označava je li prikazan upit ili je to bio tihi (pozadinski) događaj potvrde identiteta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-403">**Issilent** - Was a prompt shown or was this a silent (background) authentication event.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-404">**Microsoft_ADAL_adal_version** – verzija biblioteke Azure Active Directory Authentication Library (ADAL)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-404">**Microsoft_ADAL_adal_version** - Version of the Azure Active Directory Authentication Library (ADAL)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-405">**Microsoft_ADAL_api_error_code** – šifra greške koju je biblioteka za potvrdu identiteta poslala za ovaj pokušaj potvrde identiteta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-405">**Microsoft_ADAL_api_error_code** - Error code emitted by authentication library for this authentication attempt</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-406">**Microsoft_ADAL_api_id** – API koji je pozvan za taj pokušaj potvrde identiteta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-406">**Microsoft_ADAL_api_id** - API invoked for this authentication attempt</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-407">**Microsoft_ADAL_application_name** – naziv aplikacije/procesa koji koristi ADAL.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-407">**Microsoft_ADAL_application_name** - The name of the application / process using ADAL.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-408">**Microsoft_ADAL_application_version** – verzija aplikacije koja koristi ADAL.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-408">**Microsoft_ADAL_application_version** - The version of the application using ADAL.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-409">**Microsoft_ADAL_authority** – URL izdavaoca certifikata za Azure Active Directory koji je odgovoran za potvrdu identiteta korisnika</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-409">**Microsoft_ADAL_authority** - Azure Active Directory authority URL responsible for authenticating the user</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-410">**Microsoft_ADAL_authority_type** – potrošački / Microsoft ugovor o usluzi (MSA) ili organizacijski / Azure Active Directory (AAD); trenutno uvek AAD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-410">**Microsoft_ADAL_authority_type** - Consumer / Microsoft Service Agreement (MSA) vs organizational / Azure Active Directory (AAD); currently always AAD</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-411">**Microsoft_ADAL_authority_validation_status**– označava da li je potvrda identiteta sprovedena na strani usluge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-411">**Microsoft_ADAL_authority_validation_status** - Tells whether authentication completed on the service-side</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-412">**Microsoft_ADAL_broker_app** – označava da li je ADAL koriš'en kao posrednik za proveru identiteta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-412">**Microsoft_ADAL_broker_app** - Tells whether ADAL used a broker for authentication</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-413">**Microsoft_ADAL_broker_app_used** – označava naziv posrednika (npr. Windows Account Management)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-413">**Microsoft_ADAL_broker_app_used** - Tells the name of the broker (for example, Windows Account Management)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-414">**Microsoft_ADAL_broker_version** – označava verziju posrednika ako se koristi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-414">**Microsoft_ADAL_broker_version** - Tells the version of the broker if used</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-415">**Microsoft_ADAL_cache_event_count** – broj događaja keš memorije koje je ADAL sproveo tokom preuzimanja tokena</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-415">**Microsoft_ADAL_cache_event_count** - Number of cache events ADAL performed while retrieving token</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-416">**Microsoft_ADAL_cache_event_count_max** – ako je signal grupni, označava maksimalni broj događaja keš memorije za bilo koji grupni događaj</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-416">**Microsoft_ADAL_cache_event_count_max** - If this signal is aggregated, max cache events of any one of the aggregated events</span></span>
