- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-493">**MSAL_auth_flow** – koraci koje je MSAL pokušao za vreme tog toka potvrde identiteta (AT, PRT, LRT, FRT, ART, IRT).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-493">**MSAL_auth_flow** - Steps MSAL attempted during this authentication flow (AT, PRT, LRT, FRT, ART, IRT).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-494">Odvojen simbolom uspravne crte "|" za jednostavno raščlanjivanje.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-494">Separated by the pipe "|" symbol for easy parsing.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-495">**MSAL_auth_flow_last_error** – šifra greške koji smo primili sa servera od druge do zadnje stavke u AuthFlowu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-495">**MSAL_auth_flow_last_error** - Error code we received from the server on the second to last item in AuthFlow.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-496">(Prim.: If AuthFlow = „PRT|LRT ", greška PRT-a bila bi u AuthFlowLastError).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-496">(Ex: if AuthFlow = "PRT|LRT", PRT's error would be in AuthFlowLastError).</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-497">**MSAL_authority_type** – označava je li ovaj zahtev za korisnika bio u: AAD, spoljašnji ili MSA.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-497">**MSAL_authority_type** - Was this request for a user in: AAD, Federated, or MSA.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-498">**MSAL_broker_app_used** – označava je li u ovom toku potvrde identiteta korišćena aplikacija posrednika.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-498">**MSAL_broker_app_used** - Was a broker app used in this auth flow.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-499">**MSAL_client_id** – ID klijenta aplikacije za pozivanje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-499">**MSAL_client_id** - Client ID of the calling application</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-500">**MSAL_correlation_id** – jedinstveni GUID za taj događaj, koji se upotrebljava za pridruživanje radnjama u evidencijama klijenta, servera i aplikacija.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-500">**MSAL_correlation_id** - Unique GUID for this event, used to join actions across client, server, and app logs.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-501">**MSAL_delete_token** – popis tokena koji su izbrisani iz keš memorije za vreme tog toka potvrde identiteta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-501">**MSAL_delete_token** - List of tokens that were deleted from cache during this authentication flow.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-502">**MSAL_http_call_count** – broj HTTP poziva koje je MSAL izvršio za vreme toka potvrde identiteta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-502">**MSAL_http_call_count** - Number of HTTP calls MSAL made during the authentication flow.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-503">**MSAL_is_successful** – označava je li tok potvrde identiteta bio uspešan.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-503">**MSAL_is_successful** - Was the authentication flow successful.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-504">**MSAL_last_http_response_code** – ako je MSAL izvršio jedan ili više HTTP poziva, to je zadnji kôd odgovora HTTP-a koji smo primili.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-504">**MSAL_last_http_response_code** - If MSAL made one or more HTTP call(s), this is the last HTTP response code we received.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-505">**MSAL_msal_version** – označava niz verzije MSAL, oblik X. X. X + („OneAuth“, „local" ili izvršite raspršivanje).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-505">**MSAL_msal_version** - MSAL's version string, format X.X.X+("OneAuth", "local", or a commit hash).</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-506">**MSAL_read_token** – tokeni koji su se pročitali iz keš memorije (AT, ART, FRT, LRT, IRT, PRT, EAT [EAT = AT koji je istekao je pročitan, ali odbačen]).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-506">**MSAL_read_token** - Tokens that were read from cache (AT, ART, FRT, LRT, IRT, PRT, EAT [EAT = Expired AT was read, but discarded]).</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-507">**MSAL_read_token_last_error** – ako je MSAL naišla na grešku prilikom čitanja keš memorije, ovde ćemo skladištiti informacije.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-507">**MSAL_read_token_last_error** - If MSAL encountered an error reading from cache, we'll store info here.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-508">(Primer: greška čitanja diska iz OS-a, Keychain greška na macOS-u).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-508">(Ex: Disk read error bubbled from OS, Keychain error on macOS).</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-509">**MSAL_request_duration** – označava koliko je zahtevu trebalo vremena od kada je pozvan API najvišeg nivoa MSAL-a do vraćanja rezultata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-509">**MSAL_request_duration** - How long the request took from when MSAL's top-level API was called, until we returned a result.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-510">**MSAL_request_id** – ID zahteva za zadnji poziv koji smo uneli u Microsoft uslugu sigurnog tokena.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-510">**MSAL_request_id** - Request ID for the last call we made to Microsoft's secure token service.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-511">**MSAL_server_error_code** – označava numeričku šifru greške Microsoft usluge sigurnog tokena ako smo ga primili.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-511">**MSAL_server_error_code** - Microsoft specific secure token service numeric error code if we received one.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-512">**MSAL_server_spe_ring** – informacije o krugu produkcijskog korporacijskog okruženja Microsoft servisa sigurnog tokena, ako smo ga primili.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-512">**MSAL_server_spe_ring** - Microsoft secure token service's Secure Production Enterprise ring info if we received it.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-513">**MSAL_server_suberror_code** – niz podšifre greške Microsoft usluge sigurnog tokena, ako smo je primili.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-513">**MSAL_server_suberror_code** - Microsoft specific secure token service suberror code string if we received one.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-514">**MSAL_start_time** – označava vreme pokretanja zahteva MSALA-a na javnom API-ju najvišeg nivoa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-514">**MSAL_start_time** - Time MSAL request was started at the top-level public API.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-515">**MSAL_stop_time** označava vreme u kojem je MSAL dovršila obradu zahteva i vratila rezultat pozivaocu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-515">**MSAL_stop_time** - Time MSAL finished processing the request and returned a result to the caller.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-516">**MSAL_tenant_id** – označava Microsoft GUID koji prepoznaje klijenta u kojem postoji korisnik.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-516">**MSAL_tenant_id** - Microsoft GUID identifying the tenant the user exists in.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-517">**MSAL_ui_event_count** – označava broj upita korisničkog interfejsa MSAL-a prikazan na ekranu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-517">**MSAL_ui_event_count** - Number of UI prompts MSAL displayed on screen.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-518">**MSAL_wam_telemetry** – sadrži skup WAM telemetrijskih podataka u nizu JSON koji će se raščlaniti i pretvoriti u polja u ovom dokumentu koja potiču iz WAM-a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-518">**MSAL_wam_telemetry** - Contains a batch of WAM telemetry data in a JSON string that will be parsed and converted to the fields in this document that are sourced from WAM.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-519">**MSAL_was_request_throttled** – tačno ako je MSAL ograničila ovaj zahtev i sprečila ga da napadne mrežu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-519">**MSAL_was_request_throttled** - True if MSAL throttled this request and prevented it from hitting network.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-520">Ako je ovo ikad tačno, u aplikaciji za pozivanje najverovatnije se nalazi petlja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-520">If this is ever true, there is most likely a loop in the calling app.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-521">**MSAL_write_token** – tokeni koji su pisani u keš memoriji (AT, ART, FRT, LRT, IRT, PRT, EAT [EAT = AT koji je istekao je pročitan, ali odbačen]).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-521">**MSAL_write_token** - Tokens that were written to cache (AT, ART, FRT, LRT, IRT, PRT, EAT [EAT = Expired AT was read, but discarded]).</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-522">**MSAL_read_token_last_error** – ako je MSAL naišla na grešku prilikom pisanja u keš memoriju, ovde ćemo skladištiti informacije.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-522">**MSAL_write_token_last_error** - If MSAL encountered an error writing to cache, we'll store info here.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-523">(Primer: greška čitanja diska iz OS-a, Keychain greška na macOS-u).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-523">(Ex: Disk read error bubbled from OS, Keychain error on macOS).</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-524">**oneauth_api** – API za OneAuth koji je pozvan za taj pokušaj potvrde identiteta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-524">**oneauth_api** - OneAuth API invoked for this authentication attempt.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-525">**oneauth_transactionuploadid** – GUID koji određuje pojedinačni poziv API-ja za OneAuth.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-525">**oneauth_transactionuploadid** - GUID specifying an individual call to the OneAuth API.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-526">**oneauth_version** – verzija SDK-a za OneAuth.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-526">**oneauth_version** - The version of the OneAuth SDK.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-527">**Platform** – označava platformu OS-a (0: Windows Desktop; 1: Android; 2: iOS; 3: MacOS; 4: UWP)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-527">**Platform** - OS Platform (0: Windows Desktop, 1: Android, 2: iOS, 3: macOS, 4: UWP)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-528">**Promptreasoncorrelationid** – označava identifikator korelacije koji se može upotrebljavati za traženje prethodnog događaja potvrde identiteta, koji se upotrebljava za objašnjenje zašto je korisnik zatražio potvrdu identiteta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-528">**Promptreasoncorrelationid** - A correlation identifier that can be used to look up a previous authentication event, which is used to explain why the user was prompted to authenticate.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-529">**Resource** – označava resurs za koji se traži token.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-529">**Resource** - The resource for which a token is requested.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-530">**Scenarioid** – Veći broj događaja može pripadati jednom scenariju, npr. scenarij možda dodaje novi nalog, ali u sklopu tog scenarija postoji više upita.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-530">**Scenarioid** - Multiple events may belong to a single scenario, for example, the scenario may be adding a new account but there are multiple prompts that occur as part of that scenario.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-531">Ovaj identifikator omogućuje korelaciju tih povezanih događaja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-531">This identifier enables correlation of those related events.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-532">**Scenarioname** – označava naziv scenarija aplikacije u kojem je bila potrebna potvrda identiteta, na primer prvo pokretanje, provera licenciranja, itd.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-532">**Scenarioname** - Name of the application scenario where authentication was required, for example, first-boot, licensing check, etc.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-533">**Scope** – označava opseg pretraživanja za koji se traži token.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-533">**Scope** - The scope for which a token is requested.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-534">**Sdkver** – označava verziju biblioteke Microsoft Auth Telemetry System koja se upotrebljava za izradu tih podataka</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-534">**Sdkver** - Version of Microsoft Auth Telemetry System library used to produce this data</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-535">**SessionId** – označava identifikator sesije pokretanja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-535">**Sessionid** - Identifier for the boot session</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-536">**Starttime** – vreme kada je započeo događaj potvrde identiteta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-536">**Starttime** - Time at which the authentication event began.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-537">**Tenantid** – GUID koji označava klijent kojem korisnik proverene autentičnosti pripada (u slučajevima koji nisu ADAL)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-537">**Tenantid** - GUID identifying the tenant the authenticated user belongs to (in non-ADAL cases)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-538">**Uploadid** – Jedinstveni GUID za ovaj događaj koji se koristi za uklanjanje duplikata</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-538">**Uploadid** - Unique GUID for this event, used for de-duping</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-539">**wamapi** – određuje koji će se API za Windows Web Account Management (WAM) pozvati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-539">**wamapi** - Identifies which Windows Web Account Management (WAM) API is called</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-540">**wamtelemetrybatch** – trenutno se ne koristi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-540">**wamtelemetrybatch** - Currently unused.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-541">Ubuduće će komponenti WAM omogućiti slanje dodatnih informacija o događaju potvrde identiteta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-541">In the future, allows the WAM component to dispatch additional information regarding the authentication event</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-542">**WAM_account_join_on_end** – stanje pridruživanja naloga na kraju operacije WAM.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-542">**WAM_account_join_on_end** - Account join state at the end of a WAM operation.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="d6247-543">Moguće vrednosti: „primary", „secondary“, „not_joined"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-543">Possible values: “primary”, “secondary”, “not_joined”</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-544">**WAM_account_join_on_start** – stanje pridruživanja naloga na početku operacije WAM.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-544">**WAM_account_join_on_start** - Account join state at the start of a WAM operation.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="d6247-545">Moguće vrednosti: „primary", „secondary“, „not_joined"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-545">Possible values: “primary”, “secondary”, “not_joined”</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-546">**WAM_api_error_code** – ako je došlo do odgovora na grešku iz dodatka AAD WAM, to će polje postojati i sadržaće tu šifru greške</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-546">**WAM_api_error_code** - If an error response came from the AAD WAM plugin, this field will exist and will contain that error code</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-547">**WAM_authority** – niz koji sadrži URL autoriteta – to bi trebalo da bude login.windows.net korišćena kranja tačka</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-547">**WAM_authority** - String containing the authority url—this should be the login.windows.net endpoint used</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-548">**WAM_broker_version** – prisutno kada se upotrebljava WAM, ovo je niz verzije posrednika</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-548">**WAM_broker_version** - Present if WAM was used, this is the broker version string</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-549">**WAM_cache_event_count** – označava broj događaja keš memorije u WAM-u unutar operacije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-549">**WAM_cache_event_count** - The number of WAM cache events within the operation</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-550">**WAM_client_id** – identifikator za pridruživanje sa podacima usluge, time se označava klijentska aplikacija.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-550">**WAM_client_id** - Identifier for joining with services data, this identifies the client application.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-551">**WAM_correlation_id** – identifikator za pridruživanje događajima sa podacima usluge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-551">**WAM_correlation_id** - Identifier for joining events with services data</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-552">**WAM_device_join** – označava stanje pridruživanja uređaja; moguće vrednosti su „aadj", „haadj"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-552">**WAM_device_join** - The device join state; possible values are “aadj”, “haadj”</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-553">**WAM_network_event_count** – prisutno ako se dogodio najmanje jedan mrežni poziv; broj mrežnih poziva na uslugu za tu operaciju WAM</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-553">**WAM_network_event_count** - Present if at least one network call happened; the number of network calls to the service for that WAM operation</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-554">**WAM_network_status** – prisutno ako se dogodio najmanje jedan mrežni poziv, sadrži šifru greške HTTP-a ako mrežni zahtev nije uspeo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-554">**WAM_network_status** - Present if at least one network call happened, contains an HTTP error code if the network request failed.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-555">**WAM_idp** – određuje je li korišćen WAM potrošački ili organizacijski dodatak za potvrdu identiteta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-555">**WAM_idp** - Specifies if the WAM consumer or organizational auth plugin was used.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-556">**WAM_is_cached** – određuje je li odgovor koji je pružio WAM preuzet iz keš memorije.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-556">**WAM_is_cached** - Specifies if the response provided by WAM was retrieved from cache.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-557">**WAM_oauth_error_code** – sadrži šifru greške koju je usluga vratila kao deo protokola oauth.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-557">**WAM_oauth_error_code** - Contains the error code returned by the service as part of the oauth protocol.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-558">**WAM_prompt_behavior** – određuje je li ovaj upit zatražila aplikacija, ili, može li ovaj zahtev preskočiti pitanja ako može neprimetno potvrditi identitet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-558">**WAM_prompt_behavior** - Specifies if this prompt is forced by the app, or, if this request might skip prompting if it can silently authenticate.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-559">**WAM_provider_id** – Određuje Microsoftu krajnju tačku za ustanovu koja se koristi za scenarij potvrde identiteta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-559">**WAM_provider_id** - Specifies the Microsoft endpoint for the authority in use for the auth scenario.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-560">**WAM_redirect_uri** – URI za preusmeravanje registrovan za aplikaciju u usluzi Azure Active Directory.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-560">**WAM_redirect_uri** - The redirect URI registered for the application in Azure Active Directory.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-561">**WAM_resource** – označava resurs za koji se traži token.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-561">**WAM_resource**  - The resource for which a token is requested.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-562">**WAM_server_error_code** – šifra greške koju je usluga vratila u WAM.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-562">**WAM_server_error_code** - The error code returned by the service to WAM.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-563">**WAM_server_sub_code** – dodatna šifra greške koja se upotrebljava za daljnje razbijanje uzroka kvara koji je vratila usluga.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-563">**WAM_server_sub_code** - An additional error code used to further break down the causes for failure, returned by the service.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-564">**WAM_silent_code** – šifra greške koja je naišla na tihi interni pokušaj WAM-a, pre nego što pošalje upit korisniku.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-564">**WAM_silent_code** - The error code encountered by the internal silent attempt WAM makes, prior to prompting the user.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-565">**WAM_silent_mats** – označava neiskorišćeno.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-565">**WAM_silent_mats** - Unused.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-566">**WAM_silent_message** – označava poruku o grešci povezanu sa unutrašnjim tihim pokušajima WAM-a, pre nego što pošalje upit korisniku.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-566">**WAM_silent_message** - The error message associated with the internal silent attempt WAM makes, prior to prompting the user.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-567">**WAM_silent_status** – označava status uspeha/neuspeha za tihi interni pokušaj WAM-a, pre nego što pošalje upit korisniku.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-567">**WAM_silent_status** - The success/fail status for the internal silent attempt WAM makes, prior to prompting the user.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-568">**WAM_tenant_id** – identifikator za klijenta kojem pripada korisnik proverene AAD autentičnosti, ako ga vraća usluga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-568">**WAM_tenant_id** - An identifier for the tenant the authenticated AAD user belongs to, if returned by the service</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-569">**WAM_ui_visible** – prisutno ako je korisniku prikazan najmanje jedan prozor korisničkog interfejsa, bilo ‘true’ ili ‘false’</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-569">**WAM_ui_visible** - Present if at least one UI window was shown to the user, either ‘true’ or ‘false’</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-570">**WAM_x_ms_clitelem** – prisutno ako usluga vrati zaglavlje “x-ms-clitelem"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-570">**WAM_x_ms_clitelem** - Present if service returns header “x-ms-clitelem"</span></span>


### <a name="officematsoneauthtransactionmicrosoftofficewin32"></a><span data-ttu-id="d6247-571">Office.MATS.OneAuth.TransactionMicrosoftOfficeWin32</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-571">Office.MATS.OneAuth.TransactionMicrosoftOfficeWin32</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-572">Microsoft Auth Telemetry System (MATS) se prikuplja kada Office pokuša da preuzme token potvrde identiteta, ili tiho ili putem upita.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-572">Microsoft Auth Telemetry System (MATS) is collected when Office attempts to acquire an authentication token, either silently or through prompting.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-573">Ovaj je događaj nadređen jednom ili više ActionMicrosoftOffice događaja, što omogućava grupisanje povezanih događaja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-573">This event is a parent of one or more ActionMicrosoftOffice events, allowing related events to be grouped together.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-574">Ovi događaji pomažu korisnicima da izbegnu unošenje neispravne identifikacije tako što će:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-574">These events help our users avoid entering broken authentication states by:</span></span>

1) <span data-ttu-id="d6247-575">Utvrditi mogu li klijenti uspešno da nabave token za potvrdu identiteta iz usluge ili su prešli u stanje neispravne potvrde identiteta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-575">Identifying whether clients can successfully obtain an authentication token from the service, or have entered a broken authentication state.</span></span>

2) <span data-ttu-id="d6247-576">Proceniti da li su promene koje su se desile u klijentu ili uslugama dovele do kritičnih regresija u korisničkom iskustvu potvrde identiteta i pouzdanosti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-576">Evaluate when changes occur on the client or services, whether they result in critical regressions in the user's authentication experience and reliability</span></span>

3) <span data-ttu-id="d6247-577">Kada dođe do greške, ovi signali emituju bitne kodove grešaka odgovornih komponenata (kôd Office klijenta, biblioteke potvrde identiteta, upravne usluge) i mogu se koristiti za trijažu, dijagnozu i ublažavanje.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-577">When failures occur, these signals emit important failure codes from the responsible component (Office client code, authentication libraries, or authority services) which can be used for triage, diagnosis and mitigation</span></span>

4) <span data-ttu-id="d6247-578">Ovi signali napajaju razne spremnosti otpreme i nadgledanja ispravnosti koja šalju upozorenja da bi naši inženjeri mogli brzo da odreaguju i da smanje vreme ublažavanja kritičnih grešaka.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-578">These signals power various ship readiness and health monitors, which fire alerts so our engineers can engage quickly and reduce the time to mitigation of critical failures.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-579">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-579">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-580">**Actiontype** – „oneauthtransaction" je jedina vrednost.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-580">**Actiontype** - "oneauthtransaction" is the only value.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-581">**Appaudience** –označava ciljnu skupinu aplikacije (automatizacija, pred proizvodnja ili proizvodnja)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-581">**Appaudience** - Application audience (Automation, Preproduction, or Production)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-582">**Appname** – označava naziv aplikacije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-582">**Appname** - App name</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-583">**Appver**– označava verziju aplikacije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-583">**Appver** - App version</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-584">**Authoutcome** - da li je pokušaj potvrde identiteta uspešan, neuspešan ili otkazan.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-584">**Authoutcome** - Did the authentication attempt succeed, fail, or was canceled</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-585">**Correlationid** – identifikator koji se upotrebljava za spajanje podataka o ovom pojedinačnom događaju sa servisnim podacima</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-585">**Correlationid** - Identifier used to join information regarding this individual event with services data</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-586">**Count** – označava koliko je puta došlo do greške</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-586">**Count** - Number of times the error occurred</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-587">**Devicenetworkstate** – stanje mreže uređaja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-587">**Devicenetworkstate** - Device network state</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-588">**Deviceprofilatelemetryid** – ID telemetrije profila uređaja (niz koji koristi MATS za određivanje određenog uređaja)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-588">**Deviceprofiletelemetryid** - Device profile telemetry ID (string used by MATS to identify a specific device)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-589">**duration_max** – označava minimalno trajanje, u milisekundama, transakcija koje se skupljaju na tom signalu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-589">**duration_max** - Minimum duration, in milliseconds, of the transactions aggregated on this signal.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-590">**duration_min** – označava maksimalno trajanje, u milisekundama, transakcija koje se skupljaju na tom signalu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-590">**duration_min** - Maximum duration, in milliseconds, of the transactions aggregated on this signal.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-591">**duration_sum** – označava zbir trajanja transakcija koje se skupljaju na tom signalu u milisekundama.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-591">**duration_sum** - Sum of durations, in milliseconds, of the transactions aggregated on this signal.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-592">**Endtime** – označava vreme u kojem se završila transakcija OneAuth.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-592">**Endtime** - Time at which the OneAuth transaction ended.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-593">**Error** – OneAuth kôd statusa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-593">**Error** - OneAuth status code.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-594">**Eventtype** – označava vrstu događaja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-594">**Eventtype** - Event type</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-595">**Issilent** – False ako je prikazano korisničko interfejs; true ako je reč o događaju u pozadini.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-595">**Issilent** - False if UI was shown; true if it was a background event.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-596">**oneauth_api** – određuje javni API za OneAuth koji je pozvan.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-596">**oneauth_api** - Specifies the public API of OneAuth that was invoked.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-597">**oneauth_Domain** – ako je poziv API-ja uzrokovao grešku, to je sistemski domen te greške.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-597">**oneauth_Domain** - If the API call resulted in an error, this is the system domain of that error.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-598">**oneauth_ErrorCode** – šifra greške koja predstavlja interno stanje greške za OneAuth.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-598">**oneauth_ErrorCode** - Error code representing the internal error state for OneAuth.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-599">Zamenjuje staro polje oneauth_errortag field.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-599">Replaces the old oneauth_errortag field.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-600">**oneauth_errortag** – numerički identifikator za red kôda koji je odgovoran za generisanje greške.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-600">**oneauth_errortag** - Numerical identifier for a line of code that was responsible for generating an error.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-601">**oneauth_ExecutionFlow** – niz oznaka koje identifikuju put koda koji je preuzeo ovaj API.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-601">**oneauth_ExecutionFlow** - A series of tags identifying the codepath this API invocation took.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-602">**oneauth_internalerror** – šifra greške koja predstavlja interno stanje greške za OneAuth.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-602">**oneauth_internalerror** - Error code representing the internal error state for OneAuth.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-603">**oneauth_ServerErrorCode** – greška servera vraćena u OneAuth po završetku tog poziva API-ja, ako se naiđe na nju.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-603">**oneauth_ServerErrorCode** - The server error returned to OneAuth at the conclusion of this API call, if one was encountered.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-604">**oneauth_SystemErrorCode** – sistemska greška vraćena u OneAuth po završetku tog poziva API-ja, ako se naiđe na nju.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-604">**oneauth_SystemErrorCode** - The system error returned to OneAuth at the conclusion of this API call, if one was encountered.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-605">**oneauth_Tag** – oznaka OneAuth koja označava konačno mesto u kodu postignuto na kraju ovog poziva API-ja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-605">**oneauth_Tag** - The OneAuth tag designating the final place in code reached at the conclusion of this API call.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-606">**oneauth_transactionuploadid** – određuje nasumično generisani interni GUID koji se preslikava na određeno pozivanje OneAuth API-ja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-606">**oneauth_transactionuploadid** - Specifies the randomly generated internal GUID that maps to the specific invocation of a OneAuth API.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-607">**oneauth_version** – verzija SDK-a za OneAuth.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-607">**oneauth_version** - The version of the OneAuth SDK.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-608">**Platform** – OS (0: Win32; 1: Android; 2: iOS; 3: MacOS; 4: WinRT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-608">**Platform** - OS Platform (0: Win32, 1: Android, 2: iOS, 3: macOS, 4: WinRT</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-609">**Scenarioname** – naziv scenarija za koji je potrebna potvrda identiteta, a određuje ga aplikacija za pozivanje.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-609">**Scenarioname** - Name of the scenario for which auth is necessary, specified by the calling application.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-610">**Schemaver**– označava verziju šeme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-610">**Schemaver** - Schema Version</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-611">**Sdkver** – označava verziju SDK-a MATS-a</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-611">**Sdkver** - Version of the MATS sdk</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-612">**Sessionid** – označava ID sesije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-612">**Sessionid** - Session ID</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-613">**severityError** – označava ozbiljnost</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-613">**severityError** - severity</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-614">**startime** – označava vreme u kojem je započela transakcija OneAuth.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-614">**starttime** - Time at which the OneAuth transaction began.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-615">**Timestamp** – označava vremensku oznaku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-615">**Timestamp** - Timestamp</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-616">**Type** – označava vrstu greške</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-616">**Type** - Error type</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-617">**Uploaded** – Jedinstveni identifikator za ovaj određeni događaj, u svrhe uklanjanja duplikata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-617">**Uploaded** - Unique identifier for this particular event, for de-duping purposes.</span></span>


### <a name="onenotesigninssoexternalappsaccountfound"></a><span data-ttu-id="d6247-618">OneNote.SignIn.SSOExternalAppsAccountFound</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-618">OneNote.SignIn.SSOExternalAppsAccountFound</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="d6247-619">Ovaj događaj se evidentira kada se na listi naloga, koju obezbeđuje TokenSharingManager, nalazi nalog sa važećim tokenom osvežavanja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-619">This event is logged when an account with a valid refresh token is found among the list of accounts provided by TokenSharingManager.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="d6247-620">Ovaj slučaj je specifičan za jedinstveno prijavljivanje (SSO).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-620">This scenario is specific to Single Sign-on (SSO).</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-622">**AccountType** - Evidentira tip naloga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-622">**AccountType** - Logs the type of account</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-627">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-627">The following fields are collected:</span></span>
 
- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-628">**RawError** - Evidentira neobrađenu grešku dobijenu prilikom pokušaja pribavljanja tokena osvežavanja za dati nalog</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-628">**RawError** - Logs the raw error obtained when attempting to get a refresh token with the given account</span></span>

### <a name="onenotestickynotesfetchtokencompleted"></a><span data-ttu-id="d6247-629">OneNote.StickyNotes.FetchTokenCompleted</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-629">OneNote.StickyNotes.FetchTokenCompleted</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-633">**Result** - Evidentira rezultat pokušaja preuzimanja tokena</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-633">**Result** - Logs the result of token fetching attempt</span></span>

## <a name="click-to-run-events"></a><span data-ttu-id="d6247-635">Događaji „Klikni i pokreni“</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-635">Click-to-Run events</span></span>

### <a name="officeclicktorunbootstrapper"></a><span data-ttu-id="d6247-636">Office.ClickToRun.Bootstrapper</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-636">Office.ClickToRun.Bootstrapper</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-637">Podešavanje sistema Office i prikupljanje podataka o zalihama kada korisnik pokreće Office setup.exe da bi izmenio svoje instalirane Office proizvode.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-637">Office set up and inventory data collected when the user is running Office setup.exe to modify their installed Office products.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-638">Koristi se za merenje uspeha / neuspeha instalacije sistema Office koju je u potpunosti započeo korisnik, uključujući i preduslovne provere.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-638">Used to measure success / failure of a full user-initiated Office installation including pre-requisite checks.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-639">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-639">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-640">**Data\_BootStrapperStateFailure\_ErrorCode** - Kôd greške koji nismo uspeli da sredimo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-640">**Data\_BootStrapperStateFailure\_ErrorCode** – The error code we failed with</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-641">**Data\_BootStrapperStateFailure\_ErrorSource** - Funkcija koju nismo uspeli da sredimo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-641">**Data\_BootStrapperStateFailure\_ErrorSource** – The function we failed in</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-642">**Data\_BootStrapperStateFailure\_FailingState** - Deo koji nismo uspeli da sredimo u boostrapperbootstrapper-u</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-642">**Data\_BootStrapperStateFailure\_FailingState** – The part that we failed in the boostrapperbootstrapper</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-643">**Data\_BootStrapperStateFailure\_OExceptionType** - Vrsta izuzetka koji nismo uspeli da sredimo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-643">**Data\_BootStrapperStateFailure\_OExceptionType** – The type of exception we failed with</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-644">**Data\_Culture** - Jezičke postavke kojima pokrećemo exe datoteku, npr. en-us</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-644">**Data\_Culture** - the culture we are running this exe with, i.e. en-us</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-645">**Data\_HashedOLSToken** - sha-256 heš tokena koji nam daje OLS usluga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-645">**Data\_HashedOLSToken** - a sha-256 hash of a token the OLS service gives us</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-646">**Data\_Platfom** - x64 ili x86 instalacija</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-646">**Data\_Platform** - x64 or x86 install</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-647">**Data\_PrereqFailure\_Type** - Neuspeli preduslov na koji smo naišli, npr. operativni sistem nije podržan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-647">**Data\_PrereqFailure\_Type** – The prerequisite failure we hit, i.e. the operating system is not supported</span></span>

### <a name="officeclicktoruncorruptioncheck"></a><span data-ttu-id="d6247-649">Office.ClickToRun.CorruptionCheck</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-649">Office.ClickToRun.CorruptionCheck</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-650">Podešavanje sistema Office i prikupljanje podataka o zalihama kada klijent „Klikni i pokreni“ pokreće proveru oštećenja da bi proverio da li su Office binarne datoteke ispravne.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-650">Office set up and inventory data collected when Click-to-Run client is running a corruption check to make sure that Office binaries are correct.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-651">Koristi se za merenje oštećenja binarnih datoteka sistema Office i određivanje binarnih datoteka koje su oštećene.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-651">Used to measure corruption of Office binaries, and which binaries are corrupt.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-652">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-652">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-653">**Data\_Active –** Manifest trenutnog protoka koji proveravamo na disku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-653">**Data\_Active -** The current stream manifest we're checking on disk</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-654">**Data\_ActivePackages -** koje pakete sadrži manifest</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-654">**Data\_ActivePackages -** what packages the manifest contains</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-655">**Data\_ActiveVersion -** verzija manifesta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-655">**Data\_ActiveVersion -** the version of the manifest</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-656">**Data\_AddFileCount –** koliko datoteka dodajemo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-656">**Data\_AddFileCount -** how many files we're adding</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-657">**Data\_AddFileFiles –** uzorak datoteka koje dodajemo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-657">**Data\_AddFileFiles -** a sample of the files we're adding</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-658">**Data\_CompressionLevel -** kako su datoteke kompresovane</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-658">**Data\_CompressionLevel -** how the files are compressed</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-659">**Data\_CorruptionCheckLevel –** koliko detaljno proveravamo oštećenja, faze</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-659">**Data\_CorruptionCheckLevel -** how deeply we're checking for corruption, stages</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-660">**Data\_CorruptSizeCount -** koliko datoteka je oštećeno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-660">**Data\_CorruptSizeCount -** how many files have a corrupt size</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-661">**Data\_CorruptSizeFiles -** uzorak datoteka koje su oštećene</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-661">**Data\_CorruptSizeFiles -** a sample of the files that have a corrupted size</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-662">**Data\_CorruptSizeCount -** koliko datoteka ima oštećenu verziju</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-662">**Data\_CorruptVersionCount -** how many files have a corrupted version</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-663">**Data\_CorruptSizeFiles -** uzorak datoteka koje imaju oštećenu verziju</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-663">**Data\_CorruptVersionFiles -** a sample of the files that have a corrupted version</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-664">**Data\_FileBadDigestCount -** koliko datoteka nismo uspeli da otvorimo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-664">**Data\_FileBadDigestCount -** how many files we failed to open</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-665">**Data\_FileBadDigestFiles -** uzorak datoteka koje nismo mogli da otvorimo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-665">**Data\_FileBadDigestFiles -** a sample of the files that we were unable to open</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-666">**Data\_FileNotSignedCount –** datoteke koje nisu potpisane</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-666">**Data\_FileNotSignedCount -** have many files that aren't signed</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-667">**Data\_FileNotSignedFiles –** uzorak datoteka koje nisu potpisane</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-667">**Data\_FileNotSignedFiles -** a sample of the files that aren't signed</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-668">**Data\_FileNotTrustedCount –** koliko datoteka nije pouzdano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-668">**Data\_FileNotTrustedCount -** how many files aren't trusted</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-669">**Data\_FileNotTrustedFiles –** uzorak datoteka koje nisu pouzdane</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-669">**Data\_FileNotTrustedFiles -** a sample of the files that we don't trust</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-670">**Data\_IncompleteFileCount -** koliko datoteka izgleda nepotpuno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-670">**Data\_IncompleteFileCount -** how many files seem to be incomplete</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-671">**Data\_IncompleteFileFiles -** uzorak datoteka koje su nepotpune</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-671">**Data\_IncompleteFileFiles -** a sample of the files that are incomplete</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-672">**Data\_KeepFileCount –** koliko datoteka ne koristimo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-672">**Data\_KeepFileCount -** how many files we're not doing anything to</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-673">**Data\_KeepFileFiles –** uzorak datoteka koje čuvamo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-673">**Data\_KeepFileFiles -** a sample of files we're keeping</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-674">**Data\_KeepIncompleteFileCount –** koliko datoteka ne menjamo iako su nepotpune</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-674">**Data\_KeepIncompleteFileCount -** how many files we're not changing despite them being incomplete</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-675">**Data\_KeepIncompleteFileFiles –** uzorak datoteka koje čuvamo, a koje su nepotpune</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-675">**Data\_KeepIncompleteFileFiles -** a sample of the files we're keeping that are incomplete</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-676">**Data\_MismatchSizeCount –** koliko ima datoteka čija se veličina ne poklapa sa veličinom našeg manifesta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-676">**Data\_MismatchSizeCount -** how many files have a size that doesn't match our manifest</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-677">**Data\_MismatchSizeFiles -** uzorak datoteka koje se ne podudaraju u veličini</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-677">**Data\_MismatchSizeFiles -** a sample of the files that are mismatched in size</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-678">**Data\_MismatchVersionCount -** koliko datoteka ima verziju koja je drugačija od verzije našeg manifesta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-678">**Data\_MismatchVersionCount -** how many files that have a version different than our manifest</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-679">**Data\_CorruptSizeFiles -** uzorak datoteka koje se ne podudaraju u verzijama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-679">**Data\_MismatchVersionFiles -** a sample of the files that have mismatched versions</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-680">**Data\_MissingFileCount -** koliko datoteka nedostaje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-680">**Data\_MissingFileCount -** how many files seem to be missing</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-681">**Data\_IncompleteFileFiles -** uzorak datoteka koje nedostaju</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-681">**Data\_MissingFileFiles -** a sample of the files that are missing</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-682">**Data\_NotToBeStreamedFileCount –** koliko datoteka ne strimujemo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-682">**Data\_NotToBeStreamedFileCount -** how many files we're not streaming</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-683">**Data\_RemoveFileCount –** koliko datoteka uklanjamo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-683">**Data\_RemoveFileCount -** how many files we're removing</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-684">**Data\_RemoveFileFiles –** uzorak datoteka koje uklanjamo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-684">**Data\_RemoveFileFiles -** a sample of the files we're removing</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-685">**Data\_StreamUnitsMismatchCount –** koliko datoteka ima jedinice koje se ne podudaraju sa manifestom</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-685">**Data\_StreamUnitsMismatchCount -** how many files have units that don't match the manifest</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-686">**Data\_StreamUnitsMismatchFiles -** uzorak datoteka čije se jedinice ne podudaraju u protoku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-686">**Data\_StreamUnitsMismatchFiles -** a sample of the files that have a stream with units mismatched</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-687">**Data\_TimeElapsed -** koliko vremena je bilo potrebno za proveru oštećenja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-687">**Data\_TimeElapsed -** how long we took to check for corruption</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-688">**Data\_UpdateFileCount –** koliko datoteka ažuriramo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-688">**Data\_UpdateFileCount -** how many files we're updating</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-689">**Data\_UpdateFileFiles –** uzorak datoteka koje dodajemo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-689">**Data\_UpdateFileFiles -** a sample of the files we're adding</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-690">**Data\_Working –** novi manifest koji proveravamo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-690">**Data\_Working -** the new manifest we're checking</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-691">**Data\_WorkingVersion -** verzija novog manifesta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-691">**Data\_WorkingVersion -** the version of the new manifest</span></span>

### <a name="officeclicktorunmachinemetadata"></a><span data-ttu-id="d6247-692">Office.ClickToRun.MachineMetadata</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-692">Office.ClickToRun.MachineMetadata</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-693">Podešavanje sistema Office i podaci o zalihama koji pružaju neophodne metapodatke za podešavanje i za zalihe, a koristi se za određivanje tačne osnovne instalacije.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-693">Office set up and inventory data that provides necessary metadata for setup and inventory and is used to determine an accurate install base.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-694">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-694">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-695">**Data\_C2RClientVer** - Verzija OfficeClickToRun.exe koja se nalazi na računaru</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-695">**Data\_C2RClientVer** – The version of OfficeClickToRun.exe on the machine</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-696">**Data\_OfficeBitness** - Broj bita na kojima je instaliran Office, x86 ili x64</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-696">**Data\_OfficeBitness** – The bitness that Office is installed in, x86 or x64</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-697">**Data\_OfficeVersion** - Verzija instaliranog Office sistema</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-697">**Data\_OfficeVersion** - The version Office is installed in</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-698">**Data\_Sku** – SKU koji je instaliran, tj. Microsoft 365 Apps za preduzeće</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-698">**Data\_Sku** - The SKU that's installed, i.e. Microsoft 365 Apps for enterprise</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-699">**Data\_SqmMachineID** - Jedinstveni ID računara koji koristi Windows SQM Data\_SusClientID- identifikator ažuriranja za Office na računaru</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-699">**Data\_SqmMachineID** – Unique Machine ID used by Windows SQM Data\_SusClientID- Machine Office update identifier</span></span>

### <a name="officeclicktorunodt"></a><span data-ttu-id="d6247-700">Office.ClickToRun.ODT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-700">Office.ClickToRun.ODT</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-701">Podešavanje sistema Office i prikupljeni podaci o zalihama kada IT administrator pokreće „Klikni i pokreni“ setup.exe Alatke za primenu programskog paketa Office da bi izmenio instalirane Office proizvode korisnika.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-701">Office set up and inventory data collected when an IT Admin is running the Office Deployment Tool Click-to-Run setup.exe to modify their users' installed Office products.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-702">Koristi se za merenje uspeha / neuspeha instalacije sistema Office koju je u potpunosti započeo IT administrator, uključujući i preduslovne provere.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-702">It is used to measure success / failure of full IT Admin initiated Office installations including pre-requisite checks.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-703">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-703">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-704">**Data\_BootStrapperStateFailure\_ErrorCode-** Kôd greške koji nismo uspeli da sredimo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-704">**Data\_BootStrapperStateFailure\_ErrorCode-** The error code we failed with</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-705">**Data\_BootStrapperStateFailure\_ErrorSource-** Funkcija koju nismo uspeli da sredimo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-705">**Data\_BootStrapperStateFailure\_ErrorSource-** The function we failed in</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-706">**Data\_BootStrapperStateFailure\_FailingState** - Deo koji nismo uspeli da sredimo u boot-strapper-u</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-706">**Data\_BootStrapperStateFailure\_FailingState-** The part that we failed in the boot-strapper</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-707">**Data\_BootStrapperStateFailure\_OExceptionType-** Vrsta izuzetka koji nismo uspeli da sredimo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-707">**Data\_BootStrapperStateFailure\_OExceptionType-** The type of exception we failed with</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-708">**Data\_ConfigurationHost-** Host od kog je stigla datoteka configuration.xml</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-708">**Data\_ConfigurationHost-** The host where the configuration.xml came from</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-709">**Data\_ConfigurationId-** ID koji dobijamo od datoteke configuration.xml</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-709">**Data\_ConfigurationId-** The ID we get from a configuration.xml</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-710">**Data\_ConfigurationSource-** Odakle je stigla datoteka configuration.xml</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-710">**Data\_ConfigurationSource-** We the configuration.xml came from</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-711">**Data\_Culture-** Jezičke postavke kojima pokrećemo exe datoteku, npr. en-us</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-711">**Data\_Culture-** the culture we are running this exe with, i.e. en-us</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-712">**Data\_HashedOLSToken-** sha-256 heš tokena koji nam daje OLS usluga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-712">**Data\_HashedOLSToken-** a sha-256 hash of a token the OLS service gives us</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-713">**Data\_MigrateArchRequest-** ako premeštamo korisnika sa sistema x86 na sistem x64 i obratno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-713">**Data\_MigrateArchRequest-** If we are migrating the user from x86 to x64 or vice-versa</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-714">**Data\_MigrateArchRequestValid-** ako smatramo da je zahtev za premeštanje validan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-714">**Data\_MigrateArchRequestValid-** If we believe the migrate request is valid</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-715">**Data\_Platfom-** x64 ili x86 instalacija</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-715">**Data\_Platform-** x64 or x86 install</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-716">**Data\_PlatformMigratedFrom-** Početna platforma, npr. x86</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-716">**Data\_PlatformMigratedFrom-** Starting platform, i.e. x86</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-717">**Data\_PlatformMigratedTo-** Krajnja platforma, npr. x64</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-717">**Data\_PlatformMigratedTo-** Ending platform, i.e. x64</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-718">**Data\_PrereqFailure\_Type-** Neuspeli preduslov na koji smo naišli</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-718">**Data\_PrereqFailure\_Type-** The prerequisite failure we hit</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-719">**Data\_ProductReleaseId –** Proizvod koji instaliramo, tj. Microsoft 365 Apps za preduzeće</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-719">**Data\_ProductReleaseId-** Product we're installing, i.e. Microsoft 365 Apps for enterprise</span></span>

### <a name="officeclicktorunrepomanlogger"></a><span data-ttu-id="d6247-720">Office.ClickToRun.RepomanLogger</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-720">Office.ClickToRun.RepomanLogger</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-721">Izveštaji o statusu novog „Klikni i pokreni“ kanala ažuriranja („Repoman“) i da li uspešno preuzima i primenjuje Office ispravke.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-721">Reports on the status for the new Click-to-Run update pipeline ("Repoman") and if it successfully downloads and applies Office updates.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-722">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-722">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-723">**ApplySucceeded -** Tačno ako je kanal uspešno primenio ažuriranje za Office, netačno ako nije.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-723">**ApplySucceeded -** True if the pipeline successfully applied an Office update, false if not.</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-724">**DownloadSucceeded -** Tačno ako je kanal uspešno preuzeo ažuriranje za Office, netačno ako nije.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-724">**DownloadSucceeded -** True if the pipeline successfully downloaded an Office update, false if not.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-725">**ErrorCode -** Kod poslednje greške koja se dogodila u „Klikni i pokreni“ kanalu Repoman.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-725">**ErrorCode -** The code of the last error that occurred in the Click-to-Run Repoman pipeline.</span></span>

### <a name="officeclicktoruntransport"></a><span data-ttu-id="d6247-1664">Office.ClickToRun.Transport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-1664">Office.ClickToRun.Transport</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-1665">Izveštava o radnjama preuzimanja datoteka kako bi se odredilo da li je operacija bila uspešna, tipu preuzimanja i dijagnostičkim informacijama.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-1665">Reports on the file download actions to determine the success of the operation, type of download performed and diagnostic information.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-1668">**ByteFromInternetPeers –**    Bajtovi ravnopravnih uređaja na internetu, samo za preuzimanja pomoću optimizacije isporučivanja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-1668">**ByteFromInternetPeers -**    Bytes from internet peers, only for downloads using Delivery Optimization</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-1669">**BytesFromLanPeers –**    Bajtovi ravnopravnih uređaja na LAN mreži, samo za preuzimanja pomoću optimizacije isporučivanja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-1669">**BytesFromLanPeers -**    Bytes from Lan peers, only for downloads using Delivery Optimization</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-1670">**canceledJobs -**     Broj otkazanih zahteva u sesiji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-1670">**canceledJobs -**     Number of canceled requests in the session</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-1671">**Connected –**    Pokazuje da li postoji veza sa izvorom</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-1671">**Connected -**    Whether connected to source</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-1672">**ErrorCode –**    Kôd poslednje greške</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-1672">**ErrorCode -**    The code of last error</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-1673">**ErrorDetails** – Detalji poslednje greške</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-1673">**ErrorDetails -**     The detail of last error</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-1675">**ErrorSource –**    Izvor poslednje greške, na primer, Connection, LoadFile ili LoadRange</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-1675">**ErrorSource -**    The source of last error, e.g. Connection, LoadFile or LoadRange</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-1676">**FailedJob –**    Broj zahteva u sesiji koji nisu uspeli</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-1676">**FailedJob -**    Number of failed requests in the session</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-1677">**FileSize** – Veličina resursa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-1677">**FileSize -**    Size of the resource</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-1678">**SourcePathNoFilePath** – Izvorna putanja resursa. Izveštava se samo o http izvoru, a filtrira se putanja do lokalne datoteke ili UNC putanja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-1678">**SourcePathNoFilePath -**    Source path of the resource only http source is reported, local file path or UNC path is filtered</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-1679">**SucceededJobs –**    Broj uspešnih zahteva u sesiji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-1679">**SucceededJobs -**    Number of succeeded requests in the session</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-1680">**TotalJobs –**    Ukupan broj zahteva u sesiji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-1680">**TotalJobs -**     Total number of requests in the session</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-1681">**TotalRequestedBytes –**    Ukupan broj traženih bajtova u sesiji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-1681">**TotalRequestedBytes -**     Total requested bytes in the session</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-1682">**TotalTransferTime –**    Ukupno vreme prenosa u sesiji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-1682">**TotalTransferTime -**    Total transfer time in the session</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-1684">**TransportType –**    Tip prenosa, na primer (optimizacija isporučivanja u memoriji, HTTP, usluga inteligentnog prenosa u pozadini)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-1684">**TransportType -**    Type of transport, e.g. (In memory Delivery Optimization, HTTP, Background Intelligent Transfer Service)</span></span>



### <a name="officeclicktoruntransportexperimentaltransportpipelinecreatetransport"></a><span data-ttu-id="d6247-1685">Office.ClickToRun.Transport.ExperimentalTransport.PipelineCreateTransport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-1685">Office.ClickToRun.Transport.ExperimentalTransport.PipelineCreateTransport</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-1686">Podešavanje sistema Office i prikupljanje podataka o zalihama kada klijent „Klikni i pokreni“ kreira protok za prenos da bi preuzeo Office datoteke.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-1686">Office set up and inventory data collected when the Click-to-Run client is creating a transport stream to download Office files.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-1687">Koristi se za utvrđivanje ispravnosti raznih tehnologija za prenos (npr. HTTP, BITS, DO), što je od presudnog značaja za ispravno preuzimanje instalacije i ažuriranja za sistem Office.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-1687">Used for determining the health of various transport technologies (e.g., HTTP, BITS, DO) which is critical to downloading Office properly for installation and updates.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-1688">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-1688">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-1689">**Data\_IsForeGroundStreaming**– da li emitujemo u prednjem planu ili u pozadini</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-1689">**Data\_IsForeGroundStreaming** – If we're streaming in the foreground or background</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-1690">**Data\_IsInstallMode** – 1 ako instaliramo i preuzimamo datoteke, 0 ako to ne radimo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-1690">**Data\_IsInstallMode** – 1 if we're installing and downloading files, 0 if not</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-1691">**Data\_SourceProtocol –** Ako preuzimamo sa mreže za podatke sadržaja, CDN, sa računara na koji instaliramo, lokalno, ili iz resursa sa lokalne mreže,</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-1691">**Data\_SourceProtocol –** If we're downloading from a content data network, CDN, the machine we're installing on, local, or from a resource on the local area network,</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-1692">**Data\_Status**– Uspeh ili neuspeh</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-1692">**Data\_Status** – Success or failure</span></span> 

### <a name="officeclicktorunupdatestatus"></a><span data-ttu-id="d6247-1693">Office.ClickToRun.UpdateStatus</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-1693">Office.ClickToRun.UpdateStatus</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-1694">Podešavanje sistema Office i prikupljanje podataka o zalihama kada klijent „Klikni i pokreni“ završava status ažuriranja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-1694">Office set up and inventory data collected when the Click-to-Run client is finishing an update status</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-1695">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-1695">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-1696">**Data\_build** - Trenutno instalirana verzija sistema Office</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-1696">**Data\_build** - Currently installed Office version</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-1697">**Data\_channel** – Kanal na kom se nalazi korisnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-1697">**Data\_channel** – The channel that the user is on</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-1698">**Data\_errorCode** – Kôd sa celim brojevima koji određuje tip greške ako je do nje došlo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-1698">**Data\_errorCode** – An integer code specifying the type of error that occurred, if there was one</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-1699">**Data\_errorMessage** – Niska koja opisuje grešku ako je do nje došlo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-1699">**Data\_errorMessage** – A string giving a description of the error that occurred, if there was one</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-1768">**IsC2RServiceRunning –**    Bulova zastavica koja pokazuje da li usluga lokalne mašine modernog klijenta za verziju „Klikni i pokreni“ normalno radi na uređaju</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-1768">**IsC2RServiceRunning –**    Boolean flag that indicates whether a modern C2R Client's local machine service is up and running on the device</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-1769">**IsElevatedFlagSet –**    Bulova zastavica koja pokazuje da li je program koji se pokreće prilikom pokretanja računara već pokušao da dobije podizanje na nivo administratora</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-1769">**IsElevatedFlagSet –**    Boolean flag indicating whether the bootstrapper has already attempted to gain admin elevation</span></span>
