- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-1771">**IsFireflyServiceRunning –**    Bulova zastavica koja pokazuje da li usluga lokalne mašine modernog klijenta za 2013 RTM C2R normalno radi na uređaju</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-1771">**IsFireflyServiceRunning –**    Boolean flag that indicates whether a 2013 RTM C2R Client's local machine service is up and running on the device</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-1772">**IsOfficeInstalled –**    Bulova zastavica koja pokazuje da li je već instaliran moderni klijent za Office</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-1772">**IsOfficeInstalled –**    Boolean flag indicating whether a modern Office client is installed already</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-1773">**OfficeCultures –**    Serijalizovana lista Office kultura koje treba instalirati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-1773">**OfficeCultures –**    Serialized list of Office cultures to be installed</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-1774">**OfficeSourceType** – Prepoznatljiva niska povezana sa numeričkom vrednošću instalacionog izvora (CDN, HTTP, UNC, CMBITS, DVD, LOCAL)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-1774">**OfficeSourceType –**    Friendly string associated with the enum value of the installation source (CDN, HTTP, UNC, CMBITS, DVD, LOCAL)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-1775">**Origin –**    Vrednost niske koja saopštava koji od podržanih izvora (Portoriko [PR], Singapur [SG], Dablin [DB]) treba koristiti za početni protok instalacije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-1775">**Origin –**    String value telling us which of the supported origins (Puerto Rico [PR], Singapore [SG], Dublin [DB]) should be used for initial installation streaming</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-1776">**PlatformFromLink** – Niska koja pokazuje podrazumevani broj bitova x86 | x64 | sistema Office zatražen od usluge podešavanja za verziju „Klikni i pokreni“</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-1776">**PlatformFromLink –**    String indicating the requested x86|x64|default bitness of Office requested from the C2R Setup service</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-1777">**PlatformOfExistingInstallation –**    Niska koja pokazuje da li je x86-bitna ili x64-bitna verzija sistema Office već instalirana na uređaju</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-1777">**PlatformOfExistingInstallation –**    String indicating whether x86 vs. X64 Office was already installed on the device</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-1778">**PlatformToInstall –**    Niska koja pokazuje konačnu odluku u vezi sa time da li će se instalirati x86-bitna ili x64-bitna verzija sistema Office</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-1778">**PlatformToInstall –**    String indicating the final decision on whether x86 vs. X64 Office should be installed</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-1779">**PRID –**    Vrednost niske koja predstavlja traženi ID izdanja proizvoda u slučaju korisničke instalacije (na primer, „O365ProPlusRetail“)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-1779">**PRID –**    String value representing the requested Product Release ID in a consumer installation scenario (for example, "O365ProPlusRetail")</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-1780">**PridsToMigrateFromCentennial-** Niska Office proizvoda koje treba migrirati iz instalacija prodavnice u uslugu „Klikni i pokreni“</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-1780">**PridsToMigrateFromCentennial-** String of Office products to migrate from Store installations to Click-To-Run</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-1781">**ProductsToAdd –**    Serijalizovana niska koja daje uputstva klijentu „Klikni i pokreni“ o tome koje kombinacije proizvoda/kultura treba da instalira</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-1781">**ProductsToAdd –**    The serialized string that instructs C2R Client on which Product/Culture combinations it should be installing</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-1782">**ProductsToMigrateFromO15C2R -** Niska Office proizvoda i jezika koje treba migrirati iz „Klikni i pokreni“ instalacije sistema Office 2013</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-1782">**ProductsToMigrateFromO15C2R -** String of Office products and cultures to migrate from an Office 2013 Click-To-Run installation</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-1783">**ProductsToRemove** – Serijalizovana niska koja daje uputstva klijentu za verziju „Klikni i pokreni“ o tome koje kombinacije proizvoda/jezika treba da deinstalira</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-1783">**ProductsToRemove –**    The serialized string that instructs C2R Client on which Product/Culture combinations it should be uninstalling</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-1784">**SharedComputerLicensing –**    Bulova vrednost koja pokazuje da li je IT administrator zatražio podešavanje kako bi se omogućila funkcija „SharedComputerLicensing“</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-1784">**SharedComputerLicensing –**    Boolean indicating whether an IT Admin requested setup to enable the "SharedComputerLicensing" feature</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-1785">**ShouldActivate –**    Bulova vrednost koja pokazuje da li je IT administrator zatražio pokušaj automatskog aktiviranja licenciranja u datoteci configuration.xml</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-1785">**ShouldActivate–**    Boolean indicating whether an IT Admin requested an automatic licensing activation attempt in their configuration.xml</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-1786">**ShouldUninstallCentennial -** Bulova zastavica koja pokazuje da li treba deinstalirati Office proizvode iz prodavnice</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-1786">**ShouldUninstallCentennial -** Boolean flag indicating whether Office products from the Store should be uninstalled</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-1787">**VersionToInstall –**    Vrednost niske verzije 16.0.xxxxx.yyyyy sistema Office koja se instalira</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-1787">**VersionToInstall–**    String value of the Office "16.0.xxxxx.yyyyy" version that is being installed</span></span>

### <a name="officeclicktorununiversalbootstrapperexecute"></a><span data-ttu-id="d6247-1788">Office.ClickToRun.UniversalBootstrapper.Execute</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-1788">Office.ClickToRun.UniversalBootstrapper.Execute</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-1789">Izveštava o preduzetim radnjama koje utiču na mašinu, koje su odredili podaci iz događaja „CalculateParameters“ u vezi sa kojima su donete programske odluke</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-1789">Reports on the machine-impactful actions taken, as determined by the reasoned-over data from "CalculateParameters"</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-1790">**AvailableClientVersionText –**    Vrednost niske klijenta za verziju 16.0.xxxxx.yyyyy „Klikni i pokreni“ koja se nalazi u XML datoteci opisa verzije, koja se koristi za određivanje toga da li treba ažurirati trenutno instalirani klijent za verziju „Klikni i pokreni“</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-1790">**AvailableClientVersionText –**    String value of the C2R Client "16.0.xxxxx.yyyyy" version found in the Version Descriptor XML, which is used to determine whether a currently installed C2R Client should be updated</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-1791">**CleanFireFlyAction –**    Ima vrednost „tačno“ ako je isplanirano da se zadatak CleanFireFlyAction pokrene tokom ovog instaliranja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-1791">**CleanFireflyAction –**    "true" if the CleanFireFlyAction task is scheduled to run during this installation</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-1792">**CleanO15Action –**    Ima vrednost „tačno“ ako je isplanirano da se zadatak CleanO15Action pokrene tokom ovog instaliranja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-1792">**CleanO15Action –**    "true" if the CleanO15Action task is scheduled to run during this installation</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-1793">**CMDMode –**    Prepoznatljiva niska koja odgovara celokupnom prekidaču za režim otkrivenom u cmd argumentima prebačena je u .exe datoteku.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-1793">**CMDMode –**    The friendly string corresponding to which overall mode switch was detected in the cmd arguments passed to the exe.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-1794">Mogućnosti su: automatsko pokretanje, konfigurisanje, potrošačka verzija, preuzimanje, pomoć i program za pakovanje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-1794">Possibilities are:  autorun, configure, consumer, download, help, packager</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-1795">**DeliveryMechanism –**    GUID „FFNRoot“ izdvojen iz XML datoteke opisa verzije (koju je označio RDX) koji saopštava putem kojih je korisnika/kanala dobijen izvor verzije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-1795">**DeliveryMechanism –**    The "FFNRoot" guid extracted from the Version Descriptor XML (stamped by RDX), which tells us which audience/channel the build source came from</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-1796">**DownloadC2RClientAction –**    Ima vrednost „tačno“ ako je isplanirano da se zadatak DownloadC2RClientAction pokrene tokom ovog instaliranja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-1796">**DownloadC2RClientAction –**    "true" if the DownloadC2RClientAction task is scheduled to run during this installation</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-1797">**ErrorCode –**    Vrednost celog broja povezana sa nekontrolisanim izuzetkom</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-1797">**ErrorCode –**    Integer value associated with an unhandled exception</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-1798">**ErrorDetails** – Niska koja opisuje lokaciju na kojoj je došlo do nekontrolisanog izuzetka (funkcija, datoteka, broj reda, dodatni parametri koji postavlja izbacivač)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-1798">**ErrorDetails –**    String that describes the location of where an unhandled exception occurred (function, file, line number, additional parameters set by the thrower)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-1799">**ErrorMessage** – Niska definisana u trenutku javljanja nekontrolisanog izuzetka koja opisuje prirodu otkazivanja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-1799">**ErrorMessage –**    String defined at the point where an unhandled exception was thrown, describing the nature of the failure</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-1800">**ErrorType –**    Niska koja opisuje kategoriju nekontrolisanog izuzetka</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-1800">**ErrorType –**    String describing the category of an unhandled exception</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-1801">**ExitCode –**    Vrednost celog broja povezana sa rezultatom pokretanja izvršne faze programa koji se pokreće prilikom pokretanja računara koja označava uspeh naspram određenih tipova otkazivanja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-1801">**ExitCode –**    Integer value associated with the result of running the Execute phase of the bootstrapper, indicating success vs. specific types of failure</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-1802">**LaunchAction –**    Ima vrednost „tačno“ ako je isplanirano da se zadatak LaunchAction pokrene tokom ovog instaliranja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-1802">**LaunchAction –**    "true" if the LaunchAction task is scheduled to run during this installation</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-1803">**LaunchUpdateAction –**    Ima vrednost „tačno“ ako je isplanirano da se zadatak LaunchUpdateAction pokrene tokom ovog instaliranja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-1803">**LaunchUpdateAction –**    "true" if the LaunchUpdateAction task is scheduled to run during this installation</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-1804">**PreReqResult –**    Numerička vrednost celog broja rezultata izvršavanja provera preduslova (prolaz/neuspeh/ponovno pokretanje)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-1804">**PreReqResult –**    The integer enum value of the result when PreReq checks were performed (pass/fail/re-run)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-1805">**UnexpectedAction –**    Ima vrednost „tačno“ ako je isplanirano da se zadatak UnexpectedAction (slučaj greške) pokrene tokom ovog instaliranja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-1805">**UnexpectedAction –**    "true" if the UnexpectedAction task (an error case) is scheduled to run during this installation</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-1806">**VersionToInstall** – Vrednost niske verzije 16.0.xxxxx.yyyyy sistema Office koja se instalira</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-1806">**VersionToInstall –**    String value of the Office "16.0.xxxxx.yyyyy" version that is being installed</span></span>

### <a name="officeserviceabilitymanagerinventoryaddonheartbeat"></a><span data-ttu-id="d6247-1807">Office.ServiceabilityManager.InventoryAddon.Heartbeat</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-1807">Office.ServiceabilityManager.InventoryAddon.Heartbeat</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-1808">*[Ovaj događaj je uklonjen iz aktuelnih verzija sistema Office, ali se i dalje može pojavljivati u starijim verzijama.]*</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-1808">*[This event has been removed from current builds of Office, but might still appear in older builds.]*</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-1809">Ovaj se događaj koristi za sticanje standardnih metapodataka pri svakom pokretanju dodatka Inventory, koji je deo usluge Office Serviceabiliti Manager, a koristi se za informacije o Office inventaru na onim mašinama za koje se IT administrator odlučio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-1809">This event is used to acquire standard metadata on each run of the Inventory add-on, which is part of the Office Serviceability Manager and is used for inventory Office information on those machines for which an IT admin has opted in.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-1810">Metapodaci od specifičnog interesa ovde su ID sesije i koriste se za povezivanje s drugim podacima pohranjenim u oblačnom servisu korisnika.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-1810">The metadata of specific interest here is the session ID, and it is used for linking to other data stored within a per-tenant cloud service.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-1811">Ovaj događaj ne sadrži dodatna polja jer su samo metapodaci relevantni.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-1811">This event contains no extra fields since only the metadata is relevant.</span></span>

### <a name="officeserviceabilitymanagerinventoryaddonresults"></a><span data-ttu-id="d6247-1812">Office.ServiceabilityManager.InventoryAddon.Results</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-1812">Office.ServiceabilityManager.InventoryAddon.Results</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-1813">Ovaj događaj se evidentira kada se završi poziv upućen funkciji webservice, obavljen u okviru dodatka, Upravljača Servisiranja Inventara „Klikni i pokreni“, bez obzira na to da li je uspešan ili neuspešan.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-1813">This event is logged when the call to the webservice made within the Click-to-Run Serviceability Manager Inventory add-on completes, irrespective of whether it succeeds or fails.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-1814">Ovo je u suštini poslednja operacija u okviru dodatka za praćenje celokupnog statusa operacije.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-1814">This is essentially the last operation within the add-on to track the overall operation status.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-1815">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-1815">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-1816">**ActionDetail** – Dodatni detalji kada dođe do neuspeha.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-1816">**ActionDetail** -  Additional details for when a failure occurs.</span></span>
   - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-1817">Ako HTTP zahtev uspe, ActionDetail će biti 0.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-1817">If the HTTP request succeeds, ActionDetail will be 0.</span></span>
   - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-1818">Ako polje „Result“ nije u redu (tj. nije 0), što znači da zahtev nije poslat, ovo polje će evidentirati kôd unutrašnje greške koji je isti kao polje „Result“.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-1818">If the Result field is not OK (i.e. not 0), which means that the request is not sent, this field will log the internal error code which is the same as the Result field.</span></span>
   - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-1819">Ako je polje „Result“ u redu (tj. 0), što znači da je kôd HTTP odgovora >= 300, ono će evidentirati kôd HTTP odgovora (npr. 404).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-1819">If the Result field is OK (i.e. 0), which means that the HTTP response code >= 300, it will log the HTTP response code (e.g. 404).</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-1820">**Result** – Zastavice numeričkog koda greške dobijene iz API-ja za pozivanje Office veb usluge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-1820">**Result** - Numeric error code flags returned by the Office webservice call APIs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-1821">– npr. 3 bi značilo da je došlo do problema prilikom pokretanja HTTP zaglavlja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-1821">– e.g. 3 would mean that there was a problem initializing the HTTP headers.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-1822">**Type** – Dodatne informacije o tipu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-1822">**Type** - Additional type information.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-1823">U slučaju zaliha, ove informacije navode tip korisnih podataka koji se šalju – npr. kompletni ili samo delta promena.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-1823">In the case of the Inventory, this information specifies the type of payload being sent – e.g. full or just a delta of changes.</span></span> 

-  <span data-ttu-id="d6247-1824">**WebCallSource** - Vrednost nabrajanja (navedena kao ceo broj) koja ukazuje na dodatak „Upravljač servisiranja“, koji je bio izvor poziva:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-1824">**WebCallSource** - An enumeration value (specified as an integer) indicating the Serviceability Manager add-on that was the source of the call:</span></span>
   - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-1825">Inventar: 0</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-1825">Inventory: 0</span></span>
   - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-1826">Konfiguracija inventara: 1</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-1826">Inventory Configuration: 1</span></span>
   - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-1827">Smernice za inventar: 2</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-1827">Inventory Policy: 2</span></span>
   - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-1828">Status mreže inventara: 3</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-1828">Inventory Network Status: 3</span></span>
   - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-1829">Upravljač uslužnošću: 4</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-1829">Serviceability Manager: 4</span></span>
   - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-1830">Mogućnost upravljanja: 5</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-1830">Manageability: 5</span></span>

### <a name="officeserviceabilitymanagerwebservicefailure"></a><span data-ttu-id="d6247-1831">Office.ServiceabilityManager.WebserviceFailure</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-1831">Office.ServiceabilityManager.WebserviceFailure</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-1832">Kad god ne uspe poziv upućen veb usluzi u okviru jednog od Office Serviceability Manager programskih dodataka, ova izjava se evidentira.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-1832">Whenever a call to a webservice within one of the Office Serviceability Manager add-ins fails, this statement is logged.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-1833">Do neuspeha može da dođe zbog internih grešaka ili nemogućnosti povezivanja sa veb uslugom.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-1833">Failures can be due to internal failures or an inability to connect to the webservice.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-1834">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-1834">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-1835">**Add-on** - Dodatak „Upravljač servisiranja klikni i pokreni“ u okviru kog je upućen poziv funkciji webservice.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-1835">**Add-on** - The Click-to-Run Serviceability Manager add-on from which the webservice call was made.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-1836">Ovo može da ima vrednosti kao što su inventar, mogućnost upravljanja, itd, kodirani kao numeričke vrednosti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-1836">This can have values like inventory, manageability, etc. encoded as a numeric value.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-1837">**Correlation ID** - Nasumično generisan GUID koji je specifičan za trenutnu instancu i koji se šalje funkciji webservice za korelaciju poziva između klijenta i servera.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-1837">**Correlation ID** - A randomly generated GUID specific to the current instance that is sent to the webservice to correlate calls between the client and the server.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-1838">**ErrorInfo** - Informacije o numeričkom kodu greške dobijene iz Office webservice API-ja za pozivanje.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-1838">**ErrorInfo** - Numeric error code information returned by the Office webservice call APIs.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-1839">**ErrorMessage** – Poruka koja pruža dodatni uvid u neuspeh.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-1839">**ErrorMessage** - A message providing further insight into the failure.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-1840">Svaki tip greške mapira se sa fiksno kodiranom niskom, pri čemu se neki tipovi grešaka potencijalno mapiraju sa više niski, u zavisnosti od konkretne prirode neuspeha.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-1840">Each error type maps to a hardcoded string, with some error types mapping to potentially multiple strings depending on the specific nature of the failure.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-1841">**Function** - Funkcija u kodu u kojoj je obavljen trenutni poziv.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-1841">**Function** - The function in the code from which the current call occurred.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-1842">**Status** - HTTP statusni kôd dobijen iz poziva upućenog funkciji webservice, npr. 404, 500, itd.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-1842">**Status** - The HTTP status code returned by the call to the webservice, e.g. 404, 500, etc.</span></span>

### <a name="officeexperimentationflightnumberline"></a><span data-ttu-id="d6247-1850">Office.Experimentation.FlightNumberLine</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-1850">Office.Experimentation.FlightNumberLine</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-1857">**UnmergedConfigs** - Lista konfiguracija koje nisu objedinjene</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-1857">**UnmergedConfigs** - List of configurations not merged</span></span>

### <a name="officeexperimentationtriggeranalysis"></a><span data-ttu-id="d6247-1858">Office.Experimentation.TriggerAnalysis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-1858">Office.Experimentation.TriggerAnalysis</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-1859">Ovaj događaj pomaže u analizi opsega korištenja proizvoda i metrika performansi (kao što su padovi, prekidi, itd.) podskupa korisnika ili uređaja koji imaju pravo na korišćenje funkcije, i na taj način pomažu u osiguravanju ispravnog rada proizvoda.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-1859">This event helps scope analysis of product usage and performance metrics (such as crashes, hangs, etc.) to the subset of users or devices that are eligible to use the feature, thereby helping ensure that the product is working properly.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-1861">**FeatureGate -** Identifikuje skup funkcija za koje je primenjiva analiza okidača.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-1861">**FeatureGate -** Identifies the set of features for which the trigger analysis is applicable.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-1913">**Sessioid** – globalno jedinstveni identifikator (GUID) za povezivanje događaja po sesiji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-1913">**SessionID** - Globally Unique Identifier (GUID) to connect events by session</span></span>

### <a name="officeandroiddocsuipaywallcontrolskuchooseranalytics"></a><span data-ttu-id="d6247-1914">Office.Android.DocsUI.PaywallControl.SkuChooserAnalytics</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-1914">Office.Android.DocsUI.PaywallControl.SkuChooserAnalytics</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-1918">**Duration** – Dugi ceo broj koji označava vreme koje je korisnik proveo na ekranu SKU birača u milisekundama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-1918">**Duration** – Long integer indicating time spent by user on Sku Chooser screen in milliseconds</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-1919">**EventDate** – vremenska oznaka pojavljivanja događaja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-1919">**EventDate** – Timestamp of the event occurrence</span></span>

### <a name="officeandroiddocsuiviewsdimeerror"></a><span data-ttu-id="d6247-1921">Office.Android.DocsUI.Views.DimeError</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-1921">Office.Android.DocsUI.Views.DimeError</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-1922">Ovaj događaj se prikuplja za Office aplikaciju za Android (objavljen u prodavnicama Huawei i u Kini).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-1922">This event is collected for the Office app for Android (released on Huawei and in China Stores).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-1923">Taj događaj označava da pokušaj kupovine pretplate na Microsoft 365 putem platforme Dime (webURL učitan u veb prikazu u klijentu) nije uspeo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-1923">This event indicates that an attempt to purchase a Microsoft 365 subscription through Dime (a webURL loaded in client webview) has failed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-1924">Snimaju se samo scenariji grešaka.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-1924">Only the error scenarios are captured.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-1925">Ti podaci o događajima su samo podaci o greškama, a koriste se za osiguravanje dobrog stanja toka kupovine putem platforme Dime u klijentu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-1925">This event data is error data only and is used to ensure the health of the Dime purchase flow in the client.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-1926">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-1926">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-1927">**CorrelationID** – ID koji na jedinstven način identifikuje sesiju kupovine putem platforme Dime.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-1927">**CorrelationID** - ID that uniquely identifies a Dime purchase session.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-1928">**ErrorReason** – označava razlog greške do koje je došlo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-1928">**ErrorReason** - Indicates the reason for the error that happened.</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-1929">0 – nepoznata greška</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-1929">0 – Unknown error</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-1930">1 – internet nije dostupan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-1930">1 – Internet not available</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-1931">2 – nije uspela provera valjanosti univerzalno jedinstvenog identifikatora (UUID)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-1931">2 – Universally unique identifier (UUID) validation failed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-1932">3 – univerzalno jedinstven identifikator (UUID) null je ili prazan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-1932">3 - Universally unique identifier (UUID) is null or empty</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-1933">4 – greška umetanja u JavaScript pri kojoj aplikacija Office za Android ne može da prosledi authToken platformi Dime</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-1933">4 – JavaScript injection error where the Office app for Android can’t pass authToken to Dime</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-1934">5 – osnovni WebURL učitan na klijentu nije važeći</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-1934">5 – Base WebURL loaded on client is invalid</span></span>


### <a name="officeandroiddocsuiviewspremiumfeatureupsell"></a><span data-ttu-id="d6247-1935">Office.Android.DocsUI.Views.PremiumFeatureUpsell</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-1935">Office.Android.DocsUI.Views.PremiumFeatureUpsell</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-1936">Ovaj događaj beleži klikove besplatnog korisnika kako bi video funkciju iza platnog zida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-1936">This event captures clicks by a free user clicks to view a feature behind the pay wall.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-1937">Podaci se koriste za merenje interakcije korisnika sa kontekstualnim doživljajem prodaje skupih proizvoda i razumevanje funkcija koje korisnik priželjkuje, što ih podstiče da kupe pretplatu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-1937">The data is used to measure the interaction of users with the contextual upsell experience and understand which features are preferred by the user which drives them to buy a subscription.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-1938">Ovo nam pomaže da investiramo u poboljšanje željenog skupa ulaznih tačaka.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-1938">This helps us invest to improve those preferred set of entry points.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-1939">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-1939">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-1940">**featureId** – TCID za Premium funkciju</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-1940">**featureId** - TCID for premium feature</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-1941">**featureName** – naslov Premium funkcije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-1941">**featureName** - Premium Feature Title</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-1942">**seePlanButtonClick** – Koliko puta se klikne na dugme "Pogledajte dugmad plana" u korisničkom interfejsu prodaje skupih proizvoda</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-1942">**seePlanButtonClick** - How many times “See plan buttons” gets clicked in upsell UI</span></span>

### <a name="officeappleiapreviewyoursubscriptionios"></a><span data-ttu-id="d6247-1943">Office.Apple.IAPReviewYourSubscriptioniOS</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-1943">Office.Apple.IAPReviewYourSubscriptioniOS</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-1944">Ovaj događaj beleži metapodatke zasnovane na sesiji kada se korisniku prikaže korisnički interfejs „Kupovina unutar aplikacije“ (IAP) i dugmad s kojima korisnik naknadno stupa u interakciju.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-1944">This event captures session-based metadata when the In-App-Purchase (IAP) UI is shown to the user and the buttons the user subsequently interacts with.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-1945">Ti se podaci koriste kako bi nam pomogli da shvatimo probleme u toku kupovine i uporedimo ih sa levkom različitog iskustva kupovine kako bismo shvatili koje je iskustvo bolje za korisnika.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-1945">This data is used to help us understand the friction in the purchase flow and compare it with the funnel of a different purchase experience to understand which experience is better for the user.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-1946">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-1946">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-1947">**FlowType** – Ceo broj – Tok odakle je pokrenut IAP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-1947">**FlowType** - Integer – Flow from where IAP was launched.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-1948">**Restore** – Niska – oznaka pravila se evidentira kada se klikne na dugme „Vrati u prethodno stanje“.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-1948">**Restore** - String – rule tag is logged when restore button is clicked</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-1949">**PremiumFeatures** – Niska – oznaka pravila se evidentira kada se klikne na dugme "PremiumFeatures"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-1949">**PremiumFeatures** - String – rule tag is logged when “PremiumFeatures” button is clicked</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-1950">**Product**– Niska – SKU koji su izabrali korisnici</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-1950">**Product** - String - The SKU selected by the users</span></span>


### <a name="officeappleinapppurchasecontext"></a><span data-ttu-id="d6247-1951">Office.Apple.InAppPurchaseContext</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-1951">Office.Apple.InAppPurchaseContext</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-1952">Ovaj događaj meri telemetriju kritične upotrebe za mesto ulaska na ekran za kupovinu u aplikaciji.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-1952">This event measures critical usage telemetry for the point of entry of the in-app purchase screen.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-1953">Podaci pomažu u razumevanju i poboljšanju korisničkog iskustva identifikovanjem željene ulazne tačke za kupovinu u aplikaciji.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-1953">The data helps understand and improve the user experience by identifying the preferred entry point for an in-app purchase.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-1954">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-1954">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-1955">**context** – Niska – Tok kroz koji je korisnik došao na stranicu „Kupovina“ u aplikaciji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-1955">**context** - String – The flow through which the user landed on the in app purchase page</span></span>

### <a name="officedocssharedpremiumfeaturemessagebar"></a><span data-ttu-id="d6247-1996">Office.Docs.Shared.PremiumFeatureMessageBar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-1996">Office.Docs.Shared.PremiumFeatureMessageBar</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-1997">Ovaj događaj prikuplja dodire besplatnih korisnika na premium funkciju koja se nalazi iza platnog zida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-1997">This event collects free users’ taps on a premium feature that resides behind the paywall.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-1998">Podaci se koriste za razumevanje skupa funkcija sa kojima potrošači u interakciji dok se pretvaraju u plaćenog korisnika.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-1998">The data is used to understand the set of features consumers are interacting with as they convert to a paid user.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-1999">Ovo nam govori o poželjnim ulaznim tačkama korisnika i poboljšava korisničko iskustvo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-1999">This tells us the preferred entry points of the users and improve the user experience.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-2000">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2000">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

### <a name="officelicensingexpirationdialogshown"></a><span data-ttu-id="d6247-2079">Office.Licensing.ExpirationDialogShown</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2079">Office.Licensing.ExpirationDialogShown</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-2080">Ovo se prikuplja prilikom prikazivanja dijaloga korisniku koji kaže da mu je licenca istekla.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2080">This is collected when we show the expiration dialog to the user that says that their license has expired.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2081">Od suštinske je važnosti za određivanje da li se korisnik nalazi u dobrom statusu i ne nedostaje mu funkcionalnost, za ispravnost sistema i za dijagnostičke svrhe ako korisnik prijavi problem na računaru</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2081">It is critical in detecting if the user is in a good state and not missing functionality, used for system health and used for diagnostic purposes if a user reports an issue with their machine</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-2082">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2082">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2083">**LicNotificationState** - Brojač koji nam govori koja vrsta obaveštenja se prikazuje korisniku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2083">**LicNotificationState** – An enumerator that tells us what kind of notification is being shown to the user</span></span>

### <a name="officelicensingfullvalidation"></a><span data-ttu-id="d6247-2084">Office.Licensing.FullValidation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2084">Office.Licensing.FullValidation</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-2085">Ovo se prikuplja pri svakoj sesiji koja izveštava o statusu licence na računaru i greškama koje se prikazuju korisniku zbog kojih nije u mogućnosti da koristi aplikaciju.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2085">This is collected on every session that reports the licensing state of the machine and reports the errors that the user is seeing due to which they are not able to use the application.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2086">Ovaj događaj ukazuje na to da li je korisnikov računar ispravan ili nije.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2086">This event indicates if the user's machine is healthy or not.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2087">Za ovaj događaj imamo podešen detektor anomalija da bismo označili da li regresija ili mehanizam aktivacije uzrokuje neispravno ponašanje korisnika.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2087">We have anomaly detection set up for this event to indicate if a regression or activation mechanism is causing bad user behavior.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2088">Takođe je od suštinske važnosti pri dijagnostikovanju korisničkih problema i za nadgledanje ispravnosti sistema.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2088">This is also critical when diagnosing user issues and for monitoring system health.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-2089">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2089">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2090">**Acid** – GUID identifikator koji predstavlja Office proizvod za koji je korisnik licenciran </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2090">**Acid** – A GUID identifier representing the Office product that the user is licensed for</span></span> 
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2091">**ActivationAttributes** – tip mehanizma aktivacije koji korisnik koristi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2091">**ActivationAttributes** - Type of activation mechanism that the user is using.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2092">**IsSessionLicensing** - Da li je trenutno pokrenuta u režimu aktivacije deljenog računara ili nije.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2092">**IsSessionLicensing** – Whether we are currently running under shared computer activation mode or not</span></span> 

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2093">**LicenseCategory** – Kategorija Office licence koju koristi korisnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2093">**LicenseCategory** – Category of the Office license that the user is using</span></span> 

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2094">**Licenses** – Lista sa imenima svih Office licenci koje se nalaze na računaru</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2094">**Licenses** – List of names of all the  Office licenses that are present on the machine</span></span> 

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2095">**LicenseStatuses** – Status svih Office licenci koje se nalaze na računaru</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2095">**LicenseStatuses** – Status of all the Office licenses present on the machine</span></span> 

### <a name="officelicensinggetentitlement"></a><span data-ttu-id="d6247-2096">Office.Licensing.GetEntitlement</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2096">Office.Licensing.GetEntitlement</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-2097">Ovo prikupljamo kad korisnik podešava uređaj, a mi pozivamo uslugu licenciranja da bismo otkrili da li prijavljeni korisnik ima prava na sistem Office ili nema.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2097">We collect this when the user is setting up a device and we call our licensing service to detect if the logged in user has an Office entitlement or not.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2098">Ovo izveštava o ishodu tog poziva.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2098">This reports the result of that call.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2099">Od suštinske je važnosti za određivanje da li se korisnik nalazi u dobrom statusu,a nedostaje mu funkcionalnost, za ispravnost sistema i za dijagnostičke svrhe ako korisnik prijavi problem na računaru</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2099">It is critical in detecting if the user is in a good state and missing functionality, used for system health and used for diagnostic purposes if a user reports an issue with their machine</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-2100">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2100">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2101">**EntitlementCount** - Broj prava koji korisnik poseduje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2101">**EntitlementCount** – Number of entitlements the user has</span></span>


### <a name="officelicensingheartbeat"></a><span data-ttu-id="d6247-2102">Office.Licensing.Heartbeat</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2102">Office.Licensing.Heartbeat</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-2103">Prilikom svake sesije proveravamo da li je prošlo 72 sata od poslednje obnove licence i pokušavamo da produžimo rok isteka trenutne licence.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2103">On every session, we check if 72 hours have passed since the last license renewal and try to extend the expiry of the current license.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2104">Ovaj događaj izveštava o uspešnosti ili neuspešnosti poziva koji smo uputili da bismo proverili da li možemo da produžimo rok isteka licence i da korisnikovu instalaciju sistema Office održimo u funkciji.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2104">This event reports the success or failure of the call that we make to ensure we can extend the expiry of the license and keep the user's Office installation functional.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2105">Od suštinske je važnosti pri dijagnostikovanju korisnikovih problema vezanih za pretplatu i uslugu, kao i za otkrivanje regresija kod korisnika koji su već aktivirali pretplatu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2105">It is critical in diagnosing subscription-related issues and service issues for the user and is critical in detecting regressions for already activated subscription users.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-2106">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2106">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2107">**Mode** - Numeričko predstavljanje paketa licenci za sistem Office koji se koristi na računaru</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2107">**Mode** – An enumerator representation of the Office licensing stack that is being used on this machine</span></span>

### <a name="officelicensinginclientpinredemptioncallpinredemptionapi"></a><span data-ttu-id="d6247-2108">Office.Licensing.InClientPinRedemption.CallPinRedemptionAPI</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2108">Office.Licensing.InClientPinRedemption.CallPinRedemptionAPI</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-2109">Ova telemetrija prati rezultate servisnog poziva za aktivaciju sistema Office pomoću PIN koda.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2109">This telemetry tracks the results of Office's pin redemption service call.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-2110">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2110">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2111">**ClientTransactionId** - Jedinstveni identifikator pozivanja usluge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2111">**ClientTransactionId** - Unique identifier for the service call.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2112">**ErrorCategory** – Svaki tip greške može da spada u uopšteniju kategoriju, kao što je „Mogućnost ponovnog pokušaja“.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2112">**ErrorCategory** - Each error type can fall into a more general category, such as "Retryable".</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2113">**ErrorType** – Razlog neuspeha, kao što je „AlreadyRedeemedByOther“.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2113">**ErrorType** - Reason of failure, such as "AlreadyRedeemedByOther".</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2114">**InAFOFlow** – Bulova vrednost koja pokazuje da li se nalazimo u AFO aktivacionom toku.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2114">**InAFOFlow** - A Boolean indicating if we are in the AFO redemption flow.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2115">**StatusCode** – Rezultat pozivanja usluge koji se sastoji od jedne reči, kao što je „Napravljeno“.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2115">**StatusCode** - One-word result of the service call, such as "Created".</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2116">**StatusMessage** – Detalji o statusnom kodu, kao što je „Uspešno obezbeđeno“.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2116">**StatusMessage** - Details of the status code, such as 'Successfully provisioned."</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2117">**UsingNulApi** - Bulova vrednost koja pokazuje da li se koristi novi paket licenci.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2117">**UsingNulApi** - A Boolean indicating if we are using the new licensing stack.</span></span>

### <a name="officelicensinginrfm"></a><span data-ttu-id="d6247-2118">Office.Licensing.InRFM</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2118">Office.Licensing.InRFM</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-2119">Ako uređaj uđe u režim smanjene funkcionalnosti, šaljemo ovaj signal da bismo naznačili da se računar ne nalazi u ispravnom stanju.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2119">If the device enters reduced functionality mode, we send out this signal to indicate that the machine is not in a healthy state.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2120">Od suštinske je važnosti za određivanje da li se korisnik nalazi u dobrom statusu,a nedostaje mu funkcionalnost, za ispravnost sistema i za dijagnostičke svrhe ako korisnik prijavi problem na računaru</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2120">It is critical in detecting if the user is in a good state and missing functionality, used for system health and used for diagnostic purposes if a user reports an issue with their machine</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-2121">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2121">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2122">**ACID** – GUID identifikator koji predstavlja Office proizvod za koji je korisnik licenciran</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2122">**ACID** - A GUID identifier representing the Office product that the user is licensed for</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2123">**DaysRemaining** – Broj dana koji je preostao do isteka trenutne Office licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2123">**DaysRemaining** - Number of days remaining before the current Office license expires</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2124">**Mode** – Numeričko predstavljanje paketa licenci za sistem Office koji se koristi na računaru</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2124">**Mode** – An enumerator representation of the Office licensing stack that is being used on this machine</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2125">**ProductName** - Ime proizvoda koji korisnik trenutno koristi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2125">**ProductName** – Name of the product that the user is currently using</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2126">**Reason** - Kôd greške koji ukazuje na razlog trenutnog statusa licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2126">**Reason** – The error code indicating the reason for the current status of the license</span></span>

### <a name="officelicensinginstallkey"></a><span data-ttu-id="d6247-2127">Office.Licensing.InstallKey</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2127">Office.Licensing.InstallKey</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-2128">Ovo se prikuplja kada pokušavamo da instaliramo ključ na uređaj da bismo licencirali računar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2128">This is collected when we try to install a key on the device to license the machine.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2129">Izveštava da li je instalacija uspešna, a ako nije, šalje kôd greške.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2129">It reports whether the installation was successful and if it was not then the error code.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2130">Od suštinske je važnosti za određivanje da li se korisnik nalazi u dobrom statusu i ne nedostaje mu funkcionalnost, za ispravnost sistema i za dijagnostičke svrhe ako korisnik prijavi problem na računaru</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2130">It is critical in detecting if the user is in a good state and not missing functionality, used for system health and used for diagnostic purposes if a user reports an issue with their machine</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-2131">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2131">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2132">**Prid** - Ime grupe proizvoda za koju se instalira ključ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2132">**Prid** – Name of the product group for which a key is being installed</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2133">**SkuId** – GUID identifikator koji predstavlja Office proizvod za koji se instalira ključ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2133">**SkuId** - A GUID identifier representing the Office product for which a key is being installed</span></span> 

### <a name="officelicensinginvokelicensewizard"></a><span data-ttu-id="d6247-2134">Office.Licensing.InvokeLicenseWizard</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2134">Office.Licensing.InvokeLicenseWizard</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-2135">U slučaju da uočimo probleme s tokom rada aktivacije, pokrećemo čarobnjak za licencu i šaljemo ovaj signal da ukazuje na isto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2135">In case we see problems with the Activation workflow, we trigger a license wizard and send out this signal to indicate the same.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2136">Od suštinske je važnosti za određivanje da li se korisnik nalazi u dobrom statusu i ne nedostaje mu funkcionalnost, za ispravnost sistema i za dijagnostičke svrhe ako korisnik prijavi problem na računaru</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2136">It is critical in detecting if the user is in a good state and not missing functionality, used for system health and used for diagnostic purposes if a user reports an issue with their machine</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-2137">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2137">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2138">**Acid** – GUID identifikator koji predstavlja Office proizvod za koji je korisnik licenciran </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2138">**Acid** - A GUID identifier representing the Office product that the user is licensed for</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2139">**LicenseStatus** – Status Office licence koju korisnik koristi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2139">**LicenseStatus** – Status of the Office license that the user is using</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2140">**MachineKey** - Alfanumerički identifikator ključa licence koji je izdat korisniku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2140">**MachineKey** - An alphanumeric identifier of the license key that was issued to the user</span></span>

### <a name="officelicensinglicensingbar"></a><span data-ttu-id="d6247-2141">Office.Licensing.LicensingBar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2141">Office.Licensing.LicensingBar</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-2142">Ako uređaj naiđe na probleme sa licenciranjem i dođe do toga da korisniku prikažemo sabirnicu, šaljemo ovaj signal koji izveštava i o tipu sabirnice koja je prikazana korisniku.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2142">If the device is facing licensing issues and we end up showing a busbar to the user, we send out this signal which also reports the type of busbar shown to the user.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2143">Od suštinske je važnosti za određivanje da li se korisnik nalazi u dobrom statusu i ne nedostaje mu funkcionalnost, za ispravnost sistema i za dijagnostičke svrhe ako korisnik prijavi problem na računaru.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2143">It is critical in detecting if the user is in a good state and not missing functionality, used for system health and used for diagnostic purposes if a user reports an issue with their machine.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-2144">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2144">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2145">**SuppressNotification** - Označava da li smo potisnuli sabirnicu licenciranja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2145">**SuppressNotification** – Indicates if we suppressed the licensing busbar</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2146">**Title** - Naziv sabirnice licenciranja koja je prikazana korisniku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2146">**Title** – The title of the licensing busbar that was shown to the user</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2147">**Type** - Tip sabirnice licenciranja koja je prikazana korisniku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2147">**Type** – The type of the licensing busbar shown to the user</span></span>

### <a name="officelicensinglicexitofficeprocess"></a><span data-ttu-id="d6247-2148">Office.Licensing.LicExitOfficeProcess</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2148">Office.Licensing.LicExitOfficeProcess</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-2149">Ako dođe do zatvaranja ili pada sistema Office zbog problema sa licenciranjem, šaljemo ovaj signal da bismo to naznačili.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2149">If we end up closing or crashing Office due to a licensing issue, we send out this signal to indicate the same.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2150">Od suštinske je važnosti za određivanje da li se korisnik nalazi u dobrom statusu i ne nedostaje mu funkcionalnost, za ispravnost sistema i za dijagnostičke svrhe ako korisnik prijavi problem na računaru.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2150">It is critical in detecting if the user is in a good state and not missing functionality, used for system health and used for diagnostic purposes if a user reports an issue with their machine.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-2151">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2151">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2152">**ExitCode** - Unutrašnji kôd koji je izazvao zatvaranje aplikacije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2152">**ExitCode** – The internal code which caused the app to exit</span></span>

### <a name="officelicensingloadidentityticket"></a><span data-ttu-id="d6247-2153">Office.Licensing.LoadIdentityTicket</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2153">Office.Licensing.LoadIdentityTicket</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-2154">U toku pokušaja da se uređaj licencira, aplikacija pokušava da učita korisnikov identitet da bi videla da li korisnik ima pravo na sistem Office.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2154">In the process of trying to license the device, the app tries load the user's identity in order to see if the user has Office entitlement or not.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2155">Događaj prijavljuje uspeh ili neuspeh istog zajedno s eventualnom šifrom greške.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2155">This event reports the success or failure of the same along with the error code.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2156">Od suštinske je važnosti za određivanje da li se korisnik nalazi u dobrom statusu i ne nedostaje mu funkcionalnost, za ispravnost sistema i za dijagnostičke svrhe ako korisnik prijavi problem na računaru.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2156">It is critical in detecting if the user is in a good state and not missing functionality, used for system health and used for diagnostic purposes if a user reports an issue with their machine.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-2157">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2157">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2158">**FederationProvider** - Niska koja identifikuje dobavljača spoljnog pristupa za trenutno prijavljenog korisnika</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2158">**FederationProvider** – A string that identifies the federation provider for the currently logged in user</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2159">**IdentityProvider** - Niska koja identifikuje dobavljača identiteta za trenutno prijavljenog korisnika</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2159">**IdentityProvider** – A string that identifies the identity provider for the currently logged in user</span></span>

### <a name="officelicensinglvuxeulaexplicitcrash"></a><span data-ttu-id="d6247-2160">Office.Licensing.LVUX.EULAExplicitCrash</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2160">Office.Licensing.LVUX.EULAExplicitCrash</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-2161">Ovo se prikuplja ako smo korisniku prikazali EULA ugovor, a on je izabrao da ga ne prihvati što je dovelo do pada/zatvaranja aplikacije.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2161">This is collected if we showed the EULA to the user and the user chose to not accept it as a result of which we crash/close the app.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2162">Od suštinske je važnosti za određivanje da li se korisnik nalazi u dobrom statusu i ne nedostaje mu funkcionalnost, za ispravnost sistema i za dijagnostičke svrhe ako korisnik prijavi problem na računaru.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2162">It is critical in detecting if the user is in a good state and not missing functionality, used for system health and used for diagnostic purposes if a user reports an issue with their machine.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-2163">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2163">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2164">**Acid** – GUID identifikator koji predstavlja Office proizvod za koji je korisnik licenciran </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2164">**Acid** - A GUID identifier representing the Office product that the user is licensed for</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2165">**OptInShown** – označava je li dijalog za uključivanje koji se prikazuje prilikom prvog pokretanja aplikacije već prikazan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2165">**OptInShown** – Indicates whether the opt-in dialog shown on the first boot of the app has already been shown</span></span>

### <a name="officelicensingnextuserlicensingeligible"></a><span data-ttu-id="d6247-2166">Office.Licensing.NextUserLicensingEligible</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2166">Office.Licensing.NextUserLicensingEligible</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-2167">Ovaj signal nam pokazuje da li je korisnik kvalifikovan za prelazak na novi paket licenci.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2167">This signal tells us if a user is qualified to move to our new licensing stack.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2168">Ovo je od suštinske važnosti za određivanje stepena uticaja na postojeće korisnike dok objavljujemo nove pakete licenci i obezbeđivanje da korisnici zadrže funkcionalnost.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2168">This is critical to quantify the impact on existing users as we roll out our new licensing stack and make sure that users are not losing functionality.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-2169">Ovaj događaj ne prikuplja nikakva polja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2169">This event collects no fields.</span></span>

### <a name="officelicensingnulfetcherfetchmodelfromols"></a><span data-ttu-id="d6247-2170">Office.Licensing.Nul.Fetcher.FetchModelFromOls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2170">Office.Licensing.Nul.Fetcher.FetchModelFromOls</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-2171">Kada je uređaj na modernom paketu licence, trudimo se da datoteku licence preuzmemo direktno iz usluge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2171">When the device is on the modern licensing stack, we try to get a license file directly from the service.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2172">Ovaj događaj izveštava o uspešnosti ili neuspešnosti, kao i o kôdu greške kod poziva usluge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2172">This event reports the success or failure along with the error code of that service call.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2173">Ključan je za otkrivanje je li korisnik u dobrom stanju na modernom paketu za licenciranje, koristi se u svrhe određivanja stanja sistema i za dijagnostiku ako korisnik prijavi problem s mašinom.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2173">It is critical to detect if the user is in a good state on the modern licensing stack, used for system health and used for diagnostic purposes if a user reports an issue with their machine.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-2174">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2174">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2175">**MetadataValidationResult** - Rezultat provere valjanosti metapodataka licence da bi se proverilo da nisu neovlašćeno promenjeni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2175">**MetadataValidationResult** – Result of the validation of the metadata of the license to verify that it has not been tampered with</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2176">**SignatureValidationResult** - Rezultat provere valjanosti potpisa da bi se proverilo da nije neovlašćeno promenjen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2176">**SignatureValidationResult** – Result of the validation of the signature of the license to verify that it has not been tampered with</span></span>

### <a name="officelicensingnulvalidationfullvalidation"></a><span data-ttu-id="d6247-2177">Office.Licensing.Nul.Validation.FullValidation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2177">Office.Licensing.Nul.Validation.FullValidation</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-2178">Ovo se prikuplja pri svakoj sesiji uređaja koji je pokrenut na modernom paketu licence.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2178">This is collected on every session of a device that is running on the modern licensing stack.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2179">Prijavljuje stanje licenciranja mašine i prijavljuje greške koje se korisniku prikazuju i zbog kojih ne može koristiti aplikaciju.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2179">It reports the licensing state of the machine and reports the errors that the user is seeing due to which they are not able to use the app.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2180">Događaj označava je li korisnikova mašina u dobrom stanju na modernom paketu za licenciranje.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2180">This event indicates if the user's machine is healthy on the modern licensing stack.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2181">Za ovaj događaj imamo podešen detektor anomalija da bismo označili da li regresija uzrokuje neispravno ponašanje korisnika.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2181">We have anomaly detection set up for this event to indicate if a regression is causing bad user behavior.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2182">Takođe je od suštinske važnosti pri dijagnostikovanju korisničkih problema i za nadgledanje ispravnosti sistema.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2182">This is also critical when diagnosing user issues and for monitoring system health.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-2183">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2183">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2184">**Acid** – GUID identifikator koji predstavlja Office proizvod za koji je korisnik licenciran </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2184">**Acid** - A GUID identifier representing the Office product that the user is licensed for</span></span> 

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2185">**AllAcids** - Lista svih GUID proizvoda za koje je korisnik trenutno licenciran</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2185">**AllAcids** – List of all the GUIDs of the product that the user is currently licensed for</span></span> 

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2186">**Category** – Kategorija Office licence koju korisnik koristi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2186">**Category** - Category of the Office license that the user is using</span></span> 

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2187">**DaysRemaining** – Broj dana koji je preostao do isteka trenutne Office licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2187">**DaysRemaining** – Number of days remaining before the current Office license expires</span></span> 

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2188">**LicenseId** - Alfanumerički identifikator licence koji je izdat korisniku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2188">**LicenseId** – An alphanumeric identifier of the license that was issued to the user</span></span> 

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2189">**LicenseType** – Tip Office licence koju korisnik koristi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2189">**LicenseType** - Type of the Office license that the user is using</span></span> 

### <a name="officelicensingofficeclientlicensingdolicensevalidation"></a><span data-ttu-id="d6247-2190">Office.Licensing.OfficeClientLicensing.DoLicenseValidation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2190">Office.Licensing.OfficeClientLicensing.DoLicenseValidation</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-2191">Ovo su metapodaci licenciranja koji se prikupljaju pri svakom pokretanju i koji izveštavaju o proizvodu, statusu, tipu i drugim svojstvima licence koja su važna za određivanje skupa funkcija dostupnih korisniku.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2191">This is licensing metadata that is collected from the device on every boot that reports the license acid, license status, type and other properties of the license that are critical in identifying the features set available to the user.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2192">Od suštinske je važnosti za određivanje skupa funkcija koje su dostupne korisniku i da li nedostaje neka funkcionalnost.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2192">This is critical in identifying the feature set available to the user and if any functionality is missing for the user.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2193">Takođe se koristi i za izračunavanje broja dnevno/mesečno aktivnih korisnika, kao i za različite izveštaje koje koriste razni timovi u svim Office oblastima, jer nam to govori koji tip proizvoda koristi korisnik, da li je u pitanju pretplata na proizvod i da li nedostaje neka bitna funkcionalnost.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2193">It is also used for Daily active users/Monthly active user calculations and various other reports by various teams across Office as this tells the type product that the user is using, whether it is a subscription product and whether they are missing any critical functionality.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-2194">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2194">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2195">**FullValidationMode** - Režim koji ukazuje na to da se nalazimo u potpunoj validaciji verifikacije licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2195">**FullValidationMode** – Mode indicating that we are in full validation of license verification</span></span> 

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2196">**IsRFM** - Ukazuje na to da li se korisnik nalazi u režimu smanjene funkcionalnosti ili ne</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2196">**IsRFM** – Indicates whether the user is in reduced functionality mode or not</span></span> 

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2197">**IsSCA** - Ukazuje na to da li se nalazimo u režimu aktivacije deljenog računara</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2197">**IsSCA** – Indicates whether we are running in Shared computer activation mode</span></span> 

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2198">**IsSubscription** - Ukazuje na to da li korisnik koristi licencu za pretplatu ili ne</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2198">**IsSubscription** – Indicates whether the user is using a subscription license or not</span></span> 

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2199">**IsvNext** - Ukazuje na to da li koristimo novi moderni paket licenciranja ili ne</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2199">**IsvNext** – Indicates whether we are using the new modern licensing stack or not</span></span> 

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2200">**LicenseCategory** – Kategorija Office licence koju koristi korisnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2200">**LicenseCategory** - Category of the Office license that the user is using</span></span> 

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2201">**LicenseStatus** – Status Office licence koju korisnik koristi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2201">**LicenseStatus** – Status of the Office license that the user is using</span></span> 

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2202">**LicenseType** – Tip Office licence koju korisnik koristi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2202">**LicenseType** - Type of the Office license that the user is using</span></span> 

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2203">**LicensingACID** – GUID identifikator koji predstavlja Office proizvod za koji je korisnik licenciran</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2203">**LicensingACID** - A GUID identifier representing the Office product that the user is licensed for</span></span> 

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2204">**OlsLicenseId** - Alfanumerički identifikator licence koji je izdat korisniku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2204">**OlsLicenseId** - An alphanumeric identifier of the license that was issued to the user</span></span> 

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2205">**SkuIdIsNull** – Ukazuje na to da li smo naišli na grešku i ne znamo koji proizvod korisnika pokreće</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2205">**SkuIdIsNull** – Indicates whether we encountered an error and don't know the product that the user is running</span></span> 

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2206">**SlapiIsNull** - Ukazuje na to da li smo naišli na problem u popunjavanju jednog od objekata licenciranja </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2206">**SlapiIsNull** – Indicates whether we encountered a problem in populating one of the licensing objects</span></span> 

### <a name="officelicensingonlinerepair"></a><span data-ttu-id="d6247-2207">Office.Licensing.OnlineRepair</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2207">Office.Licensing.OnlineRepair</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-2208">Ovaj događaj se pokreće ako iz nekog razloga nismo u mogućnosti da aktiviramo korisnika i moramo da im prikažemo dijalog koji mu traži da se priključi na mrežu i pokuša da prati korake za popravak.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2208">If we are not able to activate a user for some reason and have to show them a dialog that asks them to go online and try repair steps, this event is fired.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2209">Od suštinske je važnosti za određivanje da li se korisnik nalazi u dobrom statusu i ne nedostaje mu funkcionalnost, za ispravnost sistema i za dijagnostičke svrhe ako korisnik prijavi problem na računaru</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2209">It is critical in detecting if the user is in a good state and not missing functionality, used for system health and used for diagnostic purposes if a user reports an issue with their machine</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-2210">Ovaj događaj ne prikuplja polja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2210">This event collects no fields.</span></span>

### <a name="officelicensingoobetrybuychoice"></a><span data-ttu-id="d6247-2211">Office.Licensing.OOBE.TryBuyChoice</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2211">Office.Licensing.OOBE.TryBuyChoice</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-2212">Korisnicima, koji imaju unapred instaliran Office na novim računarima i koji ne poseduju prava na sistem Office, prikazuje se dijalog pomoću kog mogu da isprobaju, kupe ili unesu šifru proizvoda da bi dobili licencu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2212">Users with pre-installed Office on new machines who have no Office entitlement are shown a dialog through which they can try, buy or enter a product key to get licensed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2213">Ovaj događaj beleži radnju korisnika u dijalogu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2213">This event captures the user action on the dialog.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2214">Ovaj događaj se koristi za praćenje korisničke radnje izvršene u dijalogu koji se prikazuje korisnicima bez prava na Office, kod kojih je Office unapred instaliran na računaru, s namerom da pomogne pri utvrđivanju da li korisnik ima licencu ili ne.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2214">This event is used to track the user action taken on the dialog shown to users with no Office entitlement where Office was pre-installed on the machine and helps determining if the user is licensed or unlicensed by design.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-2215">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2215">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2216">**Buy** - Obaveštava da li je korisnik kliknuo na dugme „Kupi“ ili nije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2216">**Buy** - Tells if the user clicked on the buy button or not</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2217">**ForceAutoActivate** - Obaveštava da li treba pokušati aktivaciju u aplikaciji ili ne</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2217">**ForceAutoActivate** - Tells if in-app activation should be attempted or not</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2218">**GoBackToSignIn** - Obaveštava da li je korisnik želeo ponovo da se prijavi (verovatno sa drugim nalogom)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2218">**GoBackToSignIn** - Tells if the user wanted to sign in again (possibly with another account)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2219">**IsPin** - Obaveštava da li je korisnik uneo pin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2219">**IsPin** - Tells if the user entered a pin</span></span>
