- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2220">**ProductKey** - Obaveštava da li je korisnik pokušao da unese šifru proizvoda</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2220">**ProductKey** - Tells if the user tried to enter a product key</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2221">**Try** - Obaveštava da li je korisnik kliknuo na dugme „Isprobaj“ ili nije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2221">**Try** - Tells if the user clicked on the try button or not</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2222">**UserDismissed** – Obaveštava da li je korisnik odbacio dijalog i da li se samim tim nalazi u grejs periodu ili u režimu smanjene funkcionalnosti jer nije izabrao da kupi ili isproba Office</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2222">**UserDismissed** - This tells if the user dismissed the dialog and thus would be in grace or reduced functionality mode because they didn't choose to buy office or get a trial</span></span>

### <a name="officelicensingpurchase"></a><span data-ttu-id="d6247-2223">Office.Licensing.Purchase</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2223">Office.Licensing.Purchase</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-2224">*[Ovaj događaj je uklonjen iz aktuelnih verzija sistema Office, ali se i dalje može pojavljivati u starijim verzijama.]*</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2224">*[This event has been removed from current builds of Office, but might still appear in older builds.]*</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-2225">Imamo eksperiment u kojem se korisniku nudi mogućnost da isproba i postavi automatsko plaćanje sistema Office direktno iz aplikacije, a da ni u jednom trenutku ne mora da izađe iz aplikacije.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2225">We have an experiment that gives the user an option to try and set up autopay for Office directly from an app without ever leaving the context of the app.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2226">Ovo izveštava o uspešnosti ili neuspešnosti datog eksperimenta, kao i o kôdu greške. Od suštinske je važnosti za određivanje da li se korisnik nalazi u dobrom statusu i ne nedostaje mu funkcionalnost, za ispravnost sistema i za dijagnostičke svrhe ako korisnik prijavi problem na računaru.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2226">This reports the success or failure of that experiment along with the error code It is critical in detecting if the user is in a good state and not missing functionality, used for system health and used for diagnostic purposes if a user reports an issue with their machine.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-2227">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2227">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2228">**StorePurchaseStatus** - Predstavlja kôd greške/uspeha poziva za kupovinu koji je upućen in Windows prodavnice</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2228">**StorePurchaseStatus** – Represents the error code/success code of the purchase call that was made through windows store</span></span>

### <a name="officelicensingsearchforsessiontoken"></a><span data-ttu-id="d6247-2229">Office.Licensing.SearchForSessionToken</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2229">Office.Licensing.SearchForSessionToken</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-2230">Ako se korisnik nalazi u režimu aktivacije deljenog računara, pokušavamo da pronađemo token sesije na računaru koji dozvoljava korisniku da koristi aplikaciju.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2230">If the user is running under shared computer activation mode, we try to search for a session token on the machine which allows the user to use the app.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2231">Događaj prijavljuje uspeh ili neuspeh scenarija zajedno s eventualnom šifrom greške.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2231">This event reports the success or failure of the scenario along with the error code.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2232">Od suštinske je važnosti za određivanje da li se korisnik nalazi u dobrom statusu i ne nedostaje mu funkcionalnost, za ispravnost sistema i za dijagnostičke svrhe ako korisnik prijavi problem na računaru.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2232">It is critical in detecting if the user is in a good state and not missing functionality, used for system health and used for diagnostic purposes if a user reports an issue with their machine.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-2233">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2233">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2234">**LoadLicenseResult** - Predstavlja kôd greške/uspeha za to da li smo bili u mogućnosti da učitamo licence za trenutnog korisnika</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2234">**LoadLicenseResult** – Represents the error code/success code of whether we were able to load the licenses for the current user</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2235">**OpportunisticTokenRenewalAttempted** – Ukazuje na to da li smo pokušali da oportunistički obnovimo token korisnikove sesije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2235">**OpportunisticTokenRenewalAttempted** – Indicates whether we attempted to renew the user's session token opportunistically</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2236">**SetAcidResult** - Predstavlja kôd greške/uspeha za to da li smo bili u mogućnosti da podesimo acid na očekivane vrednosti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2236">**SetAcidResult** – Represent the error code/success code of whether we were able to set the acid to the expected value</span></span>

### <a name="officelicensingshownewdeviceactivationdialog"></a><span data-ttu-id="d6247-2237">Office.Licensing.ShowNewDeviceActivationDialog</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2237">Office.Licensing.ShowNewDeviceActivationDialog</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-2238">Prilikom prvog pokretanja Office aplikacije, pokušaćemo da prikažemo dijalog za prijavljivanje koji je unapred popunjen sa akreditivima koje je korisnik upotrebio da bi preuzeo sistem Office.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2238">On the first boot of an Office app, we will try to show a sign in dialog pre-populated with the credentials the user employed to download Office.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2239">Korisnik zatim može da nastavi prijavljivanje sa tim akreditivima, da koristi druge ili da odbaci dijalog.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2239">The user can then continue to sign-in with those credentials, use different credentials or dismiss the dialog.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2240">Ovaj događaj izveštava o aktivnosti koju je izvršio korisnik kada mu je prikazan dijalog.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2240">This event reports the action taken by the user when presented with this dialog.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2241">Od suštinske je važnosti za određivanje da li se korisnik nalazi u dobrom statusu kod modernog paketa licence, za ispravnost sistema i za svrhe dijagnostikovanja ako korisnik prijavi problem na računaru</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2241">It is critical for detecting if a user is in a good state on the modern licensing stack, used for system health and used for diagnostic purposes if a user reports an issue with their machine</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-2242">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2242">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2243">**UserAction** - Identifikator aktivnosti koju je izvršio korisnik kada mu je prikazan dijalog.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2243">**UserAction** – Identifier for the action taken by the user when presented with the dialog.</span></span>

### <a name="officelicensingskutoskuconversion"></a><span data-ttu-id="d6247-2244">Office.Licensing.SkuToSkuConversion</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2244">Office.Licensing.SkuToSkuConversion</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-2245">U sklopu licenciranja korisnika, ako treba da promenimo korisnikov SKU iz jednog u drugi, šaljemo ovaj signal zajedno sa kodom uspeha ili neuspeha.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2245">As part of licensing the user, if we have to change the user's SKU from one SKU to another, we send this signal out along with the success or failure code.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2246">Od suštinske je važnosti za određivanje da li se korisnik nalazi u dobrom statusu, a nedostaje mu funkcionalnost, za ispravnost sistema i za dijagnostičke svrhe ako korisnik prijavi problem na računaru.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2246">It is critical in detecting if the user is in a good state and missing functionality, used for system health and used for diagnostic purposes if a user reports an issue with their machine.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-2247">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2247">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2248">**DestinationSku** - Ime SKU na koji trenutno instalirani proizvod treba da bude konvertovan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2248">**DestinationSku** – Name of the SKU to which the currently installed product should be converted to</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2249">**PendingAcid** - Ime proizvoda čija je SKU konverzija na čekanju</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2249">**PendingAcid** – ID of the product for which a SKU conversion is pending</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2250">**SourceSku** - Ime prvobitnog SKU koji je instaliran na računaru</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2250">**SourceSku** – Name of the original SKU that was installed on the machine</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2251">**UninstallProduct** - Ukazuje na to da li će stari proizvod biti deinstaliran u sklopu konverzije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2251">**UninstallProduct** – Indicates whether the old product will be uninstalled as part of the conversion</span></span>

### <a name="officelicensingtelemetryflowolsresults"></a><span data-ttu-id="d6247-2252">Office.Licensing.TelemetryFlow.OLSResults</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2252">Office.Licensing.TelemetryFlow.OLSResults</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-2253">Kada korisnik nema licencu, upućujemo nekoliko poziva usluzi da bi dobio licencu i aktivirao svoj Office proizvod.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2253">When a user is unlicensed, we make several service calls to get the user into a licensed state and to activate their Office product.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2254">Ovaj događaj se pokreće prilikom pozivanja Office usluge licenciranja da bi se proverilo da li korisnik poseduje prava.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2254">This event gets triggered on calling the Office Licensing Service to check if the user has entitlements.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2255">Ovaj događaj se koristi za praćenje ispravnosti korisničkog licenciranja nakon pozivanja Office usluge licenciranja i ispravnosti Office klijenta nakon pokušaja aktivacije sistema Office.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2255">This event is going to be used to track the user licensing health after calling the Office Licensing Service and the Office Client health after attempting to get Office activated.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-2256">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2256">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2257">**EntitlementPickerShown** - Obaveštava da li korisnik poseduje više prava i da li je morao ručno da odabere neko od njih da bi dobio licencu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2257">**EntitlementPickerShown** - Tells if the user had multiple entitlements and if the user had to manually choose from them to get licensed</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2258">**GetAuthResult** - Obaveštava o različitim stanjima u kojima se može naći klijent, na primer, ako je dobio praznu šifru proizvoda od Office usluge licenciranja ili ako je posedovao prava za drugi proizvod, a Office treba da se konvertuje u novi proizvod</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2258">**GetAuthResult** - Tells various states the client might be in like if they got an empty product key from the Office Licensing Service or if they were entitled for another product and Office needs to be converted to the new product</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2259">**GetEntitlementsCount** - Obaveštava o broju prava koji korisnik poseduje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2259">**GetEntitlementsCount** - Tells the number of entitlements the user has</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2260">**GetEntitlementsSucceeded** – Obaveštava da li je poziv upućen API usluzi Office licenciranja radi preuzimanja korisničkog prava bio uspešan ili ne</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2260">**GetEntitlementsSucceeded** - Tells if the call to an Office Licensing Service API to retrieve the user's entitlements succeeded or not</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2261">**GetKeySucceeded** - Obaveštava da li je poziv upućen API usluzi Office licenciranja radi preuzimanja šifre bio uspešan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2261">**GetKeySucceeded** - Tells if the call to an Office Licensing Service API to retrieve a key succeeded</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2262">**GetNextUserLicenseResult** - Obaveštava da li je moderan paket licenci mogao da funkcioniše i da li je korisnik dobio licencu ili ne</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2262">**GetNextUserLicenseResult** - Tells if the modern licensing stack was able to work and if the user got licensed or not</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2263">**InstallKeyResult** - Obaveštava o različitim razlozima zbog kojih se korisnik može nalaziti u lošem stanju, kao što je neuspela aktivacija ili neuspela instalacija šifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2263">**InstallKeyResult** - Tells various reasons why the user might be in a bad state like if activation failed or the installation of the key failed</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2264">**NotInitializedBeforeWhileAdding** - Ovo je samo informativno i obaveštava da li je događaj dodat u mapu za upravljanje telemetrijom, a da nije izričito urađena registracija za to</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2264">**NotInitializedBeforeWhileAdding** - This is just informational and tells if the event was added to a telemetry manager map without explicitly registering for it</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2265">**NotInitializedBeforeWhileSending** - Ovo je samo informativno i obaveštava da li je pokušano slanje događaja, a da ranije nije urađena izričita registracija za to u mapi za upravljanje telemetrijom</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2265">**NotInitializedBeforeWhileSending** - This is just informational and tells if the event was attempted to be sent without explicitly registering for it in the telemetry manager map before hand</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2266">**SentOnDestruction** – Ovo je samo informativno i obaveštava da li je događaj dodat u mapu za upravljanje telemetrijom, a nije izričito poslat</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2266">**SentOnDestruction** - This is just informational and tells if the event was added to a telemetry manager map and wasn't sent explicitly</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2267">**Tag** - Koristi se da saopšti sa kog mesta u kodu je poslat događaj</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2267">**Tag** - Used for telling where in the code the event was sent from</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2268">**VerifyEntitlementsResult** - Obaveštava o različitim stanjima u kojima se može nalaziti korisnik nakon provere valjanosti prava preuzetih iz Office usluge licenciranja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2268">**VerifyEntitlementsResult** - Tells various states the user might be in after validating the entitlements retrieved from the Office Licensing Service</span></span>

### <a name="officelicensingtelemetryflowsearchforbindingresult"></a><span data-ttu-id="d6247-2269">Office.Licensing.TelemetryFlow.SearchForBindingResult</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2269">Office.Licensing.TelemetryFlow.SearchForBindingResult</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-2270">OEM proizvođači prodaju računare koji dolaze sa sistemom Office (sa jednogodišnjom ili stalnom pretplatom).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2270">OEMs sell machines that come with Office (one-year subscriptions or perpetual).</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2271">Ovi Office proizvodi su plaćeni kada klijent kupi svoj računar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2271">These Office products are paid for when the customer purchases their machine.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2272">Mašine koje se podešavaju pomoću određenog reg.ključa (OOBEMode: OEMTA) možda su povezane Office povezivanjem.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2272">Machines that are set up with a specific regkey (OOBEMode: OEMTA) might have an Office binding associated with it.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2273">Kada na takvim računarima pokrenemo Office, izvršavamo provere usluge da bismo videli da li je pronađen obavezujući Office ugovor za odgovarajući računar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2273">When we boot Office on such machines, we perform service checks to see if an Office binding corresponding to the machine is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-2274">Ova aktivnost telemetrije prati tačke uspeha i neuspeha u pretraživanju obavezujućeg ugovora da bismo bili sigurni da računari koji ga imaju mogu uspešno da ga preuzmu i da su naše usluge ispravne.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2274">This telemetry activity tracks the success and failure points in searching for a binding so that we can ensure that machines that do have a binding can successfully fetch them, and that our services are healthy.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2275">Nakon provere sa našim uslugama, ova aktivnost ne prati računare za koje se ispostavi da nemaju nikakav obavezujući ugovor koji je povezan sa njima.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2275">This activity does not track machines that turn out to not have any bindings associated with them after we check with our services.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-2276">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2276">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2277">**DexShouldRetry** – Signal da smo pronašli problem koji se može ponovo pokušati (internet i nijedan server nisu prestali sa radom)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2277">**DexShouldRetry** - Signal that we’ve hit a retryable issue (no internet or servers are down)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2278">**GenuineTicketFailure** – Obaveštava nas o grešci HRESULT prilikom pokušaja preuzimanja originalnog Windows tiketa/šifre proizvoda (WPK) za računar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2278">**GenuineTicketFailure** - Tells us the failure HRESULT when trying to get the machine's Windows genuine ticket/product key (WPK).</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2279">**PinValidationFailure** - Obaveštava nas zašto nije uspeo proces provere valjanosti pin-a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2279">**PinValidationFailure** - Tells us why the pin validation process failed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2280">Moguće greške:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2280">Possible errors:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2281">Blokirana geografska zona</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2281">GeoBlocked</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2282">Nevažeći format </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2282">InvalidFormat</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2283">Nevažeći pin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2283">InvalidPin</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2284">Nevažeće stanje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2284">InvalidState</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2285">Nevažeća verzija</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2285">InvalidVersion</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2286">Nepoznato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2286">Unknown</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2287">Iskorišćeno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2287">Used</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2288">**PinValidationResult** - Obaveštava nas o rezultatu provere valjanosti pin-a za pin koji nismo uspeli da razbijemo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2288">**PinValidationResult** - Tells us the pin validation result of a pin that we failed to crack.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2289">**Pkpn** - opseg pkpn-a kome pripada pin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2289">**Pkpn** - The pkpn range that the pin belongs to.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2290">**Success** - Pokazuje da smo uspešno preuzeli važeći obavezujući Office ugovor (pin) za računar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2290">**Success** - Indicates that we successfully fetched a valid Office binding (pin) for the machine.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2291">**Tag** - Obaveštava kada smo prestali da pretražujemo obavezujući ugovor.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2291">**Tag** - Tells us at which step we stopped searching for a binding.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2292">Moguće oznake:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2292">Possible tags:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2293">0x03113809    Nema internet veze/usluge prilikom provere valjanosti PIN koda</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2293">0x03113809    No internet/service error while validating pin</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2294">0x0311380a    Neuspeh provere valjanosti PIN koda, poslato pomoću polja „PinValidationFailure“</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2294">0x0311380a    Pin validation failure, sent with PinValidationFailure field</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2295">0x0310410f    Uspeh, poslato pomoću polja „Success“</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2295">0x0310410f    Success, sent with Success field</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2296">0x0311380d    Greške kod kojih je moguć ponovni pokušaj (problemi sa internet vezom, nepoznate greške)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2296">0x0311380d    Retry-able errors (internet issues, unknown errors)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2297">0x0311380e    Greške kod kojih nije moguć ponovni pokušaj (ponuda obavezujućeg ugovora je istekla)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2297">0x0311380e    Non-retry-able errors (binding offer expired)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2298">0x0311380f    Druge greške (licenciranje nije moguće)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2298">0x0311380f    Other errors (unable to license)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2299">0x03104111    Nije uspelo razbijanje Office pin-a, poslato pomoću polja „PinValidationResult“</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2299">0x03104111    Failed to crack the Office pin, sent with PinValidationResult field</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2300">**WpkBindingFailure** – Obaveštava o kodu greške kod povezivanja Office PIN koda sa WPK-om računara.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2300">**WpkBindingFailure** - Tells us the error code of getting the Office pin bound to the machine's WPK.</span></span>

### <a name="officelicensingtelemetryflowshowafodialogs"></a><span data-ttu-id="d6247-2301">Office.Licensing.TelemetryFlow.ShowAFODialogs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2301">Office.Licensing.TelemetryFlow.ShowAFODialogs</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-2302">Nakon uspešnog pribavljanja važećeg Office pin-a koji je povezan sa računarom sa kojim dolazi Office paket, korisniku prikazujemo dijalog za prijavljivanje ili preuzimanje.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2302">After successfully obtaining a valid Office pin bound to a machine pre-bundled with Office, we show the user either a sign-in dialog or a redemption dialog.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2303">Kada se preuzme pin, prikazujemo dijalog za EULA ugovor.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2303">Once the pin is redeemed, we show the EULA dialog.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2304">U sklopu naše modernizacije AFO funkcije, osvežili smo dva dijaloga da bismo preneli više informacija o Office proizvodima koji dolaze sa računarom.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2304">As a part of our modernizing AFO feature, we refreshed the two dialogs to convey more information regarding the Office product that comes with the machine.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2305">Ova telemetrija služi za praćenje da li funkcija smanjuje korisničke probleme u preuzimanju njihovog proizvoda, tako što prati tok i tačke izlaska iz procesa preuzimanja (koji dijalog je odbačen).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2305">This telemetry is to track if our feature successfully reduces user friction in redeeming their product by tracking the flow and exit points of the redemption process (which dialog was dismissed).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-2306">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2306">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2307">**ActionActivate** – Signal da je korisnik kliknuo na dugme „Aktiviraj“.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2307">**ActionActivate** - Signal that user clicked the “Activate” button.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2308">**ActionChangeAccount** – Signal da je korisnik kliknuo na hipervezu „Koristite drugi nalog“.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2308">**ActionChangeAccount** -  Signal that user clicked the “Use a different account” hyperlink.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2309">**ActionCreateAccount** – Signal da je korisnik kliknuo na dugme „Kreiraj nalog“.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2309">**ActionCreateAccount** - Signal that user clicked the “Create account” button.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2310">**ActionSignIn** – Signal da je korisnik kliknuo na dugme „Prijavite se“.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2310">**ActionSignIn** - Signal that user clicked the “Sign in” button.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2311">**CurrentView** – Tip dijaloga koji je korisnik zatvorio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2311">**CurrentView** - The type of dialog the user closed.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2312">**DialogEULA** – Signal da smo prikazali dijalog „Prihvatite EULA“.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2312">**DialogEULA** -  Signal that we showed the ‘Accept EULA’ dialog.</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2313">**DialogRedemption** – Signal da smo prikazali dijalog „AFO iskorišćavanje“.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2313">**DialogRedemption** - Signal that we showed the AFO redemption dialog.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2314">**DialogSignIn** – Signal da smo prikazali dijalog „AFO prijavljivanje“.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2314">**DialogSignIn** - Signal that we showed the AFO sign-in dialog.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2315">**EmptyRedemptionDefaults** – Signal da nismo uspeli da dobavimo informacije o podrazumevanom iskorišćavanju.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2315">**EmptyRedemptionDefaults** - Signal that we failed to fetch default redemption information.</span></span>
 
- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2316">**GetRedemptionInfo** – Signal da dobavljamo informacije o demografiji za iskorišćavanje PIN koda.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2316">**GetRedemptionInfo** - Signal that we’re fetching demographic information for pin redemption.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2317">**MalformedCountryCode** – Signal da je pozivni broj za zemlju koji je potreban za iskorišćavanje PIN koda pogrešno uobličen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2317">**MalformedCountryCode** - Signal that the country code needed for pin redemption is malformed.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2318">**OExDetails** – Detalji o grešci koje dobijemo kada je odbačen dijalog za prijavljivanje sa identitetom.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2318">**OExDetails** - The error details we get back when identity's sign-in dialog was dismissed.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2319">**OExType** – Tip greške koji dobijemo kada je odbačen dijalog za prijavljivanje pomoću identiteta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2319">**OExType** - The error type we get back when identity's sign-in dialog was dismissed.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2320">**Tag** - Obaveštava nas na kom koraku je korisnik izašao iz AFO procesa preuzimanja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2320">**Tag** - Tells us at which step the user exits the AFO redemption process.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2321">Moguće oznake:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2321">Possible tags:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2322">0x0311380b    Korisnik je u dijalogu za preuzimanje odbacio dijalog za prijavljivanje pomoću identiteta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2322">0x0311380b    User dismissed identity's sign-in dialog from redemption dialog</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2323">0x0311380c    Nije uspelo automatsko učitavanje identiteta nakon korisničkog prijavljivanja iz dijaloga za preuzimanje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2323">0x0311380c    Failed to auto-load an identity post user sign-in from redemption dialog</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2324">0x03113810    Nije uspelo učitavanje demografskih informacija o nalogu (državni kôd, jezik,     valuta, ponuda za probnu verziju i željene postavke za reklame)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2324">0x03113810    Failed to load the account's demographic information (country code, language,     currency, trial offer, and marketing preferences)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2325">0x03113805    Korisnik je u dijalogu za prijavljivanje odbacio dijalog za prijavljivanje pomoću identiteta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2325">0x03113805    User dismissed identity's sign-in dialog from sign-in dialog</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2326">0x03113806    Nije uspelo automatsko učitavanje identiteta nakon korisničkog prijavljivanja iz dijaloga za prijavljivanje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2326">0x03113806    Failed to auto-load an identity post user sign-in from sign-in dialog</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2327">0x03113807   Nije uspelo automatsko učitavanje identiteta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2327">0x03113807    Failed to auto-load an identity</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2328">0x03113811    Korisnik je zatvorio dijalog za prijavljivanje/preuzimanje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2328">0x03113811    User closed the sign-in/redemption dialog</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2329">0x03113812    Korisnik je zatvorio dijalog za prihvatanje EULA ugovora</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2329">0x03113812    User closed the accept EULA dialog</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2330">0x03113808    Korisnik je prihvatio EULA ugovor</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2330">0x03113808    User accepted the EULA</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2331">0x03113811      Korisnik je zatvorio dijalog</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2331">0x03113811      User closed a dialog</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2332">0x2370e3a0      Korisnik je zatvorio dijalog</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2332">0x2370e3a0      User closed a dialog</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2333">0x2370e3c1      Idi na veb radi iskorišćavanja PIN koda</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2333">0x2370e3c1      Go to web for pin redemption</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2334">0x2370e3a1      Idi na veb radi iskorišćavanja PIN koda</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2334">0x2370e3a1      Go to web for pin redemption</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2335">0x2370e3c0      Petlja sekvence dijaloga do koje je doveo korisnik koji se kretao napred-nazad u toku dijaloga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2335">0x2370e3c0      Dialog sequence looped caused by user going back and forth in the dialog flow</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2336">0x2370e3a3      Korisnik je kliknuo na hipervezu „Ne sada“, koja preskače AFO ponudu za tu sesiju</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2336">0x2370e3a3      User clicked “Not now” hyperlink which skips the AFO offer for that session</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2337">0x2370e3a2      Korisnik je kliknuo na hipervezu „Nikada ne prikazuj ovo“, koja onemogućava AFO ponudu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2337">0x2370e3a2      User clicked on “Never show this to me” hyperlink which disables the AFO offer</span></span>


- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2338">**UseInAppRedemption** – Obaveštava nas da li zadržavamo korisnike u aplikaciji radi preuzimanja ili ih prebacujemo na veb da bi iskoristili svoj preuzeti pin (unapred popunjen).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2338">**UseInAppRedemption** - Tells us if we're keeping users in-app for redemption or sending them to the web to redeem their fetched pin (pre-populated).</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2339">**UseModernAFO** – Obaveštava nas da li koristimo staro ili novo AFO iskustvo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2339">**UseModernAFO** - Tells us if we're using the new or old AFO experience.</span></span>

### <a name="officelicensingtelemetryflowshowtrybuydialogforoobe"></a><span data-ttu-id="d6247-2340">Office.Licensing.TelemetryFlow.ShowTryBuyDialogForOOBE</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2340">Office.Licensing.TelemetryFlow.ShowTryBuyDialogForOOBE</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-2341">Kada novi računari imaju unapred instaliran sistem Office, a korisnici ne poseduju prava na njega, prikazujemo dijalog koji korisniku daje opciju da isproba, kupi ili unese šifru proizvoda da bi dobio licencu. Ovaj događaj prati da li je dijalog prikazan. </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2341">When new machines have Office pre-installed and the user doesn't have an entitlement we show a dialog which gives the user the option to try, buy or enter a product key so that the user can get licensed and this event tracks if the dialog was shown.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2342">Ovaj događaj nam omogućuje da saznamo da li je dijalog prikazan korisniku kako bi isprobao, kupio ili uneo šifru proizvoda i tako određujemo da li je imao priliku da dobije licencu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2342">This event will help with knowing if the dialog was shown to the user to try, buy or enter the product key and hence will help us determine if the user had the opportunity to get licensed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-2343">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2343">The following fields are collected:</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2344">**ActiveView** - Obaveštava o ID dijaloga koji je prikazan korisniku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2344">**ActiveView** - Tells the dialog ID shown to the user</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2345">**CurrentOOBEMode** - Obaveštava o unapred instaliranom režimu (režim OOBE, kao što je AFO, OEM, itd.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2345">**CurrentOOBEMode** - Tells the pre-install mode (OOBE mode such as AFO, OEM etc.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2346">**NotInitializedBeforeWhileAdding** - Ovo je samo informativno i obaveštava da li je događaj dodat u mapu za upravljanje telemetrijom, a da nije izričito urađena registracija za to</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2346">**NotInitializedBeforeWhileAdding** - This is just informational and tells if the event was added to a telemetry manager map without explicitly registering for it</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2347">**SentOnDestruction** – Ovo je samo informativno i obaveštava da li je događaj dodat u mapu za upravljanje telemetrijom, a nije izričito poslat</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2347">**SentOnDestruction** - This is just informational and tells if the event was added to a telemetry manager map and wasn't sent explicitly</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2348">**ShowTryButton** - Obaveštava da li je korisniku prikazano dugme „Isprobaj“ u dijalogu ili ne</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2348">**ShowTryButton** - Tells if the Try Button was shown to the user on the dialog or not</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2349">**Tag** - Koristi se da saopšti sa kog mesta u kodu je poslat događaj</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2349">**Tag** - Used for telling where in the code the event was sent from</span></span>

### <a name="officelicensingtelemetryflowtrialflow"></a><span data-ttu-id="d6247-2350">Office.Licensing.TelemetryFlow.TrialFlow</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2350">Office.Licensing.TelemetryFlow.TrialFlow</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-2351">Ovaj događaj se pokreće kada korisnik bez licence, sa unapred instaliranim sistemom Office na računaru, pokušava da dobije probnu verziju.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2351">When an unlicensed user of Office pre-installed on a machine is attempting to get a trial, this event gets triggered.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2352">Koristi se da se vidi kojim putem će korisnik ići da bi dobio probnu verziju i da li je došlo do grešaka prilikom njenog preuzimanja putem kupovine u aplikaciji.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2352">It is used to see which path the user would follow to get a trial and if there were any errors while getting the trial through in-app purchases.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2353">U zavisnosti od korisničke radnje i rezultata kupovine u aplikaciji, korisnik može da ostane bez licence.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2353">Depending on the user action and the result of the in-app purchase the user could end up being unlicensed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-2354">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2354">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2355">**HasConnectivity** – Obaveštava da li korisnik ima vezu sa internetom i u slučaju da nema, može koristiti grejs licencu tokom pet dana ili se može naći u režimu smanjene funkcionalnosti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2355">**HasConnectivity** - Tells if the user has internet connectivity and in case there isn't the user might have to use a grace license for five days or may be in reduced functionality mode</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2356">**InAppTrialPurchase** – Saopštava da li je probni paket omogućen za pokretanje SDK-a za kupovinu u prodavnici da bi se uhvatio PI i kupila probna verzija unutar aplikacije *[Ovo polje je uklonjeno iz trenutnih izdanja sistema Office, ali možda će se i dalje prikazivati u starijim izdanjima.]*</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2356">**InAppTrialPurchase** - Tells if the flight is enabled for launching the Store Purchase SDK to capture PI and purchase a trial from within the application *[This field has been removed from current builds of Office, but might still appear in older builds.]*</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2357">**IsRS1OrGreater** - Obaveštava da li je OS verzija novija od verzije RS1 ili ne, pošto SDK za kupovinu u prodavnici treba koristiti samo ako jeste</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2357">**IsRS1OrGreater** - Tells if the OS Version is greater than RS1 or not since the Store Purchase SDK should be used only if the OS Version is greater that RS1</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2358">**NotInitializedBeforeWhileAdding**: Ovo je samo informativno i obaveštava da li je događaj dodat u mapu za upravljanje telemetrijom, a da nije izričito urađena registracija za to</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2358">**NotInitializedBeforeWhileAdding**: This is just informational and tells if the event was added to a telemetry manager map without explicitly registering for it</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2359">**OEMSendToWebForTrial** - Obaveštava da li je probni paket omogućen za prebacivanje korisnika na veb da bi preuzeli probnu verziju</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2359">**OEMSendToWebForTrial** - Tells if the flight is enabled to send users to the web to redeem a trial</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2360">**StoreErrorConditions** – Saopštava različite uslove u kojima je moguć neuspeh SDK-a za kupovinu u prodavnici *[Ovo polje je uklonjeno iz trenutnih izdanja sistema Office, ali možda će se i dalje prikazivati u starijim izdanjima.]*</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2360">**StoreErrorConditions** - Tells the various conditions under which the Store Purchase SDK could have failed *[This field has been removed from current builds of Office, but might still appear in older builds.]*</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2361">**StoreErrorHResult** – Saopštava kôd greške koji je dobijen iz SDK-a za kupovinu u prodavnici *[Ovo polje je uklonjeno iz trenutnih izdanja sistema Office, ali možda će se i dalje prikazivati u starijim izdanjima.]*</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2361">**StoreErrorHResult** - Tells the error code returned from the Store Purchase SDK *[This field has been removed from current builds of Office, but might still appear in older builds.]*</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2362">**StorePurchaseStatusResult** – Saopštava rezultat pozivanja SDK-a za kupovinu u prodavnici i da li je korisnik obavio kupovinu, čime se određuje da li korisnik treba da dobije licencu za korišćenje sistema Office *[Ovo polje je uklonjeno iz trenutnih izdanja sistema Office, ali možda će se i dalje prikazivati u starijim izdanjima.]*</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2362">**StorePurchaseStatusResult** - Tells the result of calling the Store Purchase SDK and if the user made a purchase or not which will help determine if the user should get licensed to use Office *[This field has been removed from current builds of Office, but might still appear in older builds.]*</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2363">**Tag** – Koristi se da saopšti sa kog mesta u kodu je poslat događaj</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2363">**Tag** - Used for telling where in the code the event was sent from</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2364">**UserSignedInExplicitly** – Saopštava da li se korisnik eksplicitno prijavio i u tom slučaju preusmeravamo korisnike na veb za probnu verziju *[Ovo polje je uklonjeno iz trenutnih izdanja sistema Office, ali možda će se i dalje prikazivati u starijim izdanjima.]*</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2364">**UserSignedInExplicitly** - Tells if the user signed in explicitly in which case, we would re-direct users to the web for the trial *[This field has been removed from current builds of Office, but might still appear in older builds.]*</span></span>

### <a name="officelicensingusegracekey"></a><span data-ttu-id="d6247-2365">Office.Licensing.UseGraceKey</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2365">Office.Licensing.UseGraceKey</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-2366">Ako iz nekog razloga nismo u mogućnosti da licenciramo korisnika, instaliramo „grejs“ ključ i šaljemo signal koji to označava.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2366">For some reason if we are unable to license the user, we install a grace key and send out this signal that signifies.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2367">Od suštinske je važnosti za određivanje da li se korisnik nalazi u dobrom statusu,a nedostaje mu funkcionalnost, za ispravnost sistema i za dijagnostičke svrhe ako korisnik prijavi problem na računaru</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2367">It is critical in detecting if the user is in a good state and missing functionality, used for system health and used for diagnostic purposes if a user reports an issue with their machine</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-2368">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2368">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2369">**OpportunisticTokenRenewalAttempted** - Ukazuje na to da smo pokušali oportunističku obnovu za korisnika koji se nalazi u režimu aktivacije deljenog računara</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2369">**OpportunisticTokenRenewalAttempted** – Indicates if we attempted an opportunistic renewal for the user in shared computer activation mode</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2370">**ReArmResult** - Ukazuje na rezultat vraća instaliranog ključa u početno stanje, što može da produži rok trajanje trenutne licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2370">**ReArmResult** – Indicates the result of rearming the installed key which can extend the expiry of the current license</span></span>

### <a name="onenoteenrollmentresult"></a><span data-ttu-id="d6247-2371">OneNote.EnrollmentResult</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2371">OneNote.EnrollmentResult</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="d6247-2372">Ovaj događaj evidentira status posle prijave na Intune.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2372">This event logs the status upon Intune enrollment.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2373">Ovaj slučaj je specifičan za naloge omogućene za Intune.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2373">This scenario is specific to Intune enabled accounts.</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="d6247-2374">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2374">The following fields are collected:</span></span>
 
- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2375">**EnrollmentResult** - Rezultat prijave na Intune</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2375">**EnrollmentResult** - The result of Intune enrollment</span></span>

### <a name="skuproductpricenullevent"></a><span data-ttu-id="d6247-2376">SKU.PRODUCT.PRICE.NULL.EVENT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2376">SKU.PRODUCT.PRICE.NULL.EVENT</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-2377">Ovaj događaj se koristi za evidentiranje događaja radi kvantifikovanja uticaja greške zbog koje korisnici danas vide "Bez vrednosti" umesto cene na SKU ekrana za biranje.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2377">This event is used to capture events to quantify the impact of the bug due to which users today see “Null” instead of a price at the SKU chooser screen.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2378">Greška će se dalje dijagnostikovati kako bi se utvrdila ispravka.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2378">The bug will be diagnosed further to determine a fix.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-2379">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2379">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2380">**PriceNotFound** – Cene se ne mogu naći u prodavnici.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2380">**PriceNotFound** - Prices is not found from the store.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2381">**StoreNotInitilized** – Kada prodavnica nije uspešno pokrenuta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2381">**StoreNotInitilized** - When store is not initialized successfully.</span></span>


## <a name="microsoft-autoupdate-mau-events"></a><span data-ttu-id="d6247-2382">Događaji aplikacije Microsoft AutoUpdate (MAU)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2382">Microsoft AutoUpdate (MAU) events</span></span>

### <a name="additionalappinfoinvalidpreference"></a><span data-ttu-id="d6247-2383">additionalappinfo.invalidpreference</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2383">additionalappinfo.invalidpreference</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-2384">Ovaj događaj prijavljuje nevažeći skup željenih opcija za prikazivanje više informacija u pogledu prestanka pružanja usluge za proizvod.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2384">This event reports on invalid preference set to display more information with respect to End of Service for a product.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2385">Ove informacije koristimo da bismo savetovali klijente da postave ispravne željene opcije kako bi videli dodatne informacije.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2385">We use this information to advise customers to set correct preferences in order to see additional information.</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="d6247-2386">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2386">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2387">**App** – Proces aplikacije koji šalje događaj</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2387">**App** – The application process sending the event</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2388">**AppInfo_Language** – Jezik koji aplikacija koristi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2388">**AppInfo_Language** – The language the application is running under</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2389">**AppVersionLong** – Verzija aplikacije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2389">**AppVersionLong** – The application version</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2390">**Channel** – Željene opcije za korisnike</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2390">**Channel** – The preference for audience</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2391">**Device_NetworkCountry** – Zemlja u kojoj se nalazi uređaj (na osnovu IP adrese)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2391">**Device_NetworkCountry** - The device country (based on IP address)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2392">**DeviceID** – Identifikator uređaja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2392">**DeviceID** - The device identifier</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2393">**DeviceInfo_Model** – Model hardvera uređaja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2393">**DeviceInfo_Model** - The hardware model of the device</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2394">**DeviceInfo_NetworkType** – Tip mreže (Wi-Fi, žična, nepoznato)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2394">**DeviceInfo_NetworkType** - The type of network (Wi-Fi, Wired, unknown)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2395">**DeviceInfo_OsBuild** – Verzija operativnog sistema</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2395">**DeviceInfo_OsBuild** - The version of the operating system</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2396">**Event_ReceivedTime** – Vreme prijema telemetrije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2396">**Event_ReceivedTime** - The time at which telemetry was received</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2397">**EventInfo_Name** – Ime događaja telemetrije koji se evidentira</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2397">**EventInfo_Name** - The name of the telemetry event being logged</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2398">**EventInfo_Time** – Vreme dešavanja evidentiranog događaja telemetrije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2398">**EventInfo_Time** - The time at which the logged event took place</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2399">**PipelineInfo_ClientCountry** – Zemlja u kojoj se nalazi uređaj (na osnovu IP adrese)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2399">**PipelineInfo_ClientCountry** - The device country (based on IP address)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2400">**PipelineInfo_ClientIp** – Prva tri okteta IP adrese</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2400">**PipelineInfo_ClientIp** - The first three octets of the IP address</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2401">**Reason** – Detalji nevažećeg unosa u željenim opcijama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2401">**Reason** - Details on the invalid entry in preferences</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2402">**SessionId** – Identifikator sesije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2402">**SessionId** - The identifier for the session</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2415">**DeviceInfo_NetworkType** – Tip mreže (Wi-Fi, žična, nepoznato)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2415">**DeviceInfo_NetworkType** - The type of network (Wi-Fi, Wired, Unknown)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2416">**DeviceInfo_OsBuild** – Verzija operativnog sistema</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2416">**DeviceInfo_OsBuild** - The version of the Operating System</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2417">**Event_ReceivedTime** – Vreme prijema telemetrije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2417">**Event_ReceivedTime** - The time at which telemetry was received</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2418">**EventInfo_Name** – Ime događaja telemetrije koji se evidentira</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2418">**EventInfo_Name** - The name of the telemetry event being logged</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2420">**HowTocheck** – Željene opcije za proveru da li postoje ispravke</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2420">**HowTocheck** - The preference for checking of updates</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2421">**Payload** – Skup statičkog teksta koji pokazuje status pokretanja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2421">**Payload** - A set of static text indicating launch status.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2454">**Channel** – Željene opcije za korisnike</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2454">**Channel** - The preference for audience</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2455">**Device_NetworkCountry** – Zemlja u kojoj se nalazi uređaj (na osnovu IP adrese)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2455">**Device_NetworkCountry** - The device country (based on IP address)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2456">**DeviceID** – Identifikator uređaja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2456">**DeviceID** - The device identifier</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2458">**DeviceInfo_NetworkType** – Tip mreže (Wi-Fi, žična, nepoznato)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2458">**DeviceInfo_NetworkType** - The type of network (Wi-Fi, Wired, Unknown)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-2554">Ovaj događaj pokazuje da je pokušano uklanjanje aplikacije sa liste aplikacija kojima upravlja MAU.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2554">This event denotes that an attempt to remove an App from the list of applications Managed by MAU took place.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2555">Koristimo ga da bismo potvrdili da MAU upravlja samo aplikacijama koje je sam izdao (ovde ne bi trebalo da se pojavljuju aplikacije iz prodavnice AppStore).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2555">We use this event to confirm that only MAU-released applications are managed via MAU (no AppStore apps should appear here).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-2556">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2556">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2559">**AppVersionLong** – Verzija aplikacije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2559">**AppVersionLong** - The application Version</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2560">**Channel** – Željene opcije za korisnike</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2560">**Channel** - The preference for audience</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2561">**Device_NetworkCountry** – Zemlja u kojoj se nalazi uređaj (na osnovu IP adrese)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2561">**Device_NetworkCountry** - The device country (based on IP address)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2562">**DeviceID** – Identifikator uređaja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2562">**DeviceID** - The device identifier</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2563">**DeviceInfo_Model** – Model hardvera uređaja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2563">**DeviceInfo_Model** - The Hardware Model of the device</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2564">**DeviceInfo_NetworkType** – Tip mreže (Wi-Fi, žična, nepoznato)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2564">**DeviceInfo_NetworkType** - The type of network (Wi-Fi, Wired, Unknown)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2565">**DeviceInfo_OsBuild** – Verzija operativnog sistema</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2565">**DeviceInfo_OsBuild** - The Version of the Operating System</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2566">**Event_ReceivedTime** – Vreme prijema telemetrije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2566">**Event_ReceivedTime** - The time at which telemetry was received</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2567">**EventInfo_Name** – Ime događaja telemetrije koji se evidentira</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2567">**EventInfo_Name** - The name of the telemetry event being logged</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2568">**EventInfo_Time** – Vreme dešavanja evidentiranog događaja telemetrije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2568">**EventInfo_Time** - The time at which the logged event took place</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2569">**HowTocheck** – Željene opcije za proveru da li postoje ispravke</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2569">**HowTocheck** - The preference for checking of updates</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2570">**Payload** – Ime i identifikator aplikacije koja se uklanja, bez obzira na to da li aplikacija i dalje postoji na registrovanoj lokaciji i to da li je instalirana iz prodavnice AppStore.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2570">**Payload** - Name and identifier of the application being removed, whether the application still exists in the registered location and if the application was installed from AppStore.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2571">**PipelineInfo_ClientCountry** – Zemlja u kojoj se nalazi uređaj (na osnovu IP adrese)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2571">**PipelineInfo_ClientCountry** - The device country (based on IP address)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2572">**PipelineInfo_ClientIp** – Prva 3 okteta IP adrese</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2572">**PipelineInfo_ClientIp** - The first 3 octets of the IP address</span></span>

### <a name="catalogerrorsignature"></a><span data-ttu-id="d6247-2574">catalog.errorsignature</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2574">catalog.errorsignature</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2582">**Device_NetworkCountry** – Zemlja u kojoj se nalazi uređaj (na osnovu IP adrese)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2582">**Device_NetworkCountry** - The device country (based on IP address)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2583">**DeviceID** – Identifikator uređaja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2583">**DeviceID** - The device identifier</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2584">**DeviceInfo_Model** – Model hardvera uređaja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2584">**DeviceInfo_Model** - The hardware model of the device</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2585">**DeviceInfo_NetworkType** – Tip mreže (Wi-Fi, žična, nepoznato)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2585">**DeviceInfo_NetworkType** - The type of network (Wi-Fi, Wired, Unknown)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2586">**DeviceInfo_OsBuild** – Verzija operativnog sistema</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2586">**DeviceInfo_OsBuild** - The version of the operating system</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2588">**EventInfo_Name** – Ime događaja telemetrije koji se evidentira</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2588">**EventInfo_Name** - The name of the telemetry event being logged</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2589">**EventInfo_Time** – Vreme dešavanja evidentiranog događaja telemetrije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2589">**EventInfo_Time** - The time at which the logged event took place</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2590">**FileHash** – Vrednost heša preuzete datoteke</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2590">**FileHash** – Hash value of the downloaded file</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2591">**FileName** – Ime datoteke koje prikazuje nepodudaranje vrednosti heša</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2591">**FileName** – The name of the file showing hash value mismatch</span></span>

### <a name="cloningtaskbegin"></a><span data-ttu-id="d6247-2598">cloningtask.begin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2598">cloningtask.begin</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-2599">Ovaj događaj ukazuje na početak zadatka kloniranja pre ažuriranja aplikacije.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2599">This event indicates start of cloning task prior to application update.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2600">Ovaj događaj koristimo zajedno sa događajem cloningtask.status da bismo utvrdili količinu neuspelih kloniranja kako bismo otkrili da li funkcija kloniranja treba da se ograniči na različitim kanalima korisnika.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2600">We use this event in conjunction with cloningtask.status event to determine volume of cloning failures in order to determine whether cloning feature should be throttled on different audience channels.</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="d6247-2601">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2601">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2604">**AppInfo_Language** – Jezik koji aplikacija koristi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2604">**AppInfo_Language** – The language the application is running under</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2605">**AppVersionLong** – Verzija aplikacije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2605">**AppVersionLong** – The application version</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2606">**Channel** – Željene opcije za korisnike</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2606">**Channel** – The preference for audience</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2607">**Device_NetworkCountry** – Zemlja u kojoj se nalazi uređaj (na osnovu IP adrese)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2607">**Device_NetworkCountry** – The device country (based on IP address)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2608">**DeviceID** – Identifikator uređaja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2608">**DeviceID** – The device identifier</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2609">**DeviceInfo_Model** – Model hardvera uređaja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2609">**DeviceInfo_Model** – The hardware model of the device</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2610">**DeviceInfo_NetworkType** – Tip mreže (Wi-Fi, žična, nepoznato)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2610">**DeviceInfo_NetworkType** – The type of network (Wi-Fi, wired, unknown)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2611">**DeviceInfo_OsBuild** – Verzija operativnog sistema</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2611">**DeviceInfo_OsBuild** – The version of the operating system</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2612">**Event_ReceivedTime** – Vreme prijema telemetrije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2612">**Event_ReceivedTime** – The time at which telemetry was received</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2613">**EventInfo_Name** – Ime događaja telemetrije koji se evidentira</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2613">**EventInfo_Name** – The name of the telemetry event being logged</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2614">**EventInfo_Time** – Vreme dešavanja evidentiranog događaja telemetrije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2614">**EventInfo_Time** – The time at which the logged event took place</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2615">**HowTocheck** – Željene opcije za proveru da li postoje ispravke</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2615">**HowTocheck** – The preference for checking of updates</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2616">**PipelineInfo_ClientCountry** – Zemlja u kojoj se nalazi uređaj (na osnovu IP adrese)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2616">**PipelineInfo_ClientCountry** – The device country (based on IP address)</span></span>

### <a name="cloningtaskhelpertoolconnection"></a><span data-ttu-id="d6247-2620">cloningtask.helpertoolconnection</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2620">cloningtask.helpertoolconnection</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-2621">Ovaj događaj beleži probleme sa instaliranjem na klonu (to jest, ne uspemo da se povežemo sa pomoćnikom da bismo primenili ažuriranje ili se povežemo, ali pomoćnik ne može da primeni ažuriranje).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2621">This event records issues with install on clone (i.e. either we fail to connect to the helper to apply an update, or we connect but the helper is unable to apply the update).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2622">Ako nam se prijavi zapis, to znači da instaliranje na klonu nije uspelo i da mora da se vrati na ažuriranje na licu mesta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2622">If we ever get a record reported, this means install on clone has failed and will now have to fall back to an in-place update.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-2623">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2623">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2624">**App** – Proces aplikacije koji šalje događaj</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2624">**App** - The application process sending the event</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2625">**AppInfo_Language** – Jezik koji aplikacija koristi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2625">**AppInfo_Language** - The language the application is running under</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2626">**AppVersionLong** – Verzija aplikacije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2626">**AppVersionLong** - The application version</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2627">**Channel** – Željene opcije za korisnike</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2627">**Channel** - The preference for audience</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2628">**Device_NetworkCountry** – Zemlja u kojoj se nalazi uređaj (na osnovu IP adrese)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2628">**Device_NetworkCountry** - The device country (based on IP address)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2629">**DeviceID** – Identifikator uređaja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2629">**DeviceID** - The device identifier</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2630">**DeviceInfo_Model** – Model hardvera uređaja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2630">**DeviceInfo_Model** - The hardware model of the device</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2631">**DeviceInfo_NetworkType** – Tip mreže (Wi-Fi, žična, nepoznato)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2631">**DeviceInfo_NetworkType** - The type of network (Wi-Fi, Wired, Unknown)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2632">**DeviceInfo_OsBuild** – Verzija operativnog sistema</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2632">**DeviceInfo_OsBuild** - The version of the Operating System</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2633">**Event_ReceivedTime** – Vreme prijema telemetrije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2633">**Event_ReceivedTime** - The time at which telemetry was received</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2634">**EventInfo_Name** – Ime događaja telemetrije koji se evidentira</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2634">**EventInfo_Name** - The name of the telemetry event being logged</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2635">**EventInfo_Time** – Vreme dešavanja evidentiranog događaja telemetrije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2635">**EventInfo_Time** - The time at which the logged event took place</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2636">**HowTocheck** – Željene opcije za proveru da li postoje ispravke</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2636">**HowTocheck** - The preference for checking of updates</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2637">**Payload** – Sadrži ID za identifikovanje pojedine aktivnosti ažuriranja i proxy grešku prijavljenu tokom procesa kloniranja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2637">**Payload** - Contains an ID to identify a single update activity, and Proxy Error reported during cloning process.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2638">**PipelineInfo_ClientCountry** – Zemlja u kojoj se nalazi uređaj (na osnovu IP adrese)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2638">**PipelineInfo_ClientCountry** - The device country (based on IP address)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2639">**PipelineInfo_ClientIp** – Prva tri okteta IP adrese</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2639">**PipelineInfo_ClientIp** - The first three octets of the IP address</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2640">**SessionId** – Identifikator sesije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2640">**SessionId** - The identifier for the session</span></span>

### <a name="cloningtaskstatus"></a><span data-ttu-id="d6247-2641">cloningtask.status</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2641">cloningtask.status</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-2642">Ovaj događaj ukazuje na status procesa kloniranja za aplikaciju koju treba ažurirati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2642">This event indicates status of cloning process for the application to be updated.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2643">Ovaj događaj koristimo da bismo utvrdili stopu uspešnosti, kao i tipove grešaka na koje se naišlo i koje dovode do otkazivanja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2643">We use this event to determine success rate as well as types of errors encountered causing failures.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2644">Ovaj događaj se koristi da bi se utvrdili da li funkcija kloniranja treba da se ograniči na različitim kanalima korisnika.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2644">This event is used to determine whether cloning feature should be throttled on different audience channels.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-2645">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2645">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2646">**App** – Proces aplikacije koji šalje događaj</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2646">**App** - The application process sending the event</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2647">**AppID** – Identifikator aplikacije.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2647">**AppID** - The application identifier.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2648">**AppInfo_Language** – Jezik koji aplikacija koristi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2648">**AppInfo_Language** - The language the application is running under</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2649">**AppVersionLong** – Verzija aplikacije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2649">**AppVersionLong** - The application version</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2650">**Channel** – Željene opcije za korisnike</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2650">**Channel** - The preference for audience</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2651">**Device_NetworkCountry** – Zemlja u kojoj se nalazi uređaj (na osnovu IP adrese)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2651">**Device_NetworkCountry** - The device country (based on IP address)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2652">**DeviceID** – Identifikator uređaja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2652">**DeviceID** - The device identifier</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2653">**DeviceInfo_Model** – Model hardvera uređaja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2653">**DeviceInfo_Model** - The hardware model of the device</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2654">**DeviceInfo_NetworkType** – Tip mreže (Wi-Fi, žična, nepoznato)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2654">**DeviceInfo_NetworkType** - The type of network (Wi-Fi, wired, unknown)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2655">**DeviceInfo_OsBuild** – Verzija operativnog sistema</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2655">**DeviceInfo_OsBuild** - The version of the operating system</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2656">**Error** – Niska sadrži informacije o grešci na koju se naišlo tokom zadatka kloniranja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2656">**Error** - The string contains error information if error occurred during cloning task.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2657">**Event_ReceivedTime** – Vreme prijema telemetrije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2657">**Event_ReceivedTime** - The time at which telemetry was received</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2658">**EventInfo_Name** – Ime događaja telemetrije koji se evidentira</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2658">**EventInfo_Name** - The name of the telemetry event being logged</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2659">**EventInfo_Time** – Vreme dešavanja evidentiranog događaja telemetrije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2659">**EventInfo_Time** - The time at which the logged event took place</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2660">**HowTocheck** – Željene opcije za proveru da li postoje ispravke</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2660">**HowTocheck** - The preference for checking of updates</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2661">**PipelineInfo_ClientCountry** – Zemlja u kojoj se nalazi uređaj (na osnovu IP adrese)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2661">**PipelineInfo_ClientCountry** - The device country (based on IP address)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2662">**PipelineInfo_ClientIp** – Prva tri okteta IP adrese</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2662">**PipelineInfo_ClientIp** - The first three octets of the IP address</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2663">**SessionId** – Identifikator sesije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2663">**SessionId** - The identifier for the session</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2664">**Success** – Predstavljanje niske Bulove promenljive.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2664">**Success** - The string representation of a Boolean variable.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2665">**UpdateID** – Identifikator za ispravku.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2665">**UpdateID** - The identifier for update.</span></span>
