### <a name="configurationsystemversion"></a><span data-ttu-id="d6247-2730">configuration.systemVersion</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2730">configuration.systemVersion</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-2731">Ovaj događaj ukazuje na to da pokušaj preuzimanja verzije sistema nije uspeo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2731">This event indicates an attempt to retrieve system version has failed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2732">On takođe sadrži informacije o informacijama koje je Microsoft automatsko ažuriranje (MAU) uspelo da prikupi iz sistema.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2732">This also contains information on the information Microsoft Auto Update (MAU) was able to collect from the system.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2733">Ovaj događaj koristimo da bismo utvrdili da li MAU treba da se bavi greškama.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2733">We use this event to determine whether MAU should cater for failures.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2734">Imajte u vidu da se verzija sistema koristi da bi se utvrdilo da li ispravka može da se primeni na uređaj klijenta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2734">Note that system version is used to determine whether an update can be applied to the client device.</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="d6247-2735">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2735">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-2736">**App** – Proces aplikacije koji šalje događaj</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-2736">**App** - The application process sending the event</span></span>

### <a name="downloadactorpause"></a><span data-ttu-id="d6247-3680">downloadactor.pause</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-3680">downloadactor.pause</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-3715">**DeviceInfo_NetworkType** – Tip mreže (Wi-Fi, žična, nepoznato)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-3715">**DeviceInfo_NetworkType** - The type of network (Wi-Fi, Wired, Unknown)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-3716">**DeviceInfo_OsBuild** – Verzija operativnog sistema</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-3716">**DeviceInfo_OsBuild** - The Version of the Operating System</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-3717">**Event_ReceivedTime** – Vreme prijema telemetrije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-3717">**Event_ReceivedTime** - The time at which telemetry was received</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-3718">**EventInfo_Name** – Ime događaja telemetrije koji se evidentira</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-3718">**EventInfo_Name** - The name of the telemetry event being logged</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-3772">To evidentira da postoje pokušaji dobavljanja pratećih datoteka i njihove rezultate (uspeh ili otkazivanje).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-3772">This event logs that there are attempts to fetch collateral files and their result (Success or Failure).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-3773">Želimo da znamo koje se pomoćne datoteke i koji se paketi dobavljaju.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-3773">We want to know the collaterals and packages being fetched.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-3774">Dobavljanje pogrešne datoteke može da ukazuje na problem sa verzijom/pomoćnom datotekom.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-3774">A wrong file being fetched can indicate a build/collateral issue.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-3775">Ovaj događaj koristimo da bismo obezbedili da proces ažuriranja funkcioniše na očekivani način i da bismo vam pomogli prilikom rešavanja problema u slučaju grešaka.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-3775">We use this event for ensuring the update process works as expected and to help troubleshoot errors.</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="d6247-3776">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-3776">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-3777">**App** – Proces aplikacije koji šalje događaj</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-3777">**App** - The application process sending the event</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-3778">**AppInfo_Language** – Jezik koji aplikacija koristi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-3778">**AppInfo_Language** - The language the application is running under</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-3779">**AppVersionLong** – Verzija aplikacije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-3779">**AppVersionLong** - The application Version</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-3780">**Channel** – Željene opcije za korisnike</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-3780">**Channel** - The preference for audience</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-3781">**Device_NetworkCountry** – Zemlja u kojoj se nalazi uređaj (na osnovu IP adrese)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-3781">**Device_NetworkCountry** - The device country (based on IP address)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-3782">**DeviceID** – Identifikator uređaja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-3782">**DeviceID** - The device identifier</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-3783">**DeviceInfo_Model** – Model hardvera uređaja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-3783">**DeviceInfo_Model** - The Hardware Model of the device</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-3784">**DeviceInfo_NetworkType** – Tip mreže (Wi-Fi, žična, nepoznato)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-3784">**DeviceInfo_NetworkType** - The type of network (Wi-Fi, Wired, Unknown)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-3785">**DeviceInfo_OsBuild** – Verzija operativnog sistema</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-3785">**DeviceInfo_OsBuild** - The Version of the Operating System</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-3786">**Event_ReceivedTime** – Vreme prijema telemetrije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-3786">**Event_ReceivedTime** - The time at which telemetry was received</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-3787">**EventInfo_Name** – Ime događaja telemetrije koji se evidentira</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-3787">**EventInfo_Name** - The name of the telemetry event being logged</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-3788">**EventInfo_Time** – Vreme dešavanja evidentiranog događaja telemetrije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-3788">**EventInfo_Time** - The time at which the logged event took place</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-3789">**HowTocheck** – Željene opcije za proveru da li postoje ispravke</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-3789">**HowTocheck** - The preference for checking of updates</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-3790">**Payload** – Sadrži URL za preuzimanje i kôd greške u slučaju otkazivanja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-3790">**Payload** - Contains download URL, and an error code in case of failure.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-3791">URL za preuzimanje je Microsoft lokacija za preuzimanje kada kanal nije podešen na opciju „Prilagođeno“.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-3791">Download URL is Microsoft download location except when the channel is set to Custom.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-3792">Ta vrednost je postavljena na opciju „Prilagođena lokacija“ za prilagođeni kanal.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-3792">For Custom channel, this value is set to "Custom Location".</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-3793">**PipelineInfo_ClientCountry** – Zemlja u kojoj se nalazi uređaj (na osnovu IP adrese)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-3793">**PipelineInfo_ClientCountry** - The device country (based on IP address)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-3794">**PipelineInfo_ClientIp** – Prva 3 okteta IP adrese</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-3794">**PipelineInfo_ClientIp** - The first 3 octets of the IP address</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-3795">**SessionId** – Identifikator sesije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-3795">**SessionId** - The identifier for the session</span></span>


### <a name="downloadmanifestconfiguration"></a><span data-ttu-id="d6247-3796">downloadmanifest.configuration</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-3796">downloadmanifest.configuration</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-3797">Ovaj događaj prijavljuje grešku sa konfiguracijom Microsoft automatskog ažuriranja (MAU) – bilo da je u pitanju podešavanje prilagođenog servera u željenim postavkama ili u definicijama krajnje tačke u pomoćniku za ažuriranje u instaliranim MAU komponentama.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-3797">This event reports an error with Microsoft Auto Update (MAU) configuration - either with Custom Server setup in preferences or in endpoint definitions in Update Assistant in installed MAU components.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-3798">Ovaj događaj koristimo da bismo savetovali IT administratore da postave ispravne krajnje tačke servera manifesta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-3798">We use this event to advise IT Admins to set correct Manifest Server endpoints.</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="d6247-3799">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-3799">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-3800">**App** – Proces aplikacije koji šalje događaj</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-3800">**App** - The application process sending the event</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-3801">**AppInfo_Language** – Jezik koji aplikacija koristi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-3801">**AppInfo_Language** - The language the application is running under</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-3802">**AppVersionLong** – Verzija aplikacije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-3802">**AppVersionLong** - The application version</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-3803">**Channel** – Željene opcije za korisnike</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-3803">**Channel** - The preference for audience</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-3804">**Device_NetworkCountry** – Zemlja u kojoj se nalazi uređaj (na osnovu IP adrese)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-3804">**Device_NetworkCountry** - The device country (based on IP address)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-3805">**DeviceID** – Identifikator uređaja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-3805">**DeviceID** - The device identifier</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-3806">**DeviceInfo_Model** – Model hardvera uređaja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-3806">**DeviceInfo_Model** - The hardware model of the device</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-3807">**DeviceInfo_NetworkType** – Tip mreže (Wi-Fi, žična, nepoznato)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-3807">**DeviceInfo_NetworkType** - The type of network (Wi-Fi, wired, unknown)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-3808">**DeviceInfo_OsBuild** – Verzija operativnog sistema</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-3808">**DeviceInfo_OsBuild** - The version of the operating system</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-3809">**Event_ReceivedTime** – Vreme prijema telemetrije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-3809">**Event_ReceivedTime** - The time at which telemetry was received</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-3810">**EventInfo_Name** – Ime događaja telemetrije koji se evidentira</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-3810">**EventInfo_Name** - The name of the telemetry event being logged</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-3811">**EventInfo_Time** – Vreme dešavanja evidentiranog događaja telemetrije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-3811">**EventInfo_Time** - The time at which the logged event took place</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-3812">**Payload** – Ukazuje na to da li se greška nalazi u podešavanju prilagođenog servera ili u instaliranim MAU komponentama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-3812">**Payload** -Indicates whether error lies with custom server setup, or installed MAU components</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-3813">**PipelineInfo_ClientCountry** – Zemlja u kojoj se nalazi uređaj (na osnovu IP adrese)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-3813">**PipelineInfo_ClientCountry** - The device country (based on IP address)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-3814">**PipelineInfo_ClientIp** – Prva tri okteta IP adrese</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-3814">**PipelineInfo_ClientIp** - The first three octets of the IP address</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-3828">**DeviceID** – Identifikator uređaja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-3828">**DeviceID** - The device identifier</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-3830">**DeviceInfo_NetworkType** – Tip mreže (Wi-Fi, žična, nepoznato)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-3830">**DeviceInfo_NetworkType** - The type of network (Wi-Fi, Wired, Unknown)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-3831">**DeviceInfo_OsBuild** – Verzija operativnog sistema</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-3831">**DeviceInfo_OsBuild** - The Version of the Operating System</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-3832">**Event_ReceivedTime** – Vreme prijema telemetrije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-3832">**Event_ReceivedTime** - The time at which telemetry was received</span></span>

### <a name="downloadtaskdownloadfailure"></a><span data-ttu-id="d6247-4158">downloadtask.downloadfailure</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-4158">downloadtask.downloadfailure</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-4159">Ovaj događaj evidentira to da je došlo do greške prilikom preuzimanja datoteke paketa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-4159">This event logs that an error occurred downloading a package file.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-4160">Evidentiramo putanju ispravke i grešku.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-4160">We log the update path and the error.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-4161">Ovaj događaj koristimo da bismo obezbedili da proces ažuriranja funkcioniše na očekivani način i da bismo vam pomogli prilikom rešavanja problema u slučaju grešaka.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-4161">We use this event for ensuring the update process works as expected and to help troubleshoot errors.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-4166">**AppVersionLong** – Verzija aplikacije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-4166">**AppVersionLong** - The application Version</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-4167">**Channel** – Željene opcije za korisnike</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-4167">**Channel** - The preference for audience</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-4168">**Device_NetworkCountry** – Zemlja u kojoj se nalazi uređaj (na osnovu IP adrese)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-4168">**Device_NetworkCountry** - The device country (based on IP address)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-4169">**DeviceID** – Identifikator uređaja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-4169">**DeviceID** - The device identifier</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-4170">**DeviceInfo_Model** – Model hardvera uređaja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-4170">**DeviceInfo_Model** - The Hardware Model of the device</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-4171">**DeviceInfo_NetworkType** – Tip mreže (Wi-Fi, žična, nepoznato)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-4171">**DeviceInfo_NetworkType** - The type of network (Wi-Fi, Wired, Unknown)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-4172">**DeviceInfo_OsBuild** – Verzija operativnog sistema</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-4172">**DeviceInfo_OsBuild** - The Version of the Operating System</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-4173">**Error** – Greška uočena tokom preuzimanja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-4173">**Error** – The error observed during download.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-4174">**Event_ReceivedTime** – Vreme prijema telemetrije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-4174">**Event_ReceivedTime** - The time at which telemetry was received</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-4175">**EventInfo_Name** – Ime događaja telemetrije koji se evidentira</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-4175">**EventInfo_Name** - The name of the telemetry event being logged</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-4176">**EventInfo_Time** – Vreme dešavanja evidentiranog događaja telemetrije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-4176">**EventInfo_Time** - The time at which the logged event took place</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-4177">**HowTocheck** – Željene opcije za proveru da li postoje ispravke</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-4177">**HowTocheck** - The preference for checking of updates</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-4178">**Payload** – Sadrži ime ispravke koja se preuzima i uočenu grešku.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-4178">**Payload** - Contains the name of the update being downloaded and the error observed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-4179">*[Ovo polje je uklonjeno iz aktuelnih verzija sistema Office, ali se i dalje može pojavljivati u starijim verzijama.]*</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-4179">*[This field has been removed from current builds of Office, but might still appear in older builds.]*</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-4180">**PipelineInfo_ClientCountry** – Zemlja u kojoj se nalazi uređaj (na osnovu IP adrese)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-4180">**PipelineInfo_ClientCountry** - The device country (based on IP address)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-4243">**DeviceInfo_OsBuild** – Verzija operativnog sistema</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-4243">**DeviceInfo_OsBuild** - The version of the operating system</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-4244">**Event_ReceivedTime** – Vreme prijema telemetrije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-4244">**Event_ReceivedTime** - The time at which telemetry was received</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-4431">**DeviceInfo_OsBuild** – Verzija operativnog sistema</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-4431">**DeviceInfo_OsBuild** - The version of the operating system</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-4432">**Event_ReceivedTime** – Vreme prijema telemetrije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-4432">**Event_ReceivedTime** - The time at which telemetry was received</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-4473">**DeviceInfo_OsBuild** – Verzija operativnog sistema</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-4473">**DeviceInfo_OsBuild** - The version of the operating system</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-4476">**EventInfo_Time** – Vreme dešavanja evidentiranog događaja telemetrije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-4476">**EventInfo_Time** -   The time at which the logged event took place</span></span>

### <a name="fbalaunchstatus"></a><span data-ttu-id="d6247-4482">fba.launchstatus</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-4482">fba.launchstatus</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-4483">Ovaj događaj evidentira otkazivanja daemona aplikacije MAU prilikom pokušaja pokretanja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-4483">This event logs MAU's daemon failures while attempting to launch.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-4484">Koristimo ga da bismo obezbedili da proces ažuriranja funkcioniše na očekivani način i da bismo vam pomogli prilikom rešavanja problema u slučaju grešaka.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-4484">We use this event for ensuring the update process works as expected and to help troubleshoot errors.</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="d6247-4485">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-4485">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-4488">**AppVersionLong** – Verzija aplikacije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-4488">**AppVersionLong** - The application Version</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-4489">**Channel** – Željene opcije za korisnike</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-4489">**Channel** - The preference for audience</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-4490">**Device_NetworkCountry** – Zemlja u kojoj se nalazi uređaj (na osnovu IP adrese)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-4490">**Device_NetworkCountry** - The device country (based on IP address)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-4491">**DeviceID** – Identifikator uređaja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-4491">**DeviceID** - The device identifier</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-4492">**DeviceInfo_Model** – Model hardvera uređaja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-4492">**DeviceInfo_Model** - The Hardware Model of the device</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-4493">**DeviceInfo_NetworkType** – Tip mreže (Wi-Fi, žična, nepoznato)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-4493">**DeviceInfo_NetworkType** - The type of network (Wi-Fi, Wired, Unknown)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-4494">**DeviceInfo_OsBuild** – Verzija operativnog sistema</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-4494">**DeviceInfo_OsBuild** - The Version of the Operating System</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-4495">**Error** – Sadrži OSStatus (kôd Apple statusa) koji odražava status pokretanja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-4495">**Error** – Contains OSStatus (Apple status code) reflecting launch status.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-4496">**Event_ReceivedTime** – Vreme prijema telemetrije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-4496">**Event_ReceivedTime** - The time at which telemetry was received</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-4497">**EventInfo_Name** – Ime događaja telemetrije koji se evidentira</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-4497">**EventInfo_Name** - The name of the telemetry event being logged</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-4498">**EventInfo_Time** – Vreme dešavanja evidentiranog događaja telemetrije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-4498">**EventInfo_Time** - The time at which the logged event took place</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-4499">**HowTocheck** – Željene opcije za proveru da li postoje ispravke</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-4499">**HowTocheck** - The preference for checking of updates</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-4500">**Payload** – Sadrži status operativnog sistema (kôd Apple statusa) koji pokazuje status pokretanja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-4500">**Payload** - Contains OSStatus (Apple status code) reflecting launch status.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-4501">*[Ovo polje je uklonjeno iz aktuelnih verzija sistema Office, ali se i dalje može pojavljivati u starijim verzijama.]*</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-4501">*[This field has been removed from current builds of Office, but might still appear in older builds.]*</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-4502">**PipelineInfo_ClientCountry** – Zemlja u kojoj se nalazi uređaj (na osnovu IP adrese)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-4502">**PipelineInfo_ClientCountry** - The device country (based on IP address)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-4504">**SessionId** – Identifikator sesije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-4504">**SessionId** - The identifier for the session</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-4505">**Success** – Bulov znak niske koji ukazuje na to da li je MAU daemon proces uspešno pokrenut.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-4505">**Success** – The string Boolean indicating whether MAU daemon process was successfully launched.</span></span>


### <a name="fbamausilentupdate"></a><span data-ttu-id="d6247-4506">fba.mausilentupdate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-4506">fba.mausilentupdate</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-4507">Ovaj događaj ukazuje na to da pomoćnik za Microsoft Update iniciraju tihe ispravke.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-4507">This event indicates Microsoft Update Assistant is initiating silent updates.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-4508">Ovaj događaj se koristi za utvrđivanje obima ispravki koji su primenjeni bez intervencije korisnika, da biste pomogli u poboljšanjima korisnika pomoću korisničkog iskustva.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-4508">This event is used to determine volume of updates that are applied without user intervention, to help drive enhancements in user experience.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-4509">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-4509">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-4510">**App** – Proces aplikacije koji šalje događaj</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-4510">**App** - The application process sending the event</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-4511">**AppInfo_Language** – Jezik koji aplikacija koristi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-4511">**AppInfo_Language** - The language the application is running under</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-4512">**AppVersionLong** – Verzija aplikacije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-4512">**AppVersionLong** - The application version</span></span>

### <a name="fbamoreinfofromappnotification"></a><span data-ttu-id="d6247-4528">fba.moreinfofromappnotification</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-4528">fba.moreinfofromappnotification</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-4529">Ovi izveštaji o događaju se izveštavaju o informacijama koje registrovana aplikacija usmjeravaju putem Microsoft automatskog ažuriranja (MAU).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-4529">This event reports on information that a registered application is routing through Microsoft Auto Update (MAU).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-4530">Na primer, poruke na kraju usluge se guraju kroz MAU-ove obaveštenja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-4530">For example, end-of-service messages are pushed through MAU notification.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-4531">Koristite ovaj događaj da biste utvrdili količinsko prikazivanje uređaja koji prikazuju ovo određeno obaveštenje, da biste utvrdili uspeh širenja informacija.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-4531">We use this event to determine the volume of devices that are displaying this particular notification, to determine the success of information dissemination.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-4533">**AdditionalInfoID** – Jedinstveno identifikuje „Više informacija“ koje se prosleđuju kroz MAU.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-4533">**AdditionalInfoID** - Uniquely identifies “More Info” being pushed through MAU.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-4534">**App** – Proces aplikacije koji šalje događaj</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-4534">**App** - The application process sending the event</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-4535">**AppInfo_Language** – Jezik koji aplikacija koristi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-4535">**AppInfo_Language** - The language the application is running under</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-4536">**AppVersionLong** – Verzija aplikacije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-4536">**AppVersionLong** - The application version</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-4537">**Channel** – Željene opcije za korisnike</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-4537">**Channel** - The preference for audience</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-4538">**Device_NetworkCountry** – Zemlja u kojoj se nalazi uređaj (na osnovu IP adrese)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-4538">**Device_NetworkCountry** - The device country (based on IP address)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-4539">**DeviceID** – Identifikator uređaja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-4539">**DeviceID** - The device identifier</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-4540">**DeviceInfo_Model** – Model hardvera uređaja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-4540">**DeviceInfo_Model** - The hardware model of the device</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-4541">**DeviceInfo_NetworkType** – Tip mreže (Wi-Fi, žična, nepoznato)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-4541">**DeviceInfo_NetworkType** - The type of network (Wi-Fi, wired, unknown)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-4542">**DeviceInfo_OsBuild** – Verzija operativnog sistema</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-4542">**DeviceInfo_OsBuild** - The version of the operating system</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-4543">**Event_ReceivedTime** – Vreme prijema telemetrije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-4543">**Event_ReceivedTime** - The time at which telemetry was received</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-4544">**EventInfo_Name** – Ime događaja telemetrije koji se evidentira</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-4544">**EventInfo_Name** - The name of the telemetry event being logged</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-4545">**EventInfo_Time** – Vreme dešavanja evidentiranog događaja telemetrije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-4545">**EventInfo_Time** -  The time at which the logged event took place</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-4546">**HowToCheck** – Kako proveriti postavku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-4546">**HowToCheck** - How to check setting</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-4547">**NotificationEvent** – Statički tekst koji ukazuje na tip obaveštenja koji se primenjuje.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-4547">**NotificationEvent** - Static text indicating what type of notification is being applied.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-4548">**PipelineInfo_ClientCountry** – Zemlja u kojoj se nalazi uređaj (na osnovu IP adrese)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-4548">**PipelineInfo_ClientCountry** - The device country (based on IP address)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-4549">**PipelineInfo_ClientIp** – Prva tri okteta IP adrese</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-4549">**PipelineInfo_ClientIp** - The first three octets of the IP address</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-4562">**DeviceInfo_NetworkType** – Tip mreže (Wi-Fi, žična, nepoznato)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-4562">**DeviceInfo_NetworkType** - The type of network (Wi-Fi, wired, unknown)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-4563">**DeviceInfo_OsBuild** – Verzija operativnog sistema</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-4563">**DeviceInfo_OsBuild** - The version of the operating system</span></span>

### <a name="fbanofifyappclosed"></a><span data-ttu-id="d6247-4572">fba.nofifyappclosed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-4572">fba.nofifyappclosed</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-4577">**App** – Proces aplikacije koji šalje događaj</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-4577">**App** - The application process sending the event</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-4579">**AppVersionLong** – Verzija aplikacije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-4579">**AppVersionLong** - The application version</span></span>
    
- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-4580">**Channel** – Željene opcije za korisnike</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-4580">**Channel** - The preference for audience</span></span>
    
- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-4581">**Device_NetworkCountry** – Zemlja u kojoj se nalazi uređaj (na osnovu IP adrese)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-4581">**Device_NetworkCountry** - The device country (based on IP address)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-4583">**DeviceInfo_Model** – Model hardvera uređaja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-4583">**DeviceInfo_Model** - The hardware model of the device</span></span>
    
- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-4584">**DeviceInfo_NetworkType** – Tip mreže (Wi-Fi, žična, nepoznato)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-4584">**DeviceInfo_NetworkType** - The type of network (Wi-Fi, wired, unknown)</span></span>
    
- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-4585">**DeviceInfo_OsBuild** – Verzija operativnog sistema</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-4585">**DeviceInfo_OsBuild** - The version of the operating system</span></span>
    
- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-4586">**Event_ReceivedTime** – Vreme prijema telemetrije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-4586">**Event_ReceivedTime** - The time at which telemetry was received</span></span>
    
- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-4587">**EventInfo_Name** – Ime događaja telemetrije koji se evidentira</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-4587">**EventInfo_Name** - The name of the telemetry event being logged</span></span>
    
- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-4588">**EventInfo_Time** – Vreme dešavanja evidentiranog događaja telemetrije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-4588">**EventInfo_Time** -   The time at which the logged event took place</span></span> 
    
- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-4589">**HowToCheck** – Kako proveriti postavku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-4589">**HowToCheck** - How to check setting</span></span>
    
- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-4590">**Payload** – Statički tekst</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-4590">**Payload** -  Static text</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-4598">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-4598">The following fields are collected:</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-4599">**App** – Proces aplikacije koji šalje događaj</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-4599">**App** - The application process sending the event</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-4600">**AppInfo_Language** – Jezik koji aplikacija koristi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-4600">**AppInfo_Language** - The language the application is running under</span></span>
    
- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-4601">**AppVersionLong** – Verzija aplikacije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-4601">**AppVersionLong** - The application version</span></span>
    
- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-4602">**Channel** – Željene opcije za korisnike</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-4602">**Channel** - The preference for audience</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-4603">**Device_NetworkCountry** – Zemlja u kojoj se nalazi uređaj (na osnovu IP adrese)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-4603">**Device_NetworkCountry** - The device country (based on IP address)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-4857">**AppVersionLong** – Verzija aplikacije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-4857">**AppVersionLong** - The application Version</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-4859">**Device_NetworkCountry** – Zemlja u kojoj se nalazi uređaj (na osnovu IP adrese)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-4859">**Device_NetworkCountry** - The device country (based on IP address)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-4860">**DeviceID** – Identifikator uređaja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-4860">**DeviceID** - The device identifier</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-4866">**EventInfo_Name** – Ime događaja telemetrije koji se evidentira</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-4866">**EventInfo_Name** - The name of the telemetry event being logged</span></span>

### <a name="fbasilentupdateclientsession"></a><span data-ttu-id="d6247-4876">FBASilentUpdate.ClientSession</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-4876">FBASilentUpdate.ClientSession</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-4877">Ovaj događaj se koristi za izračunavanje metrike ispravnosti kritičnih ispravki za Microsoft automatsko ažuriranje (MAU).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-4877">This event is used to calculated critical update health metric for Microsoft Auto Update (MAU).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-4878">Ovaj događaj nam omogućava da naznačite koje ispravke ažuriranja (preuzimanje ili instaliranje) funkcija "potpornim serverom" se trenutno rukuje.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-4878">This event allows us to indicate which update session (download or install) the backend is currently handling.</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="d6247-4879">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-4879">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-4880">**App** – Proces aplikacije koji šalje događaj</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-4880">**App** – The application process sending the event</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-4881">**AppInfo_Language** – Jezik koji aplikacija koristi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-4881">**AppInfo_Language** – The language the application is running under</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-4882">**AppVersionLong** – Verzija aplikacije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-4882">**AppVersionLong** – The application version</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-5543">**AppInfo_Language** – Jezik koji aplikacija koristi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-5543">**AppInfo_Language** - The language the application is running under</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-5544">**AppVersionLong** – Verzija aplikacije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-5544">**AppVersionLong** - The application version</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-5545">**Channel** – Željene opcije za korisnike</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-5545">**Channel** - The preference for audience</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-5552">**EventInfo_Name** – Ime događaja telemetrije koji se evidentira</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-5552">**EventInfo_Name** - The name of the telemetry event being logged</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-5767">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-5767">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-5770">**AppInfo_Language** – Jezik koji aplikacija koristi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-5770">**AppInfo_Language** - The language the application is running under</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-5771">**AppleEventClass** – Ukazuje na tim događaja koji se šalje/potvrđuje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-5771">**AppleEventClass** - Indicates type of event being sent/acknowledged</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-5773">**AppVersionLong** – Verzija aplikacije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-5773">**AppVersionLong** - The application version</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-5775">**Device_NetworkCountry** – Zemlja u kojoj se nalazi uređaj (na osnovu IP adrese)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-5775">**Device_NetworkCountry** - The device country (based on IP address)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-5776">**DeviceID** – Identifikator uređaja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-5776">**DeviceID** - The device identifier</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-5777">**DeviceInfo_Model** – Model hardvera uređaja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-5777">**DeviceInfo_Model** - The hardware model of the device</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-5778">**DeviceInfo_NetworkType** – Tip mreže (Wi-Fi, žična, nepoznato)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-5778">**DeviceInfo_NetworkType** - The type of network (Wi-Fi, wired, unknown)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-5779">**DeviceInfo_OsBuild** – Verzija operativnog sistema</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-5779">**DeviceInfo_OsBuild** - The version of the operating system</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-5780">**Event_ReceivedTime** – Vreme prijema telemetrije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-5780">**Event_ReceivedTime** - The time at which telemetry was received</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-5781">**EventInfo_Name** – Ime događaja telemetrije koji se evidentira</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-5781">**EventInfo_Name** - The name of the telemetry event being logged</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-5782">**EventInfo_Time** – Vreme dešavanja evidentiranog događaja telemetrije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-5782">**EventInfo_Time** -   The time at which the logged event took place</span></span>

### <a name="installedappsendcoreappleevent"></a><span data-ttu-id="d6247-5873">installedapp.sendcoreappleevent</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-5873">installedapp.sendcoreappleevent</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-5874">Ovaj događaj ukazuje na to da Microsoft automatsku ispravku (MAU) šalje Apple Event u registrovanu aplikaciju da bi se okonиalo zatvaranje aplikacije kako bi se nastavili sa ažuriranjem aplikacije Neobrađeno.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-5874">This event indicates Microsoft Auto Update (MAU) is sending an Apple event to a registered application to terminate the application in order to proceed with pending application update.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-5875">Ovaj događaj se trenutno koristi da bi se razvijala buduća poboljšanja radi umanjene prekida korisnika tokom ispravki aplikacije.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-5875">This event is currently being used to help develop future enhancement to minimize user interruption during application updates.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-5876">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-5876">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-5877">**Acknowledged** – Ukazuje na to da li je aplikacija subjekta potvrdila prijem događaja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-5877">**Acknowledged** - Indicates whether the subject application has acknowledged receipt of the event</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-5878">**App** – Proces aplikacije koji šalje događaj</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-5878">**App** - The application process sending the event</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-5879">**AppID** – Identifikator za aplikaciju koja se ažurira</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-5879">**AppID** - Identifier for the application being updated</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-5880">**AppInfo_Language** – Jezik koji aplikacija koristi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-5880">**AppInfo_Language** - The language the application is running under</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-5881">**AppleEventClass** – Ukazuje na tim događaja koji se šalje/potvrđuje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-5881">**AppleEventClass** - Indicates type of event being sent/acknowledged</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-5882">**AppleEventID** – Jedinstveni identifikator za događaj koji se šalje/potvrđuje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-5882">**AppleEventID** - Unique identifier for the event being sent/acknowledged</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-5883">**AppVersionLong** – Verzija aplikacije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-5883">**AppVersionLong** - The application version</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-5884">**Channel** – Željene opcije za korisnike</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-5884">**Channel** - The preference for audience</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-5885">**Device_NetworkCountry** – Zemlja u kojoj se nalazi uređaj (na osnovu IP adrese)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-5885">**Device_NetworkCountry** - The device country (based on IP address)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-5886">**DeviceID** – Identifikator uređaja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-5886">**DeviceID** - The device identifier</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-5887">**DeviceInfo_Model** – Model hardvera uređaja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-5887">**DeviceInfo_Model** - The hardware model of the device</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-5888">**DeviceInfo_NetworkType** – Tip mreže (Wi-Fi, žična, nepoznato)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-5888">**DeviceInfo_NetworkType** - The type of network (Wi-Fi, wired, unknown)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-5889">**DeviceInfo_OsBuild** – Verzija operativnog sistema</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-5889">**DeviceInfo_OsBuild** - The version of the operating system</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-5890">**Event_ReceivedTime** – Vreme prijema telemetrije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-5890">**Event_ReceivedTime** - The time at which telemetry was received</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-5891">**EventInfo_Name** – Ime događaja telemetrije koji se evidentira</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-5891">**EventInfo_Name** - The name of the telemetry event being logged</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-5892">**EventInfo_Time** – Vreme dešavanja evidentiranog događaja telemetrije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-5892">**EventInfo_Time** -   The time at which the logged event took place</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-5893">**HowToCheck** – Kako proveriti postavku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-5893">**HowToCheck** - How to check setting</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-5894">**Payload** – Sadrži broj ponovnih pokušaja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-5894">**Payload** - Contains retry count</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-5895">**PipelineInfo_ClientCountry** – Zemlja u kojoj se nalazi uređaj (na osnovu IP adrese)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-5895">**PipelineInfo_ClientCountry** - The device country (based on IP address)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-5896">**PipelineInfo_ClientIp** – Prva tri okteta IP adrese</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-5896">**PipelineInfo_ClientIp** - The first three octets of the IP address</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-5897">**SessionId** – Identifikator sesije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-5897">**SessionId** - The identifier for the session</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-5898">**Success** – Ukazuje na to da li je aplikacija subjekta prijavila uspeh operacije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-5898">**Success** - Indicates whether the subject application has reported success of operation</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-5899">**UpdateID** – Identifikator ispravke.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-5899">**UpdateID** - The update identifier</span></span>

### <a name="installstatusdaemon"></a><span data-ttu-id="d6247-5921">installstatus.daemon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-5921">installstatus.daemon</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-5922">Ovaj događaj evidentira stanje daemona Microsoft automatskog ažuriranja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-5922">This event logs the status of the Microsoft AutoUpdate daemon.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-5923">Ovaj događaj koristimo da bismo obezbedili da proces ažuriranja funkcioniše na očekivani način i da bismo vam pomogli prilikom rešavanja problema u slučaju grešaka.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-5923">We use this event for ensuring the update process works as expected and to help troubleshoot errors.</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="d6247-5924">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-5924">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-5929">**Channel** – Željene opcije za korisnike</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-5929">**Channel** - The preference for audience</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-5930">**Codesigned** – Bulova vrednost koja ukazuje na to da li je pomoćnik za ažuriranje ispravno kodizajniran.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-5930">**Codesigned** – Boolean indicating whether the Update Assistant were codesigned correctly.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-5932">**DeviceID** – Identifikator uređaja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-5932">**DeviceID** - The device identifier</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-5934">**DeviceInfo_NetworkType** – Tip mreže (Wi-Fi, žična, nepoznato)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-5934">**DeviceInfo_NetworkType** - The type of network (Wi-Fi, Wired, Unknown)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-5935">**DeviceInfo_OsBuild** – Verzija operativnog sistema</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-5935">**DeviceInfo_OsBuild** - The Version of the Operating System</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-5936">**Event_ReceivedTime** – Vreme prijema telemetrije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-5936">**Event_ReceivedTime** - The time at which telemetry was received</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-5937">**EventInfo_Name** – Ime događaja telemetrije koji se evidentira</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-5937">**EventInfo_Name** - The name of the telemetry event being logged</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-5938">**EventInfo_Time** – Vreme dešavanja evidentiranog događaja telemetrije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-5938">**EventInfo_Time** - The time at which the logged event took place</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-5939">**Exists** – Bulova vrednost koja ukazuje na to da li pomoćnik za ažuriranje postoji na disku.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-5939">**Exists** – Boolean indicating whether the Update Assistant exists on disk.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-5940">**HowTocheck** – Željene opcije za proveru da li postoje ispravke</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-5940">**HowTocheck** - The preference for checking of updates</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-5941">**Payload** – Sadrži naznaku toga da li komponenta daemona postoji na očekivanoj lokaciji i da li je potpisana kodom.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-5941">**Payload** - Contains an indication whether Daemon component exists at expected location and whether it is codesigned.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-5942">*[Ovo polje je uklonjeno iz aktuelnih verzija sistema Office, ali se i dalje može pojavljivati u starijim verzijama.]*</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-5942">*[This field has been removed from current builds of Office, but might still appear in older builds.]*</span></span>

### <a name="lifecyclecomplimentproclaunch"></a><span data-ttu-id="d6247-6272">Lifecycle.complimentproclaunch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-6272">Lifecycle.complimentproclaunch</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-6273">Ovaj događaj ukazuje na pokušaj pokretanja Microsoft Update pomoćnika iz Microsoft AutoUpdate ili iz Microsoft AutoUpdate iz Microsoft Update pomoćnika.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-6273">This event indicates attempt to launch Microsoft Update Assistant from Microsoft AutoUpdate or from Microsoft AutoUpdate from Microsoft Update Assistant.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-6274">Ovaj događaj se koristi za određivanje i osiguravanje ispravnosti Microsoft AutoUpdate i Microsoft Update pomoćnika.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-6274">This event is used to determine and ensure health of Microsoft AutoUpdate and Microsoft Update Assistant.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-6278">**AppVersionLong** – Verzija aplikacije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-6278">**AppVersionLong** - The application version</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-6279">**Channel** – Željene opcije za korisnike</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-6279">**Channel** - The preference for audience</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-6280">**Device_NetworkCountry** – Zemlja u kojoj se nalazi uređaj (na osnovu IP adrese)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-6280">**Device_NetworkCountry** - The device country (based on IP address)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-6284">**DeviceInfo_OsBuild** – Verzija operativnog sistema</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-6284">**DeviceInfo_OsBuild** - The version of the operating system</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-6285">**Error** – Svaka greška prijavljena tokom pokušaja pokretanja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-6285">**Error** - Any error reported during launch attempt</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-6286">**Event_ReceivedTime** – Vreme prijema telemetrije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-6286">**Event_ReceivedTime** - The time at which telemetry was received</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-6287">**EventInfo_Name** – Ime događaja telemetrije koji se evidentira</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-6287">**EventInfo_Name** - The name of the telemetry event being logged</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-6288">**EventInfo_Time** – Vreme dešavanja evidentiranog događaja telemetrije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-6288">**EventInfo_Time** - The time at which the logged event took place</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-6289">**HowToCheck** – Kako proveriti postavku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-6289">**HowToCheck** - How to check setting</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-6290">**PipelineInfo_ClientCountry** – Zemlja u kojoj se nalazi uređaj (na osnovu IP adrese)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-6290">**PipelineInfo_ClientCountry** - The device country (based on IP address)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-6293">**SessionId** – Identifikator sesije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-6293">**SessionId** - The identifier for the session</span></span>

### <a name="lifecycleperiodiccheck"></a><span data-ttu-id="d6247-6318">Lifecycle.periodiccheck</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-6318">Lifecycle.periodiccheck</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-6319">Ovaj događaj periodično izveštava o statusu procesa MicrosoftAutoUpdate.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-6319">This event reports on status of MicrosoftAutoUpdate process periodically.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-6320">Posebno izveštava o tome na šta preostali procesi zadataka čekaju za dovršavanje pomoćnika za ažuriranje a u slučaju UI izveštava o tome da li se proces prekida zbog nepostupanja korisnika.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-6320">Specifically, it reports on what remaining tasks process is waiting on for completion for Update Assistant, and in the case of UI it reports on whether process is terminating due to user inaction.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="d6247-6321">Ovaj događaj koristimo za određivanje toga šta sprečava pomoćnika za ažuriranje da dovrši ažuriranja i prekidanja i da li se UI prekida zbog nepostupanja korisnika.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-6321">We use this event to determine what is preventing Update Assistant from completing updates and terminating and, whether the UI is terminating due to user inaction.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-6322">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-6322">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-6323">**App** – Proces aplikacije koji šalje događaj</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-6323">**App** - The application process sending the event</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-6324">**AppInfo_Language** – Jezik koji aplikacija koristi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-6324">**AppInfo_Language** - The language the application is running under</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-6325">**AppVersionLong** – Verzija aplikacije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-6325">**AppVersionLong** - The application Version</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-6326">**Channel** – Željene opcije za korisnike</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-6326">**Channel** - The preference for audience</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-6327">**dataCollectionDialog** – Bulov izraz koji ukazuje na to da li proces čeka na odgovor korisnika u dijalogu za prikupljanje podataka</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-6327">**dataCollectionDialog** - Boolean indicating whether the process is waiting for user response on Data Collection Dialog</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-6328">**Device_NetworkCountry** – Zemlja u kojoj se nalazi uređaj (na osnovu IP adrese)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-6328">**Device_NetworkCountry** - The device country (based on IP address)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-6329">**DeviceID** – Identifikator uređaja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-6329">**DeviceID** - The device identifier</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-6330">**DeviceInfo_Model** – Model hardvera uređaja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-6330">**DeviceInfo_Model** - The Hardware Model of the device</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-6331">**DeviceInfo_NetworkType** – Tip mreže (Wi-Fi, žična, nepoznato)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-6331">**DeviceInfo_NetworkType** - The type of network (Wi-Fi, Wired, Unknown)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-6332">**DeviceInfo_OsBuild** – Verzija operativnog sistema</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-6332">**DeviceInfo_OsBuild** - The Version of the Operating System</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-6333">**Event_ReceivedTime** – Vreme prijema telemetrije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-6333">**Event_ReceivedTime** - The time at which telemetry was received</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-6334">**EventInfo_Name** – Ime događaja telemetrije koji se evidentira</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-6334">**EventInfo_Name** - The name of the telemetry event being logged</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-6335">**EventInfo_Time** – Vreme dešavanja evidentiranog događaja telemetrije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-6335">**EventInfo_Time** - The time at which the logged event took place</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-6336">**forcedUpdateDialog** – Bulov izraz koji ukazuje na to da li proces čeka na odgovor korisnika u dijalogu nametnutog ažuriranja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-6336">**forcedUpdateDialog** - Boolean indicating whether the process is waiting for user response on Forced Update Dialog</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-6337">**howToCheck** – Postavka „Kako proveriti“</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-6337">**HowToCheck** - How To Check setting</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-6338">**isBusy** – Bulov izraz koji ukazuje na to da li je proces zauzet aktivnim ažuriranjem</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-6338">**isBusy** - Boolean indicating whether the process is busy with active update</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-6339">**isInactive** – Bulov izraz koji ukazuje na to da li proces čeka na radnju korisnika duže vreme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-6339">**isInactive** - Boolean indicating whether the process has been waiting for user action for prolonged period of time</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-6341">**PipelineInfo_ClientCountry** – Zemlja u kojoj se nalazi uređaj (na osnovu IP adrese)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-6341">**PipelineInfo_ClientCountry** - The device country (based on IP address)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-6342">**PipelineInfo_ClientIp** – Prva 3 okteta IP adrese</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-6342">**PipelineInfo_ClientIp** - The first 3 octets of the IP address</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-6343">**SessionId** – Identifikator sesije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-6343">**SessionId** - The identifier for the session</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-6344">**SessionLength** – Dužina trenutne sesije procesa u sekundama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-6344">**SessionLength** - Length of current process session in seconds</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8246">**HowTocheck** – Željene opcije za proveru da li postoje ispravke</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8246">**HowTocheck** - The preference for checking of updates</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8248">**PipelineInfo_ClientCountry** – Zemlja u kojoj se nalazi uređaj (na osnovu IP adrese)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8248">**PipelineInfo_ClientCountry** - The device country (based on IP address)</span></span>
