### <a name="webserviceswhatsnew"></a><span data-ttu-id="d6247-8251">webservices.whatsnew</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8251">webservices.whatsnew</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-8252">Ovaj događaj se pokreće kada su Microsoft automatske ispravke (MAU) upiti Veb-usluge na funkciji "Šta je novo" za registrovane aplikacije.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8252">This event is triggered when Microsoft Auto Update (MAU) queries web-services on the “what’s new” feature for registered applications.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8253">Ovaj događaj se koristi za utvrđivanje stanja funkcije „Šta je novo“.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8253">This event is used to determine health of the “what’s new” feature.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-8254">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8254">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8255">**App** – Proces aplikacije koji šalje događaj</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8255">**App** -The application process sending the event</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8256">**AppInfo_Language** – Jezik koji aplikacija koristi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8256">**AppInfo_Language** -The language the application is running under</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8257">**AppVersionLong** – Verzija aplikacije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8257">**AppVersionLong** -The application version</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8258">**Channel** – Željene opcije za korisnike</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8258">**Channel** -The preference for audience</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8259">**Device_NetworkCountry** – Zemlja u kojoj se nalazi uređaj (na osnovu IP adrese)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8259">**Device_NetworkCountry** -The device country (based on IP address)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8260">**DeviceID** – Identifikator uređaja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8260">**DeviceID** -The device identifier</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8261">**DeviceInfo_Model** – Model hardvera uređaja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8261">**DeviceInfo_Model** -The hardware model of the device</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8262">**DeviceInfo_NetworkType** – Tip mreže (Wi-Fi, žična, nepoznato)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8262">**DeviceInfo_NetworkType** -The type of network (Wi-Fi, wired, unknown)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8263">**DeviceInfo_OsBuild** – Verzija operativnog sistema</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8263">**DeviceInfo_OsBuild** -The version of the operating system</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8264">**Event_ReceivedTime** – Vreme prijema telemetrije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8264">**Event_ReceivedTime** -The time at which telemetry was received</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8265">**EventInfo_Name** – Ime događaja telemetrije koji se evidentira</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8265">**EventInfo_Name** -The name of the telemetry event being logged</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8266">**EventInfo_Time** – Vreme dešavanja evidentiranog događaja telemetrije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8266">**EventInfo_Time** -The time at which the logged event took place</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8267">**HowToCheck** – Kako proveriti postavku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8267">**HowToCheck** -How to check setting</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8268">**Payload** – Sadrži informacije o broju aplikacija sa informacijama o tome šta je novo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8268">**Payload** -Contains information on number of applications with what’s new information</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8269">**PipelineInfo_ClientCountry** – Zemlja u kojoj se nalazi uređaj (na osnovu IP adrese)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8269">**PipelineInfo_ClientCountry** -The device country (based on IP address)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8270">**PipelineInfo_ClientIp** – Prva tri okteta IP adrese</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8270">**PipelineInfo_ClientIp** -The first three octets of the IP address</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8271">**SessionId** – Identifikator sesije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8271">**SessionId** -The identifier for the session</span></span>

## <a name="onenote-sync-events"></a><span data-ttu-id="d6247-8272">Događaji sinhronizovanja programa OneNote</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8272">OneNote sync events</span></span>

### <a name="officeonenotestoragenotebooksyncresult"></a><span data-ttu-id="d6247-8273">Office.OneNote.Storage.NotebookSyncResult</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8273">Office.OneNote.Storage.NotebookSyncResult</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="d6247-8274">Ovaj događaj evidentira rezultat sinhronizacije beležnice.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8274">This event logs notebook sync result.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8275">Koristi se za otkrivanje broja jedinstvenih ciljeva sinhronizacije kada se izračunava rezultat sinhronizacije programa OneNote.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8275">It is used for figuring out how many unique sync targets when calculating OneNote sync score.</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="d6247-8276">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8276">The following fields are collected</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8277">**CachedError_Code** – Numerički ili alfanumerički kôd koji se koristi za određivanje prirode keširane greške i/ili toga zbog čega je do nje došlo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8277">**CachedError_Code** - a numbered or alphanumeric code used to determine the nature of the cached error, and/or why it occurred</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8278">**CachedError_Description** – Opis keširane greške</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8278">**CachedError_Description** – a description of the cached error</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8279">**CachedError_Tag** – Pokazuje gde se u kodu javlja keširana greška</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8279">**CachedError_Tag** – indicate where in the code throws the cached error</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8280">**CachedError_Type** – Tip keširane greške, na primer Win32Error itd.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8280">**CachedError_Type** – the type of the cached error, e.g. Win32Error, etc.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8281">**ExecutionTime** – Vreme u milisekundama potrebno za kopiranje beležnice</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8281">**ExecutionTime** – time in milliseconds taken to replicate the notebook</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8282">**Gosid** – Globalni ID prostora objekta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8282">**Gosid** – global object space ID</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8283">**IdentityType** – Tip identiteta, na primer Windows Live, Org ID itd.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8283">**IdentityType** – identity type, e.g. Windows Live, Org ID, etc.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8284">**InitialReplicationInSession** – Pokazuje da li je ova replikacija prva replikacija beležnice posle otvaranja ili nije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8284">**InitialReplicationInSession** – is this replication the first notebook replication after open or not</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8285">**IsBackgroundSync** – Pokazuje da li je ovo sinhronizacija u pozadini ili nije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8285">**IsBackgroundSync** – is this a background sync or not</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8286">**IsCachedErrorSuppressed** – Pokazuje da li je keširana greška potisnuta ili nije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8286">**IsCachedErrorSuppressed** – is the cached error suppressed or not</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8287">**IsCachedErrorUnexpected** – Pokazuje da li je keširana greška neočekivana ili nije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8287">**IsCachedErrorUnexpected** – is the cached error unexpected or not</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8288">**IsNotebookErrorSuppressed** – Pokazuje da li je greška pri sinhronizaciji na nivou beležnice potisnuta ili nije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8288">**IsNotebookErrorSuppressed** – is the notebook level sync error suppressed or not</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8289">**IsNotebookErrorUnexpected** – Pokazuje da li je greška pri sinhronizaciji na nivou beležnice neočekivana ili nije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8289">**IsNotebookErrorUnexpected** – is the notebook level sync error unexpected or not</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8290">**IsSectionErrorSuppressed** – Pokazuje da li je greška pri sinhronizaciji odeljka potisnuta ili nije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8290">**IsSectionErrorSuppressed** – is the section sync error suppressed or not</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8291">**IsSectionErrorUnexpected** – Pokazuje da li je greška pri sinhronizaciji odeljka neočekivana ili nije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8291">**IsSectionErrorUnexpected** – is the section sync error unexpected or not</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8292">**IsUsingRealtimeSync** – Pokazuje da li sinhronizovanje beležnice koristi modernu sinhronizaciju sadržaja stranice ili ne</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8292">**IsUsingRealtimeSync** – is the notebook sync using modern page content sync or not</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8293">**LastAttemptedSync** – Vremenska oznaka kada je poslednji put pokušano sinhronizovanje beležnice</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8293">**LastAttemptedSync** – timestamp when the notebook was attempted to be synced last time</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8294">**LastBackgroundSync** – Vremenska oznaka kada je poslednji put pokušano sinhronizovanje u pozadini</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8294">**LastBackgroundSync** – timestamp when the latest background sync was attempted</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8295">**LastNotebookViewedDate** – Datum kada je beležnica poslednji put prikazana</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8295">**LastNotebookViewedDate** – the date when the notebook was last viewed</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8296">**LastSuccessfulSync** – Vremenska oznaka kada je beležnica prethodno uspešno sinhronizovana</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8296">**LastSuccessfulSync** – timestamp when the notebook successfully synced before</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8297">**NeedToRestartBecauseOfInconsistencies** – Pokazuje da li sinhronizacija mora ponovo da se pokrene zbog nedoslednosti ili ne</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8297">**NeedToRestartBecauseOfInconsistencies** – does the sync need to restart because of inconsistencies or not</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8298">**NotebookErrorCode** – Kôd greške pri sinhronizaciji na nivou beležnice sačuvan u prostoru za grafikon beležnice</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8298">**NotebookErrorCode** – notebook level sync error code saved on notebook graph space</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8299">**NotebookId** – ID beležnice</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8299">**NotebookId** – notebook ID</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8300">**NotebookType** – Tip beležnice</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8300">**NotebookType** – notebook type</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8301">**ReplicatingAgainBecauseOfInconsistencies** – Pokazuje da li se sinhronizacija ponovo pokreće zbog nedoslednosti ili ne</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8301">**ReplicatingAgainBecauseOfInconsistencies** – does the sync restart because of inconsistencies or not</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8302">**SectionError_Code** – Numerički ili alfanumerički kôd koji se koristi za određivanje prirode greške pri sinhronizaciji odeljka i/ili toga zbog čega je do nje došlo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8302">**SectionError_Code** – a numbered or alphanumeric code used to determine the nature of the section sync error, and/or why it occurred</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8303">**SectionError_Description** – Opis greške pri sinhronizaciji odeljka</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8303">**SectionError_Description** – a description of the section sync error</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8304">**SectionError_Tag** – Pokazuje gde se u kodu javlja greška pri sinhronizaciji odeljka</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8304">**SectionError_Tag** – indicate where in the code throws the section sync error</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8305">**SectionError_Type** – Tip greške pri sinhronizaciji odeljka, na primer Win32Error itd.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8305">**SectionError_Type** – the type of the section sync error, e.g. Win32Error, etc.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8306">**Success** – Pokazuje da li je beležnica uspešno sinhronizovana ili nije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8306">**Success** – is the notebook sync successful or not</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8307">**SyncDestinationType** – Tip odredišta sinhronizacije, to jest OneDrive ili SharePoint Online</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8307">**SyncDestinationType** – sync destination type, i.e. OneDrive or SharePoint Online</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8308">**SyncId** – Broj jedinstven za svako sinhronizovanje beležnice</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8308">**SyncId** – a number unique to each notebook sync</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8309">**SyncWasFirstInSession** – Pokazuje da li je ova sinhronizacija prva sinhronizacija u trenutnoj sesiji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8309">**SyncWasFirstInSession** – is this sync the first sync in current session</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8310">**SyncWasUserInitiated** – Pokazuje da li je ovu sinhronizaciju pokrenuo korisnik ili nije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8310">**SyncWasUserInitiated** – is this sync user initiated or not</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8311">**TenantId** – ID SharePoint zakupca</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8311">**TenantId** – SharePoint tenant ID</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8312">**TimeSinceLastAttemptedSync** – Vreme proteklo od poslednjeg pokušaja sinhronizacije beležnice</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8312">**TimeSinceLastAttemptedSync** – time since last notebook sync attempt</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8313">**TimeSinceLastSuccessfulSync** – Vreme proteklo od poslednje uspešne sinhronizacije beležnice</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8313">**TimeSinceLastSuccessfulSync** – time since last successful notebook sync</span></span>

### <a name="officeonenotestoragerealtimewebsocketsessioninfo"></a><span data-ttu-id="d6247-8314">Office.OneNote.Storage.RealTime.WebSocketSessionInfo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8314">Office.OneNote.Storage.RealTime.WebSocketSessionInfo</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="d6247-8315">Ovaj događaj evidentira rezultat sinhronizovanja veb priključka za obe sinhronizacije programa OneNote: modernu sinhronizaciju sadržaja stranice i modernu sinhronizaciju hijerarhije. Koristi se za otkrivanje broja jedinstvenih ciljeva sinhronizacije kada se izračunava rezultat sinhronizacije programa OneNote.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8315">This event logs WebSocket sync result for both OneNote modern page content sync modern hierarchy sync. It is used for figuring out how many unique sync targets when calculating OneNote sync score.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8316">Koristi se i za kontrolnu tablu performansi moderne sinhronizacije programa OneNote.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8316">It is also used for OneNote modern sync performance dashboard.</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="d6247-8317">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8317">The following fields are collected:</span></span>
 
- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8318">**CloseReason** – Razlog zatvaranja veb priključka, na primer nestandardno zatvaranje itd.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8318">**CloseReason** - WebSocket close reason, e.g. Abnormal close, etc.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8319">**DataIsFreshCount** – Broj uspešnih zahteva za pregled izmena u sesiji veb priključka</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8319">**DataIsFreshCount** - number of successful pull requests in the WebSocket session</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8320">**DeviceSessionId** – ID sesije uređaja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8320">**DeviceSessionId** - Device session ID</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8321">**DownloadCount** – Broj preuzimanja u sesiji veb priključka</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8321">**DownloadCount** - number of downloads in the WebSocket session</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8322">**Error** – U osnovi predstavlja: Exception_Type + Exception_Description + Exception_Code + Exception_Tag</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8322">**Error** - is basically Exception_Type + Exception_Description + Exception_Code + Exception_Tag</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8323">**Exception_Code** – Numerički ili alfanumerički kôd koji se koristi za određivanje prirode greške i/ili toga zbog čega je do nje došlo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8323">**Exception_Code** - a numbered or alphanumeric code used to determine the nature of an error, and/or why it occurred</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8324">**Exception_Description** – Opis greške</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8324">**Exception_Description** - a description of the error</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8325">**Exception_Tag** – Pokazuje gde se u kodu javlja greška</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8325">**Exception_Tag** - indicate where in the code throws the error</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8326">**Exception_Type** – Tip greške, na primer Win32Error itd.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8326">**Exception_Type** - the type of the error, e.g. Win32Error, etc.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8327">**FirstUpdateSize** – Dužina poruke o prvom ažuriranju</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8327">**FirstUpdateSize** - first update message length</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8328">**HasError** – Pokazuje da li postoji greška tokom sesije veb priključka</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8328">**HasError** - whether there is an error during the WebSocket session</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8329">**IsEducationNotebook** – Pokazuje da li je trenutna beležnica obrazovna beležnica ili nije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8329">**IsEducationNotebook** - Is the current notebook education notebook or not</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8330">**IsHierarchyResource** – Pokazuje da li je trenutni resurs stranica ili odeljak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8330">**IsHierarchyResource** - Is the current resource a page or a section</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8331">**NotebookId** – ID OneNote beležnice</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8331">**NotebookId** - OneNote notebook ID</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8332">**OperationWithError** – Pokazuje u kojoj operaciji je došlo do greške, na primer WebSocket.Close, WebSocket.Open itd.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8332">**OperationWithError** - in which operation did the error happen, e.g. WebSocket.Close, WebSocket.Open, etc.</span></span>

### <a name="officeonenotestoragesectionsyncresult"></a><span data-ttu-id="d6247-8341">Office.OneNote.Storage.SectionSyncResult</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8341">Office.OneNote.Storage.SectionSyncResult</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="d6247-8342">Ovaj događaj evidentira rezultat sinhronizovanja odeljka.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8342">This event logs section sync result.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8343">Koristi se za otkrivanje broja jedinstvenih ciljeva sinhronizacije kada se izračunava rezultat sinhronizacije programa OneNote.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8343">It is used for figuring out how many unique sync targets when calculating OneNote sync score.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8344">Koristi se i za kontrolnu tablu performansi moderne sinhronizacije programa OneNote.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8344">It is also used for OneNote modern sync performance dashboard.</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="d6247-8345">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8345">The following fields are collected</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8346">**Error_Code** – Numerički ili alfanumerički kôd koji se koristi za određivanje prirode greške i/ili toga zbog čega je do nje došlo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8346">**Error_Code** - a numbered or alphanumeric code used to determine the nature of an error, and/or why it occurred</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8347">**Error_Description** – Opis greške</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8347">**Error_Description** - a description of the error</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8348">**Error_Tag** – Pokazuje gde se u kodu javlja greška</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8348">**Error_Tag** - indicate where in the code throws the error</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8349">**Error_Type** – Tip greške, na primer Win32Error itd.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8349">**Error_Type** - the type of the error, e.g. Win32Error, etc.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8350">**ErrorLast** – Kôd greške poslednje viđene greške</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8350">**ErrorLast** - the error code of last seen error</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8351">**ExecutionTime** – Vreme u milisekundama potrebno za kopiranje odeljka</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8351">**ExecutionTime** - time in milliseconds taken to replicate the section</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8352">**InitialReplicationInSession** – Pokazuje da li je ova replikacija prva replikacija beležnice posle otvaranja ili nije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8352">**InitialReplicationInSession** - is this replication the first notebook replication after open or not</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8353">**IsAttachedViaShortcut** – Pokazuje da li je odeljak priložen putem prečice ili nije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8353">**IsAttachedViaShortcut** - is the section attached via shortcut or not</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8354">**IsBackgroundSync** – Pokazuje da li je ovo sinhronizacija u pozadini ili nije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8354">**IsBackgroundSync** - is this a background sync or not</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8355">**IsEncrypted** – Pokazuje da li je odeljak šifrovan ili nije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8355">**IsEncrypted** - is the section encrypted or not</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8356">**IsErrorSuppressed** – Pokazuje da li je ova greška potisnuta ili nije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8356">**IsErrorSuppressed** - is this error suppressed or not</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8357">**IsErrorTransient** – Pokazuje da li je ova greška privremena ili nije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8357">**IsErrorTransient** - is this error transient or not</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8358">**IsErrorUnexpected** – Pokazuje da li je ova greška neočekivana ili nije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8358">**IsErrorUnexpected** - is this error unexpected or not</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8359">**IsUsingRealtimeSync** – Pokazuje da li sinhronizovanje odeljka koristi modernu sinhronizaciju sadržaja stranice ili ne</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8359">**IsUsingRealtimeSync** - is the section sync using modern page content sync or not</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8360">**NotebookId** – ID beležnice</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8360">**NotebookId** - notebook ID</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8361">**NotebookPath** - PII čišćenje URL adrese beležnice</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8361">**NotebookPath** - PII scrubbed notebook URL</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8362">**SectionPath** - PII čišćenje URL adrese odeljka</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8362">**SectionPath** - PII scrubbed section URL</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8364">**SectionReplicatingIsSameIdentity** – Pokazuje da li je ova replikacija zasnovana na istom identitetu datoteke ili nije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8364">**SectionReplicatingIsSameIdentity** - is this replication based on the same file identity or not</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8365">**SectionResourceId** – ID resursa OneNote odeljka</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8365">**SectionResourceId** - OneNote section resource ID</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8366">**Success** – Pokazuje da li je odeljak uspešno sinhronizovan ili nije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8366">**Success** - is the section sync successful or not</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8367">**SyncDestinationType** – Tip odredišta sinhronizacije, to jest OneDrive ili SharePoint Online</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8367">**SyncDestinationType** - sync destination type, i.e. OneDrive or SharePoint Online</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8368">**SyncId** – Broj jedinstven za svaku sinhronizaciju odeljka</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8368">**SyncId** - a number unique to each section sync</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8369">**SyncWasFirstInSession** – Pokazuje da li je ova sinhronizacija prva sinhronizacija u trenutnoj sesiji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8369">**SyncWasFirstInSession** - is this sync the first sync in current session</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8370">**SyncWasUserInitiated** – Pokazuje da li je ovu sinhronizaciju pokrenuo korisnik ili nije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8370">**SyncWasUserInitiated** - is this sync user initiated or not</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8371">**TenantId** – ID SharePoint zakupca</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8371">**TenantId** - SharePoint tenant ID</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8372">**UnmappedGosid** – ID odeljka pre nego što se primeni GUID za mapiranje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8372">**UnmappedGosid** - section ID before applying the mapping GUID</span></span>


### <a name="officeonenotestoragesyncscore"></a><span data-ttu-id="d6247-8373">Office.OneNote.Storage.SyncScore</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8373">Office.OneNote.Storage.SyncScore</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="d6247-8374">Ovaj događaj evidentira sve negativne faktore u utisku pri radu sa sinhronizovanjem koje korisnici mogu da vide.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8374">This event logs all negative factors in sync experience that are visible to users.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8375">Koristi se za izračunavanje rezultata sinhronizacije programa OneNote koji predstavlja ključnu metriku za procenu utiska korisnika pri radu sa sinhronizovanjem u programu OneNote.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8375">It is used to calculate OneNote sync score, which is a critical metric to evaluate OneNote users' sync experience.</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="d6247-8376">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8376">The following fields are collected</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8379">**Context** – Identifikator koji kategorizuje to što korisnik pokušava da uradi, na primer preimenovanje odeljka, ponovno otvaranje beležnice itd.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8379">**Context** - an enum categorizes what user is trying to do, e.g. rename a section, reopen a notebook, etc.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8380">**Error_Code** – Numerički ili alfanumerički kôd koji se koristi za određivanje prirode greške i/ili toga zbog čega je do nje došlo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8380">**Error_Code** - a numbered or alphanumeric code used to determine the nature of an error, and/or why it occurred</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8381">**Error_Description** – Opis greške</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8381">**Error_Description** - a description of the error</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8382">**Error_Tag** – Pokazuje gde se u kodu javlja greška</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8382">**Error_Tag** - indicate where in the code throws the error</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8383">**Error_Type** – Tip greške, na primer Win32Error itd.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8383">**Error_Type** - the type of the error, e.g. Win32Error, etc.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8384">**ErrorText** – Tekst greške prikazan u korisničkom interfejsu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8384">**ErrorText** - error text shown in the UI</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8385">**Explanation** – Objašnjava koje je odlazne promene na čekanju potrebno premestiti u odeljke na pogrešnom mestu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8385">**Explanation** - explains what kind of pending outbound changes that need to be moved to misplaced sections</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8386">**fishbowlType** – Vrsta akvarijuma, na primer akvarijum stranice, akvarijum odeljka itd.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8386">**fishbowlType** - type of fishbowl, e.g. page fishbowl, section fishbowl, etc.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8387">**IDS** – Identifikator vrednosti celog broja za tekst prikazan u korisničkom interfejsu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8387">**IDS** - an integer identifier for the text shown in the UI</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8388">**idsFishbowl** – Identifikator vrednosti celog broja za grešku akvarijuma prikazanu u korisničkom interfejsu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8388">**idsFishbowl** - an integer identifier for the fishbowl error shown in the UI</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8389">**IsUsingRealtimeHierarchySync** – Pokazuje da li se koristi moderna sinhronizacija hijerarhije ili ne</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8389">**IsUsingRealtimeHierarchySync** - Is using modern hierarchy sync or not</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8390">**NotebookId** - ID beležnice</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8390">**NotebookId** - notebook ID</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8391">**PageSyncUIState** - Niska statusa sinhronizovanja stranice, na primer UpToDate, Syncing, SaveOffline, SyncError itd.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8391">**PageSyncUIState** - page sync status string, e.g., UpToDate, Syncing, SaveOffline, SyncError, etc.</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8392">**ServerGosid** – ID resursa za novu napravljenu stranicu sa neusaglašenostima</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8392">**ServerGosid** - resource ID for newly created conflict page</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8393">**Source** – Identifikator koji pokazuje koji je događaj pokrenuo korisnički interfejs, to jest napravio novu Redx sliku, grešku pri sinhronizovanju u korisničkom interfejsu sinhronizacije, prikazani dijalog greške itd.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8393">**Source** - an enum indicates which event triggered the UI, i.e. created a new redx image, sync error in the sync UI, error dialog displayed, etc.</span></span>

### <a name="onenoteappprovisioningmovelocalnotebooktoonlinenotebookfailed"></a><span data-ttu-id="d6247-8394">OneNote.App.Provisioning.MoveLocalNotebookToOnlineNotebookFailed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8394">OneNote.App.Provisioning.MoveLocalNotebookToOnlineNotebookFailed</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="d6247-8395">Ovaj događaj se evidentira kada ne uspe premeštanje lokalne beležnice na disk jedinicu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8395">This event is logged when move of local notebook to drive fails.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8396">Ovaj slučaj je specifičan za korisnika u odloženom režimu prijavljivanja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8396">This scenario is specific to delayed sign-in user.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8397">Kada se korisnik prijavi, lokalna beležnica će se preneti na skladište usluge OneDrive.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8397">When the user signs in, their local notebook is transferred to their OneDrive storage.</span></span> 
 
<span data-ttu-id="d6247-8398">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8398">The following fields are collected:</span></span>
 
- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8399">**ErrorMsg** - Poruka o grešci koja odgovara neuspehu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8399">**ErrorMsg** - The error message corresponding to the failure.</span></span>

### <a name="onenotestorageconnectivitychanged"></a><span data-ttu-id="d6247-8400">OneNote.Storage.ConnectivityChanged</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8400">OneNote.Storage.ConnectivityChanged</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-8401">Događaj se evidentira bez obzira da li korisnik ima vezu sa internetom.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8401">The event logs if a user has internet connectivity or not.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8402">Ovo se koristi za uzajamno povezivanje sa drugom metrikom performansi sinhronizacije, omogućavajući nam da zanemarimo događaje koji se dešavaju dok korisnik nema vezu sa Internetom, jer ne očekujemo da bi kašnjenje u usluzi bilo prihvatljivo bez veze sa Internetom.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8402">This is used to correlate the other sync health performance metrics by allowing us to ignore events that occur while a user does not have internet connectivity as we do not expect our service latency to be acceptable without internet connectivity.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8403">To nam omogućava da proračunamo tačan broj sesija za naše metrike, kroz isečke klijenata (po zakupcu, po sektoru).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8403">This allows us to calculate an accurate session count for our metrics across slices of customers (per-tenant, per-sector).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8404">Koristimo ga i da bi filtrirali izveštaje o greškama jer postoje brojne greške sinhronizacije za koje očekujemo da se pojave bez mrežnog povezivanja, što u suprotnom garantuje istragu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8404">We also use it to filter error reports as there are numerous sync errors that we expect to occur without network connectivity but that warrant investigation otherwise.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-8405">Ukoliko ne primimo ove podatke, nećemo moći da precizno nadgledamo performanse proizvoda ili utvrdimo da li su greške koje korisnik iskusi, očekivane ili zahtevaju dalju istragu. </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8405">If we do not receive this data, we will not be able to accurately monitor our products performance or determine if errors experienced by a user are expected or require further investigation.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-8406">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8406">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8407">**InternetConnectivityNowAvailable** – ako je došlo do promene stanja veze, tako da je sada internet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8407">**InternetConnectivityNowAvailable** -  If the connectivity state has been changed so it is now Internet</span></span>

### <a name="onenotestoragelegacyinboundlatency"></a><span data-ttu-id="d6247-8408">OneNote.Storage.LegacyInboundLatency</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8408">OneNote.Storage.LegacyInboundLatency</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-8409">Kritičan signal koji se koristi za praćenje performansi ulaznih operacija sinhronizacije, koje komuniciraju direktno sa SharePoint, uključujući povezivanje informacija koje nam omogućavaju da nadgledamo i istražujemo performanse otpremanja podataka ka našoj usluzi (onenote.com).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8409">The critical signal used to track the performance of inbound sync operations that communicate directly with SharePoint including correlating information allowing us to monitor and investigate the performance of uploading data to our service.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8410">Ovaj signal se sakuplja za najgore izvedena preuzimanja u poslednjih 300 sekundi (broj sekundi konfiguriše Microsoft u zavisnosti od performansi i uslova usluge).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8410">This signal is only collected for the worst performing download in the last 300 seconds (the number of seconds is configurable by Microsoft depending on service performance and condition).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-8411">Ovo se koristi za obezbeđivanje ispravnosti usluge dopuštajući nam da vidimo koji zakupci prolaze kroz neprihvatljivo spor dolazak podataka u našu uslugu, informacije o podacima koje su otpremali kada su doživeli spor dolazak i koliko je rasprostranjen problem sa kašnjenjem među zakupcima.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8411">This is used to ensure service health by allowing us to see which tenants are experiencing an unacceptably slow inbound of data to our service, information about the data they are uploading when they experienced the slow inbound and how widespread within a tenant that latency issue is.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8412">Koristi se i za izveštavanje o ispravnosti i performansama usluge za sve naše klijente, radi merenja trendova tokom vremena i automatskog upozorenja o problemima za ublažavanje inženjeringa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8412">It is also used to report service health and performance across our customers to measure trends over time and alert on issues automatically for engineering mitigation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8413">Ako nemamo ove podatke, to će nas sprečiti da osiguramo adekvatne performanse kada se sinhronizovanje korisnika promeni u sistemu SharePoint.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8413">If we do not have this data it will prevent us from ensuring adequate download performance when a user syncs changes from SharePoint to their computer.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-8414">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8414">The following fields are collected:</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8415">**IsEducationNotebook** – Bulova vrednost koja ukazuje da li je beležnica, beležnica za obrazovanje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8415">**IsEducationNotebook** - A bool indicating if the notebook is an education notebook</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8416">**NotebookId** – ID beležnice čiji je deo ovo otpremanje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8416">**NotebookId** - The ID of the notebook that this upload is part of</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8417">**TimeToConfirmSyncedWithServerInMs** – Vreme, u milisekundama, koje je bilo potrebno da se izvrši otpremanje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8417">**TimeToConfirmSyncedWithServerInMs** - The time in milliseconds it took to perform the upload</span></span>

### <a name="onenotestoragelegacyoutboundlatency"></a><span data-ttu-id="d6247-8418">OneNote.Storage.LegacyOutboundLatency</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8418">OneNote.Storage.LegacyOutboundLatency</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-8419">Kritičan signal koji se koristi za praćenje performansi odlaznih operacija sinhronizacije koje direktno komuniciraju sa SharePoint, uključujući informacije o međusobnom povezivanju, koje nam omogućavaju da nadgledamo i istražujemo performanse otpremanja podataka ka našoj usluzi (onenote.com).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8419">The critical signal used to track the performance of outbound sync operations that communicate directly with SharePoint including correlating information allowing us to monitor and investigate the performance of uploading data to our service.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8420">Ovaj signal se sakuplja za najgore izvedena preuzimanja u poslednjih 300 sekundi (broj sekundi konfiguriše Microsoft u zavisnosti od performansi i uslova usluge).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8420">This signal is only collected for the worst performing download in the last 300 seconds (the number of seconds is configurable by Microsoft depending on service performance and condition).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-8421">Ovo se koristi za obezbeđivanje ispravnosti usluge, omogućavajući nam da vidimo koji zakupci prolaze kroz neprihvatljivo sporo odlaženje podataka ka našoj usluzi, informacije o podacima koje su otpremali kada su iskusili sporo odlaženje i koliko je rasprostranjen problem sa kašnjenjem među zakupcima.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8421">This is used to ensure service health by allowing us to see which tenants are experiencing an unacceptably slow outbound of data to our service, information about the data they were uploading when they experienced the slow outbound and how widespread within a tenant that latency issue is.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8422">Koristi se i za izveštavanje o ispravnosti i performansama usluge za sve naše klijente, radi merenja trendova tokom vremena i automatskog upozorenja o problemima za ublažavanje inženjeringa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8422">It is also used to report service health and performance across our customers to measure trends over time and alert on issues automatically for engineering mitigation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8423">Ako nemamo ove podatke, to će nas sprečiti da osiguramo adekvatne performanse kada se sinhronizovanje korisnika promeni u sistemu SharePoint.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8423">If we do not have this data, it will prevent us from ensuring adequate performance when syncing users changes up to SharePoint.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-8424">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8424">The following fields are collected:</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8425">**IsEducationNotebook** – Bulova vrednost koja ukazuje da li je beležnica, beležnica za obrazovanje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8425">**IsEducationNotebook** - A bool indicating if the notebook is an education notebook</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8426">**NotebookId** – ID beležnice čiji je deo ovo otpremanje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8426">**NotebookId** - The ID of the notebook that this upload is part of</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8427">**TimeToConfirmSyncedWithServerInMs** – Vreme, u milisekundama, koje je bilo potrebno da se izvrši otpremanje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8427">**TimeToConfirmSyncedWithServerInMs** - The time in milliseconds it took to perform the upload</span></span>

### <a name="onenotestoragerealtimefiledataobjectdownload"></a><span data-ttu-id="d6247-8428">OneNote.Storage.RealTime.FileDataObjectDownload</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8428">OneNote.Storage.RealTime.FileDataObjectDownload</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-8429">Kritičan signal koji se koristi za praćenje performansi kada korisniku dolazi objekat sa podacima datoteke (tj. ugrađena datoteka ili slika) koja se preuzima direktno iz naše usluge, a ne kao deo operacije sinhronizacije na stranici, odeljku ili beležnici.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8429">The critical signal used to track performance when a user inbounds a file data object (i.e. an embedded file or image) which is downloaded directly from our service and not as part of a sync operation on a page, section or notebook.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8430">Ovaj signal se sakuplja za najgore izvedena preuzimanja u poslednjih 300 sekundi (broj sekundi konfiguriše Microsoft u zavisnosti od performansi i uslova usluge).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8430">This signal is only collected for the worst performing download in the last 300 seconds (the number of seconds is configurable by Microsoft depending on service performance and condition).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-8431">Ovo se koristi za obezbeđivanje ispravnosti usluge, omogućavajući nam da vidimo koji zakupci prolaze kroz neprihvatljivo sporo preuzimanje podataka iz naše usluge, i koliko je rasprostranjen problem sa kašnjenjem među zakupcima, i izveštavamo o našem ponašanju tokom vremena omogućavajući nam da merimo trendove performanse usluge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8431">This is used to ensure service health and performance by allowing us to see which tenants are experiencing an unacceptably slow download of data from our service, and how widespread within a tenant that latency issue is, and report our behavior over time allowing us to measure service performance trends.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8432">Ako vidimo neprihvatljivo kašnjenje objekta za datoteku, takođe ćemo koristiti i ove podatke kako bismo to uzajamno povezali sa signalima od klijenta i usluge u vezi sa poboljšanjima procesa preuzimanja od strane objekta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8432">If we see an unacceptable latency for a file object, we will also use this data to correlate that with other signals from the client and service regarding the object to make improvements to our download process.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8433">Takođe delimo podatke na osnovu proširenja preuzetog objekta datoteke, jer imamo drugačija očekivanja na osnovu toga da li je datoteka predstavljena neposredno na podlozi na platnu (npr. slika) ili je posredna datoteka (na primer, tekstualni dokument).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8433">We also split the data based on the extension of the file object downloaded as we have different expectations based on whether the file is presented inline in our canvas (e.g. an image) or is a non-inline file (such as a text document).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8434">Ako ne primimo ove podatke, to će nas sprečiti u nadgledanju performansi tih preuzimanja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8434">If we do not receive this data, it will prevent us from monitoring the performance of these downloads</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-8435">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8435">The following fields are collected:</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8436">**FileSizeInBytes** – veličina datoteke preuzete u bajtovima</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8436">**FileSizeInBytes** - The size of the file being downloaded in bytes</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8437">**IsImage** – Bulova vrednost koja utvrđuje da li datoteka koja se preuzima ima proširenje koje se podudara sa unapred definisanom listom uobičajenih formata slika (.bmp, .emf, .gif, .jpe, .jpeg, .jpg, .png) koje prikazujemo u okviru podloge za pisanje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8437">**IsImage** - A bool determining if the file being downloaded has an extension that matches a pre-determined list of common image formats (.bmp, .emf, .gif, .jpe, .jpeg, .jpg, .png) that we display inline in the canvas</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8438">**TimeToDownload** – Dužina vremena koje je bilo potrebno za uspešno preuzimanje FDO, na uređaj, iz našeg skladišta blob objekta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8438">**TimeToDownload** - The length of time it took to successfully download the FDO from our blob storage to the device</span></span> 

### <a name="onenotestoragerealtimewebsocketdownload"></a><span data-ttu-id="d6247-8439">OneNote.Storage.RealTime.WebSocketDownload</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8439">OneNote.Storage.RealTime.WebSocketDownload</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-8440">Kritičan signal koji se koristi za praćenje performansi ulaznih operacija sinhronizacije, uključujući informacije o međusobnom povezivanju, koje nam omogućavaju da nadgledamo i istražujemo performanse preuzimanja podataka iz naše usluge (onenote.com).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8440">The critical signal used to track performance of inbound sync operations including correlating information allowing us to monitor and investigate the performance of downloading data from our service (onenote.com).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8441">Ovaj signal se sakuplja za najgore izvedena preuzimanja u poslednjih 300 sekundi (broj sekundi konfiguriše Microsoft u zavisnosti od performansi i uslova usluge).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8441">This signal is only collected for the worst performing download in the last 300 seconds (the number of seconds is configurable by Microsoft depending on service performance and condition).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-8442">Ovo se koristi za obezbeđivanje ispravnosti usluge, omogućavajući nam da vidimo koji zakupci prolaze kroz neprihvatljivo sporo ulaženje podataka iz naše usluge, informacije o podacima koje su preuzimali kada su iskusili sporo ulaženje i koliko je rasprostranjen problem sa kašnjenjem među zakupcima.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8442">This is used to ensure service health by allowing us to see which tenants are experiencing an unacceptably slow inbound of data from our service, information about the data they were downloading when they experienced the slow inbound and how widespread within a tenant that latency issue is.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8443">Koristi se i za izveštavanje o ispravnosti i performansama usluge za sve naše klijente, radi merenja trendova tokom vremena i automatskog upozorenja o problemima za ublažavanje inženjeringa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8443">It is also used to report service health and performance across our customers to measure trends over time and alert on issues automatically for engineering mitigation.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-8444">Ako vidimo neprihvatljivo kašnjenje odeljka ili beležnice, koristićemo i ove kako bismo to uzajamno povezali sa drugim signalima klijenta i usluge u vezi sa istim dokumentom za identifikovanje regresije performansi koje nam omogućavaju da pružimo uslugu sa boljim performansama.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8444">If we see an unacceptable latency for a section or notebook we will also use this data to correlate that with other signals from the client and service regarding the same document to identify client-side performance regressions allowing us to deliver a more performant service.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-8445">Ukoliko ne primimo ove podatke, nećemo moći da nadgledamo performanse ovog aspekta naše usluge, ili uticaj promena na strani servera koje možda smatramo neophodnim zbog korišćenja drugih faktora.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8445">If we do not receive this data, we will be unable to monitor the performance of this aspect of our service, or the impact of server side changes we may find necessary due to usage or other factors.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-8446">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8446">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8447">**DeviceSessionId** – ID sesije uređaja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8447">**DeviceSessionId** -  The ID of the device session</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8448">**IsEducationNotebook** – Bulova vrednost koja ukazuje da li je beležnica, beležnica za obrazovanje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8448">**IsEducationNotebook** - A bool indicating if the notebook is an education notebook</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8449">**IsHierarchyResource** – Bulova vrednost koja označava je li resurs hijerarhijski</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8449">**IsHierarchyResource** - A bool indicating if the resource is a hierarchy resource</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8450">**NotebookId** – ID beležnice čiji je deo ovo otpremanje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8450">**NotebookId** - The ID of the notebook that this upload is part of</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8451">**ResourceId** – ID resursa koji otpremamo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8451">**ResourceId** - The ID of the resource that we are uploading</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8452">**SectionId** – ID odeljka čiji je deo ovo otpremanje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8452">**SectionId** - The ID of the section that this upload is part of</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8453">**ServerSessionId** – ID sesije servera čiji je deo ovo otpremanje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8453">**ServerSessionId** - The ID of the server session that this upload is part of</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8454">**TimeToConfirmSyncedWithServerInMs** – Vreme, u milisekundama, između odlaska korisnika na stranicu i svežnja replikacije koji potvrđuje da je stranica sinhronizovana sa serverom.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8454">**TimeToConfirmSyncedWithServerInMs** - The time in milliseconds between a user navigating to a page and the replication stack confirming that page is in sync with the server.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8455">**TimeToFirstUpdateInMs** – Vreme, u milisekundama, između početka ulazne replikacije stranice od strane mašine za sinhronizaciju i operacije replikacije koja se sinhronizuje sa stanjem servera.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8455">**TimeToFirstUpdateInMs** - The time in milliseconds between the sync engine beginning inbound replication of a page and that replication operation reaching the in sync with the server state.</span></span>

### <a name="onenotestoragerealtimewebsocketupload"></a><span data-ttu-id="d6247-8456">OneNote.Storage.RealTime.WebSocketUpload</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8456">OneNote.Storage.RealTime.WebSocketUpload</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-8457">Kritičan signal koji se koristi za praćenje performansi ulaznih operacija sinhronizacije, uključujući informacije o međusobnom povezivanju, koje nam omogućavaju da nadgledamo i istražujemo performanse otpremanja podataka ka našoj usluzi (onenote.com).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8457">The critical signal used to track the performance of outbound sync operations including correlating information allowing us to monitor and investigate the performance of uploading data to our service (onenote.com)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-8458">Ovo se koristi za obezbeđivanje ispravnosti usluge, omogućavajući nam da vidimo koji zakupci prolaze kroz neprihvatljivo sporo odlaženje podataka ka našoj usluzi, informacije o podacima koje su otpremali kada su iskusili sporo odlaženje i koliko je rasprostranjen problem sa kašnjenjem među zakupcima.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8458">This is used to ensure service health by allowing us to see which tenants are experiencing an unacceptably slow outbound of data to our service, information about the data they were uploading when they experienced the slow outbound and how widespread within a tenant that latency issue is.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8459">Koristi se i za izveštavanje o ispravnosti i performansama usluge za sve naše klijente, radi merenja trendova tokom vremena i automatskog upozorenja o problemima za ublažavanje inženjeringa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8459">It is also used to report service health and performance across our customers to measure trends over time and alert on issues automatically for engineering mitigation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8460">Takođe ćemo koristiti ove podatke za praćenje uticaja i efikasnosti poboljšanja koje pružamo našim klijentima i uslugama.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8460">We will also use this data to track the impact and effectiveness of improvements we make to our clients and services.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-8461">Ako vidimo neprihvatljivo kašnjenje odeljka ili beležnice, koristićemo ove i podatke kako bismo to uzajamno povezali sa drugim signalima klijenta i usluge u vezi sa istim dokumentom za identifikovanje regresije performansi koje nam omogućavaju da pružimo iskustvo sa boljim performansama.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8461">If we see an unacceptable latency for a section or notebook we will also use this data to correlate that with other signals from the client and service regarding the same document to identify performance regressions allowing us to deliver a more performant experience.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-8462">Ukoliko ne primimo ove podatke, nećemo moći da nadgledamo performanse ovog aspekta naše usluge, ili uticaj promena na strani servera koje možda smatramo neophodnim zbog korišćenja drugih faktora.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8462">If we do not receive this data, we will be unable to monitor the performance of this aspect of our service, or the impact of server side changes we may find necessary due to usage or other factors.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-8463">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8463">The following fields are collected:</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8464">**DeviceSessionId** – ID sesije uređaja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8464">**DeviceSessionId** - The ID of the device session</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8465">**IsEducationNotebook** – Bulova vrednost koja ukazuje da li je beležnica, beležnica za obrazovanje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8465">**IsEducationNotebook** - A bool indicating if the notebook is an education notebook</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8466">**IsHierarchyResource** – Bulova vrednost koja označava je li resurs hijerarhijski</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8466">**IsHierarchyResource** - A bool indicating if the resource is a hierarchy resource</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8467">**IsWorstTime** – Bulova vrednost koja ukazuje da li je vreme uobičajen događaj otpremanja, ili najgore vreme koje smo videli za ovog klijenta u poslednjih 300 sekundi (broj sekundi konfiguriše Microsoft u zavisnosti od performansi i stanja usluge).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8467">**IsWorstTime** - A bool indicating if the time is a regular upload event, or the worst time we saw on this client in the last 300 seconds (the number of seconds is configurable by Microsoft depending on service performance and condition).</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8468">**NotebookId** – ID beležnice čiji je deo ovo otpremanje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8468">**NotebookId** - The ID of the notebook that this upload is part of</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8469">**RecommendedPutIntervalInMs** – vreme kada je usluga komunicirala sa klijentom kao preporučeni interval stavljanja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8469">**RecommendedPutIntervalInMs** - The time the service has communicated to the client as its recommended put interval</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8470">**ResourceId** – ID resursa koji otpremamo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8470">**ResourceId** - The ID of the resource that we are uploading</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8471">**SectionId** – ID odeljka čiji je deo ovo otpremanje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8471">**SectionId** - The ID of the section that this upload is part of</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8472">**SenderRequestId** – ID pošiljaoca koji izvršava otpremanje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8472">**SenderRequestId** - The ID of the sender performing the upload</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8473">**ServerSessionId** – ID sesije servera čiji je deo ovo otpremanje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8473">**ServerSessionId** - The ID of the server session that this upload is part of</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8474">**UploadNonSuspendedTimeInMs**– vreme, u milisekundama, koje je bilo potrebno da se izvrši otpremanje, izuzimajući vreme kada je aplikacija bila obustavljena</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8474">**UploadNonSuspendedTimeInMs** - The time in milliseconds it took to perform the upload excluding the time when the application was suspended</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8475">**UploadTimeInMs** – Vreme, u milisekundama, koje je bilo potrebno da se stvarno izvrši otpremanje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8475">**UploadTimeInMs** - The time in milliseconds it took to actually perform the upload</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8476">**WaitTimeInMs** – Vreme, u milisekundama, između zahteva za otpremanje i započinjanja otpremanja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8476">**WaitTimeInMs** - The time in milliseconds between an upload being requested and an upload starting</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8477">**WebUrl** – URL adresa veb lokacije otpremanja (Prijavljen kao PiiWz)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8477">**WebUrl** - The WebUrl of the upload (Logged as a PiiWz)</span></span>

### <a name="onenotestoragesynchealth"></a><span data-ttu-id="d6247-8478">OneNote.Storage.SyncHealth</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8478">OneNote.Storage.SyncHealth</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-8479">Kritičan signal koji se koristi za praćenje grešaka i izuzetaka koji su se dogodili unutar svežnja sinhronizacije u klijentu programa OneNote, koji nam omogućava da nadgledamo i ublažavamo ove neočekivane uslove.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8479">The critical signal used to track errors and exceptions that have occurred inside the sync stack in the OneNote client allowing us to monitor and mitigate these unexpected conditions.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-8480">Ovo se koristi za obezbeđivanje ispravnosti usluge tako što će nam omogućiti da vidimo izveštaje o greškama klijenata u bliskom realnom vremenu, koji nam omogućavaju da odgovaramo na probleme pri sinhronizaciji kada se pojave.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8480">This is used to ensure service health by allowing us to see error reports from the clients in near real time, which lets us respond to sync issues as they arise.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8481">Koristi se i za identifikovanje toga koliko je rasprostranjen i obiman problem kroz unakrsno upućivanje na oznaku greške sa kodom klijenta za identifikovanje izvora neuspeha.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8481">It is also used to identify how widespread an issue is, and how severe by cross-referencing the error tag with the client code to identify the source of failure.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8482">Prikupljamo i ove podatke kako bismo dobili informacije o našem nastupu kroz vreme i o uticaju i efikasnosti poboljšanja koje pružamo našim klijentima i uslugama.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8482">We also aggregate this data to get information on our performance over time and the impact and effectiveness of improvements we make to our clients and services.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8483">Ako nemamo ove podatke, nećemo moći da proaktivno odgovaramo na uslove greške u usluzi sinhronizacije bez eskalacije klijenata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8483">If we do not have this data, we won’t be able to proactively respond to error conditions in our sync service without customer escalation.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-8484">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8484">The following fields are collected:</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8485">**Service** – usluga sinhronizacije koju je klijent koristio kada se dogodila greška (zastarela ili moderna sinhronizacija)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8485">**Service** - The sync service the client was using when the error occurred (Legacy or Modern Sync)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8486">**Tag** – Oznaka (identifikaciona vrednost) koja predstavlja grešku na koju je klijent naišao tokom postupka sinhronizacije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8486">**Tag** - The tag (an identifying value) representing the error that the client encountered during the sync operation</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-8489">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8489">The following fields are collected:</span></span>
 
- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8490">**NetworkConnection** - Evidentira tip veze koju uređaj trenutno koristi, npr. Wi-Fi, van mreže, 3G</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8490">**NetworkConnection** - Logs the connection type that the device is currently on e.g. Wi-Fi, offline, 3G</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8491">**ServerType** - Evidentira tip servera na kom je trebalo da se kreira beležnica.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8491">**ServerType** - Logs the server type where notebook was to be created.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8496">**NetworkConnection** - Evidentira tip veze koju uređaj trenutno koristi, npr. Wi-Fi, van mreže, 3G</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8496">**NetworkConnection** - Logs the connection type that the device is currently on e.g. Wi-Fi, offline, 3G</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8497">**ServerType** - Evidentira tip servera na kom je trebalo da se kreira beležnica „Brze beleške“</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8497">**ServerType** - Logs the server type where Quick Notes notebook was to be created</span></span>

### <a name="appdeeplink"></a><span data-ttu-id="d6247-8501">app.deep.link</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8501">app.deep.link</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-8502">Ovaj događaj vam pomaže da pratite korišćenje pokretanja sastanka kalendara u različitim krajnjim tačkama.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8502">This event helps to track the usage of calendar meeting launch, across different endpoints.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8503">Ovaj događaj nam omogućava da otkrijemo dve stvari kada je sastanak pokrenut putem aplikacije Skype za posao, i kada je sastanak pokrenut putem aplikacije Teams i da li je instalirana aplikacija Teams.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8503">This event lets us detect two things when a meeting is launched via Skype for Business, and when a meeting is launched via Teams, and if the Teams app is installed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-8504">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8504">The following fields are collected:</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8505">**account** – Heširani podaci o nalogu koji su izvršili radnju</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8505">**account** - Hashed account information which performed the action</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8506">**action_type** – izvršena radnja, kao što je pokretanje sastanka ili instaliranje aplikacije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8506">**action_type** - action performed, such as launch meeting or install application</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8507">**aplication** – Aplikacija koja je pokrenuta putem duboke veze, kao što su Teams ili Skype za posao</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8507">**application** - Application that was launched via a deep link, such as Teams or Skype for Business</span></span>


### <a name="officeandroiddocsuipaywallcontrolpaywalloperationmetrics"></a><span data-ttu-id="d6247-8508">Office.Android.DocsUI.PaywallControl.PaywallOperationMetrics</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8508">Office.Android.DocsUI.PaywallControl.PaywallOperationMetrics</span></span>
