- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8512">**OperationTimeInMs** – vreme potrebno za završetak postupka kupovine (dugo – millisekunde)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8512">**OperationTimeInMs** - Time taken for the purchase operation to complete (long – milliseconds)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8513">**PaywallOperationResult** – upeh/ šifra greške / korisnik otkazan (Enum / int – konačna)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8513">**PaywallOperationResult** - Success / Error Code / User Canceled (Enum / int – finite)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8514">**PaywallOperationType** – označava vrstu Paywall operacije (enum/ int – konačna)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8514">**PaywallOperationType** - Kind of Paywall operation (enum/ int - finite)</span></span>

### <a name="officeandroiddocsuipaywallcontrolpaywallsessiondata"></a><span data-ttu-id="d6247-8515">Office.Android.DocsUI.PaywallControl.PaywallSessionData</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8515">Office.Android.DocsUI.PaywallControl.PaywallSessionData</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-8516">*[Ovaj događaj je prethodno imao ime Office.Android.DocsUI.Views.PaywallSessionData.]*</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8516">*[This event was previously named Office.Android.DocsUI.Views.PaywallSessionData.]*</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-8517">Metapodaci zasnovani na sesiji kada se UI Paywall-a prikaže korisniku.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8517">Session-based metadata when Paywall UI is shown to the user.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8518">Microsoft ovo koristi zarad korisničkog putovanja i razumevanja uređaja i verzije operativnog sistema koji korisnik koristi, radi lakšeg donošenja odluka o investiranju u unapređenje iskustva u tim oblastima.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8518">Microsoft uses this to get the user journey, and understand the device and OS versions the user is using, to help make decisions on investments in improving the experience in these areas.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-8519">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8519">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8520">**Verzija aplikacije** – Verzija koda zahtevne aplikacije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8520">**App Version** - Version code of the consuming application</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8521">**ClientId** – Anonimni identifikator uređaja jedinstvenog za ne-PII (guID/niska)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8521">**ClientId** - Anonymous non-PII unique device identifier (guid / string)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8522">**Ulazna tačka** – Jedinstveni identifikator za kontekstualne ili konstantne ulazne tačke iz zahtevne aplikacije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8522">**Entry Point** - Unique identifier for contextual or constant entry points from the consuming application</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8523">**isTablet** – Da li uređaj prikazuje UX tableta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8523">**isTablet** - Whether the device is showing tablet UX</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8524">**OSVersion** – Verzija operativnog sistema Android uređaja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8524">**OSVersion** - Android OS version of the device</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8525">**SessionId** – GuID: Identifikator sesije jedinstvenog Paywall-a</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8525">**SessionId** - Guid: Unique Paywall session identifier</span></span>


### <a name="officefirstrunappletelemetryoptin"></a><span data-ttu-id="d6247-8526">Office.FirstRun.Apple.TelemetryOptIn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8526">Office.FirstRun.Apple.TelemetryOptIn</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-8527">Ovaj događaj se sakuplja za Office aplikacije koje se pokreću u okviru Apple platformi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8527">This event is collected for Office applications running under Apple platforms.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8528">Događaj se koristi za nadgledanje zdravstvenog stanja našeg protoka telemetrije kod davanja saglasnosti za pokretanje prvog utiska.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8528">The event is used to monitor the health of our telemetry opt-in flow in First Run Experience.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8529">Prikupljamo kôd koji označava koji tip opcije prikupljanja dijagnostičkih podataka je izabrao korisnik.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8529">We collect a code that denotes what type of diagnostic data collection option was selected by the user.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-8530">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8530">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8531">**Data_EventId** – kôd koji označava željenu opciju za prikupljanje dijagnostičkih podataka koju je odabrao korisnik.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8531">**Data_EventId** – A code indicating the diagnostic data collection preference selected by the user.</span></span>

### <a name="officeiospaywallprovisioningresponse"></a><span data-ttu-id="d6247-8532">Office.iOS.Paywall.Provisioning.Response</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8532">Office.iOS.Paywall.Provisioning.Response</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-8533">Telemetrija proizvoda koja se upotrebljava za usklađivanje podataka o transakcijama kupovine s Microsoft sistemom trgovine radi omogućivanja povezanih pogodnosti pretplate.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8533">Product telemetry used for reconciliation of purchase transaction information with the Microsoft commerce system to enable associated subscription benefits.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8534">Koristi se za olakšavanje evidentiranja transakcija i omogućavanja pretplate za buduću referencu i interno usklađivanje.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8534">Used to facilitate the transaction logging and subscription provisioning for future reference and internal reconciliation.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-8535">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8535">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8536">**entryPoint** – niz – dugme/tok s kojeg je prikazan Paywall.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8536">**entryPoint** - String – The Button/Flow from which Paywall was displayed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8537">Kao što je "Premium Upgrade Button" ili „First run flow“</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8537">Like “Premium Upgrade Button” or “First Run Flow”.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8538">**failureReason** – niz – dodat samo kada je status "neupeh".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8538">**failureReason** - String – Only added when status is “failure”.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8539">Ukazuje na odgovor na grešku koji je dao RFS odgovor dodeljivanja privilegija.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8539">Indicating the error response given by the RFS Provisioning response.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8540">**productId** – niz – ID proizvoda prodavnice App Store za koji je izrađen zahtev</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8540">**productId** - String – App Store ID of the product the request was made for</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8541">**stanje** – niz – upeh ili neupeh, što upućuje na to je li zahtev uspeo ili ne</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8541">**status** - String – Success or Failure, indicating if the request succeeded or failed</span></span>


### <a name="officeiospaywallstorekitresponse"></a><span data-ttu-id="d6247-8542">Office.iOS.Paywall.StoreKit.Response</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8542">Office.iOS.Paywall.StoreKit.Response</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-8543">Podaci se prikupljaju kao kritična inženjerska telemetrija za beleženje rezultata pokušaja kupovine koji je korisnik pokrenuo ručno.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8543">The data is collected as critical engineering telemetry to log the result of purchase attempt triggered manually by user.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8544">Telemetrija proizvoda upotrebljava se za usklađivanje podataka o transakcijama kupovine s Microsoft sistemom trgovine radi omogućivanja povezanih pogodnosti pretplate.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8544">The product telemetry is used for reconciliation of purchase transaction information with the Microsoft commerce system to enable associated subscription benefits.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-8545">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8545">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8546">**entryPoint** – niz – dugme/tok s kojeg je prikazan Paywall.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8546">**entryPoint** - String – The Button/Flow from which Paywall was displayed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8547">Kao što je "Premium Upgrade Button" ili „First run flow“</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8547">Like “Premium Upgrade Button” or “First Run Flow”.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8548">**failureReason** – niz – dodat samo kada je status "neupeh".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8548">**failureReason** - String – Only added when status is “failure”.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8549">Ukazuje na odgovor na grešku koji je dala prodavnica App-store.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8549">Indicating the error response given by the App-store response</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8550">**productId** – niz – samo za „MakePurchase“, „PendingPurchase”, ID proizvoda prodavnice app-store za koji je zahtev stvoren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8550">**productId** - String – Only for “MakePurchase”, “PendingPurchase”, the app-store ID of the product for which the request was made.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8551">**productsCount** -Int – samo za "ProductsFetch", broj proizvoda koje prodavnica vraća.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8551">**productsCount** - Int – Only for “ProductsFetch”, the number of products returned by Store.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8552">**requestType** – niz – vrsta zahteva za Storekit.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8552">**requestType** - String – Type of StoreKit request.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8553">Kao što je "ProductsFetch", "Pendingpurchase"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8553">Like “ProductsFetch”, “PendingPurchase”</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8554">**status** – niz – upeh ili neupeh, što upućuje na upeh ili neupeh zahteva</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8554">**status** - String – Success or Failure, indicating success or failure of the request</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8562">**ErrorMessage** – niska koja opisuje grešku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8562">**ErrorMessage** - string describing error</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8563">**FailureType** – niska za utvrđivanje tipa greške</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8563">**FailureType** - string to determine type of error</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8564">**HttpStatusCode** – HTTP kôd greške za mrežni poziv</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8564">**HttpStatusCode** - HTTP error code for network call</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8565">**InnerErrorCode** – int kôd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8565">**InnerErrorCode** - int code</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8566">**InnerErrorMesage** – poruka za grešku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8566">**InnerErrorMesage** - message for error</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8567">**IsSuccess** – Bulova vrednost da je signal uspeo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8567">**IsSuccess** - Boolean value for is signal succeeded</span></span>

### <a name="officesystemgracefulexitgracefulappexitdesktop"></a><span data-ttu-id="d6247-8582">Office.System.GracefulExit.GracefulAppExitDesktop</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8582">Office.System.GracefulExit.GracefulAppExitDesktop</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-8583">Događaj je pokrenut gracioznim raskidom aplikacija za Office klijentske aplikacije kao što su, ali ne ograničavajući se na, Word, Excel, PowerPoint i Outlook.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8583">The event is triggered by a graceful application termination for Office client applications such as, but not limited to, Word, Excel, PowerPoint, and Outlook.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8584">Korišćenje gracioznog izlaza za merenje ispravnosti proizvoda Office klijenata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8584">We use Graceful Exit to measure the health of Office client products.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8585">Zamišljeno je da bude poslovni kritični signal koji koriste Office inženjeri a bi postigli stabilnost proizvoda.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8585">It is intended to be a business-critical signal used by Office engineers to infer product stability.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-8586">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8586">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8587">**AppBuild** – Identifikator izdanja verzije ugroženog procesa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8587">**AppBuild** - Build version identifier for the affected process.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8588">**AppMajor** – Identifikator glavne verzije ugroženog procesa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8588">**AppMajor** - Major version identifier for the affected process.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8589">**AppMinor** – Identifikator međuverzije ugroženog procesa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8589">**AppMinor** - Minor version identifier for the affected process.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8590">**AppRevision** – Identifikator izdanja verzije ugroženog procesa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8590">**AppRevision** - Build version identifier for the affected process.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8591">**BootCompleted** – Da li je Office proces završio pokretanje sistema.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8591">**BootCompleted** – Did Office process complete boot.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8592">**DetectionTime** – Vreme kada je otkriven neočekivani izlaz.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8592">**DetectionTime** - The time when the unexpected exit was detected.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8593">**EcsETag** – Identifikator eksperimenta za proces.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8593">**EcsETag** - An experiment identifier for the process.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8594">**HasEdit** – Da li se uređivanje dokumenta dogodilo tokom Office procesa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8594">**HasEdit** – Was document editing occurring during the Office process.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8595">**HasOpen** – Da li je dokument otvoren tokom Office procesa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8595">**HasOpen** – Was document opened during the Office process.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8596">**InstallMethod** – Da li je trenutno izdanje sistema Office instalirano nadogradnjom, vraćanjem na prethodnu verziju ili novom instalacijom.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8596">**InstallMethod** - Whether the current build of Office was upgraded from, rolled back to, or a fresh install.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8597">**OfficeUILang** – Jezik Office procesa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8597">**OfficeUILang** – Language of the Office process.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8598">**PreviousBuild** – Izdanje prethodno instalirane verzije.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8598">**PreviousBuild** - Previously installed build version.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8599">**SafeMode** – Bio je Office proces u bezbednom režimu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8599">**SafeMode** – Was Office process in safe mode.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8600">**SessionId** – Jedinstveni identifikator procesa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8600">**SessionId** - A unique identifier of the process.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8601">**SessionInitTime** – Vreme kada je počeo ugroženi proces.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8601">**SessionInitTime** - The time when the affected process started.</span></span>

### <a name="officesystemsystemhealthungracefulappexitdesktop"></a><span data-ttu-id="d6247-8976">Office.System.SystemHealthUngracefulAppExitDesktop</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8976">Office.System.SystemHealthUngracefulAppExitDesktop</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-8977">Događaj pokreće abnormalni završetak aplikacije (primer: zatvaranje upravljača zadacima, obustava aplikacije itd.) Za Office klijentske aplikacije kao što su Word, Excel, PowerPoint i Outlook.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8977">The event is triggered by an abnormal application termination (Example: task manager kill, application hang, etc.) for Office client applications such as Word, Excel, PowerPoint, and Outlook.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8978">Metrike neočekivanog izlaska iz aplikacija koristimo za merenje ispravnosti proizvoda klijenata sistema Office.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8978">We use Ungraceful Application Exit metrics to measure the health of Office client products.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8979">To je signal, ključan za posao, koji se koristi za postizanje stabilnosti proizvoda.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8979">It is a business-critical signal used to infer product stability.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8981">**AffectedProcessAppBuild -** Identifikator izdanja verzije ugroženog procesa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8981">**AffectedProcessAppBuild -** Build version identifier for the affected process.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8983">**AffectedProcessAppMajorVer** – Identifikator međuverzije pogođenog procesa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8983">**AffectedProcessAppMajorVer** - Minor version identifier for the affected process.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8984">**AffectedProcessAppMinorVer -** Identifikator međuverzije ugroženog procesa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8984">**AffectedProcessAppMinorVer -** Minor version identifier for the affected process.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8985">**AffectedProcessAppName -** Ime ugroženog procesa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8985">**AffectedProcessAppName -** The name of the affected process.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8986">*[Ovo polje je uklonjeno iz aktuelnih verzija sistema Office, ali se i dalje može pojavljivati u starijim verzijama.]*</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8986">*[This field has been removed from current builds of Office, but might still appear in older builds.]*</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8987">**AffectedProcessExeBuildVersion –** Broj izdanja verzije ugroženog procesa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8987">**AffectedProcessExeBuildVersion -** The Build Version number of the affected process.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8988">*[Ovo polje je uklonjeno iz aktuelnih verzija sistema Office, ali se i dalje može pojavljivati u starijim verzijama.]*</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8988">*[This field has been removed from current builds of Office, but might still appear in older builds.]*</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8989">**AffectedProcessExeMajorVersion –** Broj glavne verzije ugroženog procesa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8989">**AffectedProcessExeMajorVersion -** The Major Version number of the affected process.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8990">*[Ovo polje je uklonjeno iz aktuelnih verzija sistema Office, ali se i dalje može pojavljivati u starijim verzijama.]*</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8990">*[This field has been removed from current builds of Office, but might still appear in older builds.]*</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8991">**AffectedProcessExeMinorVersion -** Broj međuverzije ugroženog procesa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8991">**AffectedProcessExeMinorVersion -** The Minor Version number of the affected process.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-8992">*[Ovo polje je uklonjeno iz aktuelnih verzija sistema Office, ali se i dalje može pojavljivati u starijim verzijama.]*</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-8992">*[This field has been removed from current builds of Office, but might still appear in older builds.]*</span></span>

### <a name="officesystemsystemhealthungracefulappexitimmersive"></a><span data-ttu-id="d6247-9071">Office.System.SystemHealthUngracefulAppExitImmersive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-9071">Office.System.SystemHealthUngracefulAppExitImmersive</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-9072">Koristi se za snimanje metrike pada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-9072">Used to capture crash metrics.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-9073">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-9073">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-9074">**AffectedProcessAppBuild -** Identifikator izdanja verzije ugroženog procesa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-9074">**AffectedProcessAppBuild -** Build version identifier for the affected process.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-9076">**AffectedProcessAppMajorVer -** Identifikator glavne verzije ugroženog procesa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-9076">**AffectedProcessAppMajorVer -** Major version identifier for the affected process.</span></span>

### <a name="officesystemsystemhealthungracefulapplicationexitwin32"></a><span data-ttu-id="d6247-9100">Office.System.SystemHealthUngracefulApplicationExitWin32</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-9100">Office.System.SystemHealthUngracefulApplicationExitWin32</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-9101">Događaj pokreće neočekivani prekid aplikacije (na primer, uklanjanje u upravljaču zadacima, prekid aplikacije, itd.) za Office klijentske aplikacije kao što su, ali ne ograničavajući se na, Word, Excel, PowerPoint i Outlook.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-9101">The event is triggers by an abnormal application termination (for example, task manager kill, application hang, etc.) for Office client applications such as, but not limited to, Word, Excel, PowerPoint, and Outlook.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-9102">Metrike neočekivanog izlaska iz aplikacija koristimo za merenje ispravnosti proizvoda klijenata sistema Office.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-9102">We use Ungraceful Application Exit metrics to measure the health of Office client products.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-9103">To je signal, ključan za posao, koji koriste Office inženjeri da bi postigli stabilnost proizvoda.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-9103">It is a business-critical signal used by Office engineers to infer product stability.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-9104">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-9104">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-9105">**AddinExecution** – Zastavica koja vas obaveštava da li se programski dodatak izvršavao i nije završio rad tokom neskladnog napuštanja aplikacije.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-9105">**AddinExecution** - Flag that informs if an add-in was executing and didn't finish during an ungraceful application exit.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-9106">*[Ovo polje je uklonjeno iz aktuelnih verzija sistema Office, ali se i dalje može pojavljivati u starijim verzijama.]*</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-9106">*[This field has been removed from current builds of Office, but might still appear in older builds.]*</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-9107">**AppUsedVirtualMemory** – virtuelna memorija koju koristi Office aplikacija</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-9107">**AppUsedVirtualMemory** - Virtual memory utilized by office application</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-9108">**BootCompleted** – Da li je pokretanje sistema Office dovršeno u vreme pada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-9108">**BootCompleted** - Was Office boot completed at the time of crash.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-9109">*[Ovo polje je uklonjeno iz aktuelnih verzija sistema Office, ali se i dalje može pojavljivati u starijim verzijama.]*</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-9109">*[This field has been removed from current builds of Office, but might still appear in older builds.]*</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-9110">**BucketId** – Watson identifikator grupe za pad</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-9110">**BucketId** - Watson bucket Identifier for crash</span></span>
 
  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-9111">**CabGuid** – univerzalni jedinstveni identifikator (GUID) za Watson cab.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-9111">**CabGuid** - Globally Unique Identifier (GUID) identifier for the Watson cab.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-9112">**CrashedAppBuild** – verzija izdanja pogođenog procesa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-9112">**CrashedAppBuild** - Build version identifier for the affected process.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-9113">*[Ovo polje je uklonjeno iz aktuelnih verzija sistema Office, ali se i dalje može pojavljivati u starijim verzijama.]*</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-9113">*[This field has been removed from current builds of Office, but might still appear in older builds.]*</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-9114">**CrashedAppMajor** – Identifikator glavne verzije pogođenog procesa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-9114">**CrashedAppMajor** - Major version identifier for the affected process.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-9115">*[Ovo polje je uklonjeno iz aktuelnih verzija sistema Office, ali se i dalje može pojavljivati u starijim verzijama.]*</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-9115">*[This field has been removed from current builds of Office, but might still appear in older builds.]*</span></span>
 
  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-9116">**CrashedAppMinor** – Identifikator međuverzije ugroženog procesa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-9116">**CrashedAppMinor** - Minor version identifier for the affected process.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-9117">*[Ovo polje je uklonjeno iz aktuelnih verzija sistema Office, ali se i dalje može pojavljivati u starijim verzijama.]*</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-9117">*[This field has been removed from current builds of Office, but might still appear in older builds.]*</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-9118">**CrashedAppVersion** – Identifikator verzije aplikacije za srušeni proces.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-9118">**CrashedAppVersion** - Application version identifier for crashed process.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-9119">**CrashedEcsETag** – Identifikator eksperimenta palog procesa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-9119">**CrashedEcsETag** - An experiment identifier for the crashed process.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-9120">**CrashedModuleName** – Ime neispravnog modula.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-9120">**CrashedModuleName** - Failing module name.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-9121">**CrashedProcessSessionId** – Jedinstveni identifikator palog procesa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-9121">**CrashedProcessSessionId** - A unique identifier of the crashed process.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-9122">**CrashedProcessSessionInitTime** – Vreme kada je pogođeni proces započeo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-9122">**CrashedProcessSessionInitTime** - The time when the affected process started.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-9123">**CrashedProcessSessionUninitTime -** Vreme kada se završio ugroženi proces.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-9123">**CrashedProcessSessionUninitTime** - The time when the affected process ended.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-9124">**CrashTag** – Jedinstveni identifikator za kôd pada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-9124">**CrashTag** - The unique identifier for the code of the crash.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-9125">**CrashTime** – Vreme koje pokazuje kada je klijent nasilno prekinuo rad.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-9125">**CrashTime** - The time indicating the client terminated ungracefully.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-9126">*[Ovo polje je uklonjeno iz aktuelnih verzija sistema Office, ali se i dalje može pojavljivati u starijim verzijama.]*</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-9126">*[This field has been removed from current builds of Office, but might still appear in older builds.]*</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-9127">**CrashType** – Identifikovanje segmenta za tip otkazivanja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-9127">**CrashType** - Bucketing identifier for the type of crash.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-9128">**DetectionTime** – Vreme kada je otkriven neočekivani izlaz.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-9128">**DetectionTime** - The time when the unexpected exit was detected.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-9129">*[Ovo polje je uklonjeno iz aktuelnih verzija sistema Office, ali se i dalje može pojavljivati u starijim verzijama.]*</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-9129">*[This field has been removed from current builds of Office, but might still appear in older builds.]*</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-9130">**ExceptionAddress** – Adresa u aplikaciji u kojoj je došlo je do greške.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-9130">**ExceptionAddress** - Address in the program where the failure occurred.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-9131">*[Ovo polje je uklonjeno iz aktuelnih verzija sistema Office, ali se i dalje može pojavljivati u starijim verzijama.]*</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-9131">*[This field has been removed from current builds of Office, but might still appear in older builds.]*</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-9132">**ExceptionCode** – Identifikator segmenta za izuzetak.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-9132">**ExceptionCode** - Bucketing identifier for the exception.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-9133">**ExceptionInfo** – Informacije o sistemu za izuzetak.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-9133">**ExceptionInfo** - System information for the exception.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-9134">**HandOff** – da li je korisnik kreirao i predao Office proces u novu sesiju.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-9134">**HandOff** - Did the user create and hand off the Office process to a new session.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-9135">*[Ovo polje je uklonjeno iz aktuelnih verzija sistema Office, ali se i dalje može pojavljivati u starijim verzijama.]*</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-9135">*[This field has been removed from current builds of Office, but might still appear in older builds.]*</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-9136">**HangTypeCode** – Predstavlja hang klasu ako je proces visio tokom izvršavanja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-9136">**HangTypeCode** - Represents class of hang if the process hung during execution.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-9137">**HasEdit** – Da li je korisnik uređivao dokument na klijentu koji je pao.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-9137">**HasEdit** - Was the user editing a document in the crashed client.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-9138">*[Ovo polje je uklonjeno iz aktuelnih verzija sistema Office, ali se i dalje može pojavljivati u starijim verzijama.]*</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-9138">*[This field has been removed from current builds of Office, but might still appear in older builds.]*</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-9139">**HasOpen –** Da li je dokument bio otvoren na klijentu koji je pao.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-9139">**HasOpen** - Was a document open in the crashed client.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-9140">*[Ovo polje je uklonjeno iz aktuelnih verzija sistema Office, ali se i dalje može pojavljivati u starijim verzijama.]*</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-9140">*[This field has been removed from current builds of Office, but might still appear in older builds.]*</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-9141">**HexCrashTag** – Jedinstveni identifikator za kôd pada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-9141">**HexCrashTag** -  The unique identifier for the code of the crash.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-9142">*[Ovo polje je uklonjeno iz aktuelnih verzija sistema Office, ali se i dalje može pojavljivati u starijim verzijama.]*</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-9142">*[This field has been removed from current builds of Office, but might still appear in older builds.]*</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-9143">**HexExceptionAddress** – Adresa u heksadecimalnom obliku u programu u kojem je došlo do kvara.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-9143">**HexExceptionAddress** - Address in hexadecimal in the program where the failure occurred.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-9144">*[Ovo polje je uklonjeno iz aktuelnih verzija sistema Office, ali se i dalje može pojavljivati u starijim verzijama.]*</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-9144">*[This field has been removed from current builds of Office, but might still appear in older builds.]*</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-9145">**HexExceptionCode** – Identifikator grupe za izuzetak u heksadecimalnom zapisu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-9145">**HexExceptionCode** - Bucketing identifier in hexadecimal for the exception.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-9146">*[Ovo polje je uklonjeno iz aktuelnih verzija sistema Office, ali se i dalje može pojavljivati u starijim verzijama.]*</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-9146">*[This field has been removed from current builds of Office, but might still appear in older builds.]*</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-9147">**HexModuleBaseAddress** – Osnovna adresa neispravnog modula u heksadecimalnom zapisu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-9147">**HexModuleBaseAddress** - Base Address in hexadecimal of the failing module.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-9148">*[Ovo polje je uklonjeno iz aktuelnih verzija sistema Office, ali se i dalje može pojavljivati u starijim verzijama.]*</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-9148">*[This field has been removed from current builds of Office, but might still appear in older builds.]*</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-9149">**HexModuleOffset** – Pomak u bajtovima (u heksadecimalnom obliku) od osnovne adrese na kojoj je došlo do kvara.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-9149">**HexModuleOffset** - Offset in bytes (in hexadecimal) from the base address where the failure occurred.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-9150">*[Ovo polje je uklonjeno iz aktuelnih verzija sistema Office, ali se i dalje može pojavljivati u starijim verzijama.]*</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-9150">*[This field has been removed from current builds of Office, but might still appear in older builds.]*</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-9151">**HexModuleSize** – veličina neispravnog modula u bajtovima u heksadecimalnom zapisu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-9151">**HexModuleSize** - Failing module size in bytes in hexadecimal.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d6247-9152">*[Ovo polje je uklonjeno iz aktuelnih verzija sistema Office, ali se i dalje može pojavljivati u starijim verzijama.]*</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-9152">*[This field has been removed from current builds of Office, but might still appear in older builds.]*</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-9155">**InstallMethod** – Da li je trenutno izdanje sistema Office instalirano nadogradnjom, vraćanjem na prethodnu verziju ili novom instalacijom.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-9155">**InstallMethod** - Whether the current build of Office was upgraded from, rolled back to, or a fresh install.</span></span>

### <a name="officesystemungracefulapplicationexitdesktopappexit"></a><span data-ttu-id="d6247-9181">Office.System.UngracefulApplicationExit.DesktopAppExit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-9181">Office.System.UngracefulApplicationExit.DesktopAppExit</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-9186">**AppMinorVersion -** Identifikator međuverzije ugroženog procesa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-9186">**AppMinorVersion -** Minor version identifier for the affected process.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-9187">**AppName -** Ime ugrožene aplikacije.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-9187">**AppName -** The name of the affected application.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-9188">**AppRevisionVersion -** Identifikator izdanja revizije ugroženog procesa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-9188">**AppRevisionVersion -** Build revision identifier for the affected process.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-9189">**CrashedAssignedFlights -** Događaji dodeljeni palom procesu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-9189">**CrashedAssignedFlights -** The flights assigned to the crashed process.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-9190">**CrashedConfigIds -** Konfiguracija dodeljena palom procesu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-9190">**CrashedConfigIds -** The configuration assigned to the crashed process.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-9191">**CrashedImpressionId -** Identifikator prikaza palog procesa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-9191">**CrashedImpressionId -** The impression identifier of the crashed process.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-9192">**CrashedInteractionSessionId -** Identifikator sesije interakcije palog procesa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-9192">**CrashedInteractionSessionId -** The interaction session identifier of the crashed process.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-9193">**CrashedProcessSessionId -** Jedinstveni identifikator palog procesa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-9193">**CrashedProcessSessionId -** A unique identifier of the crashed process.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-9194">**CrashType -** Identifikator grupe za tip pada</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-9194">**CrashType -** Bucketing identifier for the type of crash.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-9195">**ErrorString -** Opis greške.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-9195">**ErrorString -** Error description.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-9196">**ExceptionAddress -** Adresa u aplikaciji u kojoj je došlo je do greške.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-9196">**ExceptionAddress -** Address in the program where the failure occurred.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-9197">**ExceptionCode -** Identifikator grupe za izuzetak.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-9197">**ExceptionCode -** Bucketing identifier for the exception.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-9198">**FaultAppName -** Ime neispravne aplikacije.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-9198">**FaultAppName -** The name of the faulting app.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-9199">**InstallMethod -** Da li je trenutna verzija sistema Office instalirana nadogradnjom, vraćanjem na prethodnu verziju ili novom instalacijom.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-9199">**InstallMethod -** Whether the current build of Office was upgraded from, rolled back to, or a fresh install.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-9200">**InstallType -** Identifikator načina na koji je instaliran sistem Office.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-9200">**InstallType -** An identifier for the method by which Office was installed.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-9201">**IsDebug -** Da li je to Office izdanje za otklanjanje grešaka</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-9201">**IsDebug -** Whether this is a debug build of Office.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-9202">**IsHandledCrash -** Da li je rukovalac pada pozvan tokom pada sesije.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-9202">**IsHandledCrash -** Whether the crash handler was invoked in the crashing session.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-9203">**IsLabMachine -** Da li je Office pokrenut u Microsoft laboratoriji.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-9203">**IsLabMachine -** Whether Office is being run in a Microsoft lab.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-9204">**ModuleBaseAddress -** Osnovna adresa neispravnog modula.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-9204">**ModuleBaseAddress -** Base Address of the failing module.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-9205">**ModuleName -** Ime neispravnog modula.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-9205">**ModuleName -** Failing module name.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-9206">**ModuleOffset -** Pomak u bajtovima od osnovne adrese gde je došlo je do greške.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-9206">**ModuleOffset -** Offset in bytes from the base address where the failure occurred.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-9207">**ModuleSize -** Veličina neispravnog modula u bajtovima.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-9207">**ModuleSize -** Failing module size in bytes.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-9208">**OSEnvironment -** Identifikator okruženja u kome je pokrenut Office.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-9208">**OSEnvironment -** Identifier for what environment Office is running on.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-9209">**PreviousBuild -** Izdanje prethodno instalirane verzije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-9209">**PreviousBuild -** Previously installed build version</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-9210">**PreviousInteractionSessionTime -** Vreme kada je započeta prethodna sesija interakcije.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-9210">**PreviousInteractionSessionTime -** Time which the previous interaction session started.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-9211">**PreviousLifecycleState -** Identifikator stanja prethodnog životnog ciklusa sesije.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-9211">**PreviousLifecycleState -** Previous session lifecycle state identifier.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-9212">**PreviousSessionInitTime -** Vreme kada je započeta prethodna sesija.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-9212">**PreviousSessionInitTime -** Time when the previous session started.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-9213">**StackHash -** Identifikator koji ukazuje na to gde se nalazi kôd zbog kojeg je ugroženi proces pao.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-9213">**StackHash -** An identifier indicating where in code that the affected process crashed.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-9214">**VerifyElseCrashTag -** Jedinstveni identifikator mesta na kom je aplikacija pala.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-9214">**VerifyElseCrashTag -** Unique identifier for where the app crashed.</span></span>

### <a name="officetelemetryrulesresultuploadlatencyrule"></a><span data-ttu-id="d6247-9394">Office.Telemetry.RulesResultUploadLatencyRule</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-9394">Office.Telemetry.RulesResultUploadLatencyRule</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-9395">Prosečno, minimalno i maksimalno kašnjenje otpremanja rezultata pravila za otpremanje korisnih podataka na svakih sat vremena.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-9395">The Average, Min and Max upload Latency of rule results payload upload every hour</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-9397">**AverageLatency** - Prosečno kašnjenje otpremanja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-9397">**AverageLatency** - The average upload latency.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-9398">**CollectionTime** - Vreme kada su prikupljeni podaci o pravilu otpremanja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-9398">**CollectionTime** - The time when data on rule upload was collected.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-9399">**LatencyGE201LE400** - Broj otpremanja sa kašnjenjem koje je veće ili jednako od 201ms i manje ili jednako od 400ms</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-9399">**LatencyGE201LE400** - The number of uploads with a latency greater than or equal to 201ms and less than or equal to 400ms</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-9400">**LatencyGE3001** - Broj otpremanja sa kašnjenjem koje je veće ili jednako od 3001ms.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-9400">**LatencyGE3001** - The number of uploads with a latency greater than or equal to 3001ms.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-9401">**LatencyGE401LE600** - Broj otpremanja sa kašnjenjem koje je veće ili jednako od 401ms i manje ili jednako od 600ms.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-9401">**LatencyGE401LE600** - The number of uploads with a latency greater than or equal to 401ms and less than or equal to 600ms.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-9402">**LatencyGE601LE800** - Broj otpremanja sa kašnjenjem koje je veće ili jednako od 601ms i manje ili jednako od 800ms.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-9402">**LatencyGE601LE800** - The number of uploads with a latency greater than or equal to 601ms and less than or equal to 800ms.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-9403">**LatencyLE200** - Broj otpremanja sa kašnjenjem koje je manje od 200 milisekunde.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-9403">**LatencyLE200** - The number of uploads with a latency less than 200 milliseconds.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-9404">**MaxLatency** - Najveće kašnjenje koje je primećeno.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-9404">**MaxLatency** - The highest latency observed.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-9405">**MinLatency** - Najmanje kašnjenje koje je primećeno.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-9405">**MinLatency** - The lowest latency observed.</span></span>

### <a name="officetelemetryvolumetrackingdata"></a><span data-ttu-id="d6247-9495">Office.Telemetry.VolumeTrackingData</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-9495">Office.Telemetry.VolumeTrackingData</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-9496">Događaj količinskog praćenja metrike za događaj telemetrije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-9496">Event volume tracking metrics for telemetry events</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6247-9497">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-9497">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-9498">**EventThreshold** - Maksimalan broj instanci jednog događaja koje mogu biti poslate u vremenskom okviru</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-9498">**EventThreshold** - The maximum number of instances of a single event that can be sent in a window of time.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-9499">**HighestEventCount** - Najveći broj instanci jednog događaja koje su poslate u vremenskom okviru</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-9499">**HighestEventCount** - The highest number of instances of a single event sent this window.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-9500">**HighestEventName** - Ime događaja sa najvećim brojem instanci u vremenskom okviru.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-9500">**HighestEventName** - The name of the event with the highest number of instances in this window.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-9501">**TimeWindowInSeconds** - Trajanje vremenskog okvira u sekundama.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-9501">**TimeWindowInSeconds** - The duration of the window in seconds.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-9502">**TotalEvents** - Ukupan broj događaja koji su poslati tokom vremenskog okvira.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-9502">**TotalEvents** - The total number of events sent during the window.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="d6247-9503">**UniqueEvents** - Broj jedinstvenih događaja koji su poslati tokom vremenskog okvira.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6247-9503">**UniqueEvents** - The number of unique events sent during a window.</span></span>
